original: 'dir gtan tshigs @217a * //
analyzed: 'dir gtan tshigs @217a * //
translated: Here, the reason

original: bsgrub byas rjes 'gro ba //
analyzed: bsgrub byas rjes 'gro ba //
translated: is pervaded by the probandum.

original: zhes pa 'di la /üîΩrjes su 'gro ba'i sgra ni khyab pa'i don du mngon par dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di la / rjes su 'gro ba'i sgra ni khyab pa'i don du mngon par dgongs pa ste /
translated: This is what is being said.üîΩThe word ‚Äúpervaded‚Äù is intended to mean ‚Äúencompassed.‚Äù

original: thams cad du 'gro ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'o zhes pa'i tshig las so //
analyzed: thams cad du 'gro ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'o zhes pa'i tshig las so //
translated: This is because the word ‚Äúpervasion‚Äù means ‚Äúencompassing.‚Äù

original: de la skyon brjod pa smras pa /
analyzed: de la skyon brjod pa smras pa /
translated: Here, the opponent states the fault:

original: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa'o//
analyzed: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa'o//
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù and so on.

original: gang dang gang byas pa de dang de mi rtag pa'o zhes khyab pa rab tu bstan pa na /
analyzed: gang dang gang byas pa de dang de mi rtag pa'o zhes khyab pa rab tu bstan pa na /
translated: When the pervasion is taught as ‚Äúwhatever is produced is impermanent,‚Äù

original: byas pa nyid rtag pa las ldog par rtogs par 'gyur pa kho na ste /
analyzed: byas pa nyid rtag pa las ldog par rtogs par 'gyur pa kho na ste /
translated: only the produced is understood to be the opposite of permanent.

original: de las kyang /üîΩbsgrub bya med la med pa nyid //
analyzed: de las kyang / bsgrub bya med la med pa nyid //
translated: And from that,üîΩthe absence of the probandum is not the absence of the reason.

original: ces pa'i chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ces pa'i chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The definition of a counterexample is not to be stated.

original: de'i dgos pa ni chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe la khyab pa kho nas bsgrubs zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dgos pa ni chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe la khyab pa kho nas bsgrubs zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The purpose of that is because the pervasion is established only by the example of the similar class.

original: ci ste mthun pa'i phyogs la gtan tshigs yod pa tsam bstan par bya ba yin na chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid brjod par rigs te /
analyzed: ci ste mthun pa'i phyogs la gtan tshigs yod pa tsam bstan par bya ba yin na chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid brjod par rigs te /
translated: But if it is the mere presence of the reason in the similar class that is to be shown, then it is correct to state the definition of an example of the dissimilar class.

original: dgos pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir gyi 'on kyang gang bshad zin pa'i phyi rol gyi don ston pa ni nges par bstan par bya ba la gtso bo'i zhes pa 'di mi rigs pas na brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dgos pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir gyi 'on kyang gang bshad zin pa'i phyi rol gyi don ston pa ni nges par bstan par bya ba la gtso bo'i zhes pa 'di mi rigs pas na brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: But it is not correct to say that the external object that has been explained is definitely to be shown, because it is not the principal one. Therefore, it is not to be stated.

original: yod par gyur pa tsam ston pa la dpe'i phyi'i don la ltos pa nyid rigs pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: yod par gyur pa tsam ston pa la dpe'i phyi'i don la ltos pa nyid rigs pa ma yin pas so //
translated: Because it is not correct that the mere presence of the reason in the similar class depends on an external object of the example.

original: de ston to /
analyzed: de ston to /
translated: That is shown.

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyis kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyis kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Immediately after effort, etc.

original: kyang gi sgras mi rtag pa nyid kyis kyang ro //
analyzed: kyang gi sgras mi rtag pa nyid kyis kyang ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù means ‚Äúby impermanence also.‚Äù

original: bum pa la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid med na mi 'byung ba la'o //
analyzed: bum pa la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid med na mi 'byung ba la'o //
translated: A pot is not produced without the presence of effort.

original: de las kyang bum pa la mi rtag pa nyid dang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid mthong ngo zhes byas pa na /
analyzed: de las kyang bum pa la mi rtag pa nyid dang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid mthong ngo zhes byas pa na /
translated: Moreover, when it is said that a pot is seen to be impermanent and to arise immediately after effort,

original: gtan tshigs mthun phyogs la yod par gyur pa tsam rtogs pa kho na'o zhes pas /
analyzed: gtan tshigs mthun phyogs la yod par gyur pa tsam rtogs pa kho na'o zhes pas /
translated: it is merely understood that the reason exists in the similar class.

original: 'dir phyi rol gyi don la ltos pas ci zhig khyab pa kho nas zhes pa gang du bsgrub byas rjes su 'gro ba zhes pa'i mtshan nyid las so //
analyzed: 'dir phyi rol gyi don la ltos pas ci zhig khyab pa kho nas zhes pa gang du bsgrub byas rjes su 'gro ba zhes pa'i mtshan nyid las so //
translated: Here, what is the pervasion by the reliance on external objects? It is from the definition of the probandum that it is called ‚Äúconcomitant.‚Äù

original: 'o na yang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid brjod zin mod /
analyzed: 'o na yang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid brjod zin mod /
translated: But the definition of the dissimilar example has already been stated.

original: brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not to be stated.

original: dgos pa med par phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: dgos pa med par phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is pointless, it is said:

original: gsungs pa / 'di la yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / 'di la yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn this case, too,‚Äù and so on.

original: gnas skabs 'di la yang zhes smra bas 'di gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: gnas skabs 'di la yang zhes smra bas 'di gsal bar byed de /
translated: The statement ‚Äúin this case, too‚Äù clarifies this.

original: gang gi tshe chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpes khyab pa ston pa ma yin pa de'i tshe chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpes bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpes khyab pa ston pa ma yin pa de'i tshe chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpes bstan par bya ste /
translated: When the example of the similar class does not demonstrate the pervasion, then it should be demonstrated by the example of the dissimilar class.

original: @217b da'i phyir gnas skabs gzhan la chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe dgos pa dang ldan zhing de'i phyir de'i mtshan nyid brjod pa rigs pa kho na'o zhes pa'o //üîΩde nyid kyang gnas skabs gzhan du chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i dgos pa sngon cing gsungs pa /
analyzed: @217b da'i phyir gnas skabs gzhan la chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe dgos pa dang ldan zhing de'i phyir de'i mtshan nyid brjod pa rigs pa kho na'o zhes pa'o // de nyid kyang gnas skabs gzhan du chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i dgos pa sngon cing gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is only right to state the definition of the reason, since it is necessary to have an example of difference in other circumstances.üîΩAnd that very [example of difference in other circumstances] is the purpose of the example of difference in other circumstances, as stated before.

original: gang gi tshe ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The example of difference in other circumstances] is stated in the verse beginning with When.

original: gang gi tshe rtogs pa po blo zhen par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rtogs pa po blo zhen par 'gyur te /
translated: When the cognizer's mind becomes attached,

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpes bstan kyang khyab pa bde blag tu rtogs par mthun phyogs la yod par gyur pa ston pa las gzhan pas nus pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de'i rtogs pa lci ba nyid yongs su spang ba'i don du mthun phyogs la yod
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpes bstan kyang khyab pa bde blag tu rtogs par mthun phyogs la yod par gyur pa ston pa las gzhan pas nus pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de'i rtogs pa lci ba nyid yongs su spang ba'i don du mthun phyogs la yod
translated: even though taught by the example of difference, the pervasion is easily understood. It is not possible by any other means than showing existence in the similar class. At that time, in order to completely eliminate the heaviness of understanding, the mere existence in the similar class

original: pa tsam chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpes bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: pa tsam chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpes bstan par bya'o //
translated: should be taught by the example of similarity.

original: de lta na ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa 'di ltar sems te /
analyzed: de lta na ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa 'di ltar sems te /
translated: It is not like that and so on. This is what is thought:

original: de'i tshe mthun phyogs la yod pa tsam rab tu bstan par bya'o zhes pa smra bas 'di gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: de'i tshe mthun phyogs la yod pa tsam rab tu bstan par bya'o zhes pa smra bas 'di gsal bar byed de /
translated: At that time, it is the mere presence in the similar class that should be taught.

original: gang la gtan tshigs kyi yod pa tsam bshad par bya ba de'i chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang la gtan tshigs kyi yod pa tsam bshad par bya ba de'i chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The proponent of this [position] clarifies this, saying, ‚ÄúThat which is to be taught as the mere presence of the reason is the example of the similar class.‚Äù

original: de las kyang /üîΩgtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro ba //
analyzed: de las kyang / gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro ba //
translated: And from that,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa 'di bshad par bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa 'di bshad par bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: ‚ÄúThe reason is the presence in the similar class‚Äù and so on, is not to be explained.

original: 'di skad ni bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di skad ni bshad par bya ste /
translated: This is what is to be explained:

original: gang du gtan tshigs mthun phyogs la yod pa tsam bshad par bya ba'o zhes so //üîΩyang na / gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro ba //
analyzed: gang du gtan tshigs mthun phyogs la yod pa tsam bshad par bya ba'o zhes so // yang na / gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro ba //
translated: ‚ÄúThat which is to be taught as the mere presence of the reason in the similar class.‚ÄùüîΩOr,

original: zhes pa 'di kho na'i 'di bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di kho na'i 'di bshad par bya ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe reason is the presence in the similar class‚Äù and so on, this alone is to be explained.

original: gang du gtan tshigs kyi lhan cig 'byung ba bstan par bya ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang du gtan tshigs kyi lhan cig 'byung ba bstan par bya ba'o zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat which is to be taught as the co-occurrence of the reason.‚Äù

original: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pas 'di gsal bar byed do /
analyzed: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pas 'di gsal bar byed do /
translated: This is clarified by ‚Äúthis also‚Äù and so on.

original: khyod kyis gang smras pa 'di ni bden mod /
analyzed: khyod kyis gang smras pa 'di ni bden mod /
translated: What you say is true.

original: de khyad par gyi gnas skabs kho na la yin te /
analyzed: de khyad par gyi gnas skabs kho na la yin te /
translated: This is only in the case of a specific [reason].

original: gang gi tshe dpe gnyis ka rab tu sbyar bar bya ba zhes pa la sogs pas gsal bar byas pa la'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dpe gnyis ka rab tu sbyar bar bya ba zhes pa la sogs pas gsal bar byas pa la'o //
translated: When the two examples are applied, it is clarified by the words and so on.

original: gang gi tshe ni chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe kho nas khyab pa ston pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe ni chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe kho nas khyab pa ston pa de'i tshe /
translated: When only an example of similarity is used to show the pervasion, then at that time,

original: khyab pa kho na rjes 'gro'i sgra'i brjod bya'i don du rigs te /
analyzed: khyab pa kho na rjes 'gro'i sgra'i brjod bya'i don du rigs te /
translated: only the pervasion is suitable to be the meaning of the term going with.

original: des na gnas skabs de la phyin ci log pa'i khyab pa dgag pa'i ched du /üîΩgtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro ba //
analyzed: des na gnas skabs de la phyin ci log pa'i khyab pa dgag pa'i ched du / gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro ba //
translated: Therefore, in that case, in order to refute a mistaken pervasion,

original: zhes bshad do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad do zhes pa'o //
translated: it is explained as the reason going with the predicate.

original: de la 'dir 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la 'dir 'gyur te /
translated: Here, it is argued:

original: de bkag pas don 'ga' yang med pa kho nas te /
analyzed: de bkag pas don 'ga' yang med pa kho nas te /
translated: Since there is no meaning at all by refuting that,

original: de'i phyir de'i don du 'di brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na @218a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i don du 'di brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na @218a * //
translated: therefore it is not to be stated for that purpose.

original: gsungs pa / de bkag pa la don med pa ma yin te zhes pa /
analyzed: gsungs pa / de bkag pa la don med pa ma yin te zhes pa /
translated: It is said: There is no meaninglessness in refuting that.

original: gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba bkag pa la don med pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba bkag pa la don med pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: There is no meaninglessness in refuting the reason going with the predicate.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: don kho na la'o //
analyzed: don kho na la'o //
translated: It is in the meaning itself.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it so? It is stated:üîΩBecause it is said to be twofold, existence and non-existence.

original: yod dang rnam gnyis zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes pa phyogs chos gang zhig mthun phyogs la yod pa dang rnam pa gnyis ka ste /
analyzed: yod dang rnam gnyis zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes pa phyogs chos gang zhig mthun phyogs la yod pa dang rnam pa gnyis ka ste /
translated: The property of the position is that which exists in the similar class and is twofold.

original: de gtan tshigs so zhes pa 'di ltar sngar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gtan tshigs so zhes pa 'di ltar sngar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is the reason, because it was stated previously in that way.

original: ci ltar na 'di skad brjod pa las gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba bkag pa na don du 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar na 'di skad brjod pa las gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba bkag pa na don du 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it that from the statement, ‚ÄúBecause it is said to be twofold,‚Äù the pervasion of the reason by the probandum is refuted? It is stated:

original: gtan tshigs lhag ma yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs lhag ma yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The remainder of the reason, etc.

original: tshul gsum po gtan tshigs su bshad la /
analyzed: tshul gsum po gtan tshigs su bshad la /
translated: The trimodal property is explained to be the reason.

original: de la phyogs kyi chos nyid ni gtan tshigs kyi tshig kho nas bshad do zhes pas tshul gnyis lhag mang lus te /
analyzed: de la phyogs kyi chos nyid ni gtan tshigs kyi tshig kho nas bshad do zhes pas tshul gnyis lhag mang lus te /
translated: Since it is said that the property of the position is explained by the words of the reason itself, two modes remain.

original: de yang dpes bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang dpes bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: Moreover, they are indicated by the example.

original: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ston pa na yang gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ston pa na yang gang gsungs pa /
translated: When the definition of the reason is stated, it is said:

original: rigs mthun pa la yod ces pa //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa la yod ces pa //
translated: That which exists in the similar class.

original: de la yang gdon mi za bar rigs mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes pa 'di lta kho na nges par gzung bar bya'i yod pa kho na zhes nges par gzung na ni /
analyzed: de la yang gdon mi za bar rigs mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes pa 'di lta kho na nges par gzung bar bya'i yod pa kho na zhes nges par gzung na ni /
translated: In this regard, it is definitely to be understood that the expression ‚Äúexists only as a homogeneous cause‚Äù is to be understood as ‚Äúexists only as a homogeneous cause,‚Äù

original: rnam gnyis kyang zhes pa 'di nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam gnyis kyang zhes pa 'di nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the expression ‚Äúin two ways‚Äù would be contradicted.

original: 'dis ni gang 'dra ba'i gtan tshigs kyi lhag ma dpes gsal bar bya ba de bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni gang 'dra ba'i gtan tshigs kyi lhag ma dpes gsal bar bya ba de bstan to //
translated: This shows that the remainder of the reason is to be illustrated by an example.

original: gal te yang gang mi rtag pa de rtsol ba las byung ba'o zhes gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba bshad par bya na /
analyzed: gal te yang gang mi rtag pa de rtsol ba las byung ba'o zhes gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba bshad par bya na /
translated: If it is to be explained that the reason is ‚Äúwhatever is impermanent is produced by effort,‚Äù

original: de ltar 'gyur na rigs mthun pa la yod pa kho na zhes bstan par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur na rigs mthun pa la yod pa kho na zhes bstan par 'gyur gyi /
translated: then it would be taught that ‚Äúexists only as a homogeneous cause,‚Äù

original: rigs mthun pa yin la yod pa zhes ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs mthun pa yin la yod pa zhes ni ma yin te /
translated: but it would not be taught that ‚Äúis a homogeneous cause and exists,‚Äù

original: mthun phyogs la khyab par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthun phyogs la khyab par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be taught to pervade the similar class.

original: de las kyang gtan tshigs lhag ma bstan par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de las kyang gtan tshigs lhag ma bstan par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: And it would not be taught that the remainder of the reason is the remainder of the reason.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs lhag ma ston pas gdon mi za bar bsgrub par bya ba kho nas gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs lhag ma ston pas gdon mi za bar bsgrub par bya ba kho nas gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba bstan par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the point of teaching the remaining logical reasons is that the pervasion of the logical reason by the probandum must be stated without fail.

original: de ci ltar 'thob ce na /
analyzed: de ci ltar 'thob ce na /
translated: How is that obtained?

original: gal te gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba dgag par byed na'o //
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba dgag par byed na'o //
translated: If the pervasion of the logical reason by the probandum is refuted.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs lhag ma rab tu bstan pa ni don te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs lhag ma rab tu bstan pa ni don te /
translated: Therefore, the point of teaching the remaining logical reasons is

original: gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba dgag pa la'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba dgag pa la'o //
translated: to refute the pervasion of the logical reason by the probandum.

original: 'o na gtan @218b tshigs lhag ma'i mtshan nyid kyi bsgrub pa kho na las ji 'dra ba'i ngag gis gtan tshigs lhag ma bstan par nus pa de bstan pa kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na gtan @218b tshigs lhag ma'i mtshan nyid kyi bsgrub pa kho na las ji 'dra ba'i ngag gis gtan tshigs lhag ma bstan par nus pa de bstan pa kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: Well then, in a proof by the remaining logical reason, the remaining logical reason can be stated by a statement that is just like the statement that is taught.

original: rnam pa gzhan du brjod na gtan tshigs lhag ma gsal bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du brjod na gtan tshigs lhag ma gsal bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For if it is stated in another way, it does not clarify the remaining logical reason.

original: gang rnams don gang ji lta ba bzhin shes pa'i ngag shes pa de rnams ni de rtogs pa la slar yang nye bar bstan pa gzhan la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang rnams don gang ji lta ba bzhin shes pa'i ngag shes pa de rnams ni de rtogs pa la slar yang nye bar bstan pa gzhan la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: Those who know the meaning of a statement just as it is do not rely on another teaching in order to understand it.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni dgos pa med pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni dgos pa med pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore, this is indeed pointless.

original: rtsom pa 'di ni byis pas rtogs pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: rtsom pa 'di ni byis pas rtogs pa'i don du ste /
translated: This composition is for the sake of understanding by the childish.

original: dngos po ji lta ba bzhin rtogs kyang rnam pa gzhan du brjod pa mthong ngo zhes lan brjod zin to //
analyzed: dngos po ji lta ba bzhin rtogs kyang rnam pa gzhan du brjod pa mthong ngo zhes lan brjod zin to //
translated: We have already responded to the objection that although things are understood just as they are, they are seen to be expressed in another way.

original: gal te de lta na rigs mthun pa la yod pa zhes pa 'dir rigs mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes nges par gzung par bya ba de ltar gyur na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na rigs mthun pa la yod pa zhes pa 'dir rigs mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes nges par gzung par bya ba de ltar gyur na /
translated: If that is so, then here in the statement ‚Äúexisting in a similar type,‚Äù one should ascertain that ‚Äúexisting in a similar type‚Äù alone is being referred to.

original: 'di kho nas mi mthun phyogs gtan tshigs med pa nyid du rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'di kho nas mi mthun phyogs gtan tshigs med pa nyid du rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: If that were the case, then since the mere absence of a reason that is discordant with it is understood by this alone,

original: de med pa la med pa zhes pa 'di brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de med pa la med pa zhes pa 'di brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: it is not necessary to state ‚Äúabsence where it does not exist.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: de lta na rigs mthun pa kho na la yod ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na rigs mthun pa kho na la yod ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In that case, it is said to exist only in similar instances.

original: de ltar na zhes pa de'i tshe zhes pa'i don can gyi tshig phrad de /
analyzed: de ltar na zhes pa de'i tshe zhes pa'i don can gyi tshig phrad de /
translated: ‚Äú In that case‚Äù means ‚Äúat that time.‚Äù This is a conjunction.

original: 'di ni byi brag tu ma bshad pa'i sgra gzhan kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byi brag tu ma bshad pa'i sgra gzhan kho na'o //
translated: This is a different word that is not explained in the Amarako≈õa.

original: de ltar ni mi bzod pa la sogs pa rnams la yang rab tu spyor bas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni mi bzod pa la sogs pa rnams la yang rab tu spyor bas so //
translated: In that case, it is also applied to those that are not accepted and so on.

original: rigs mi mthun gyi sgra ni 'dir gzhan pa dang 'gal pa'i mi mthun phyogs dag la 'jug go //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun gyi sgra ni 'dir gzhan pa dang 'gal pa'i mi mthun phyogs dag la 'jug go //
translated: The word ‚Äúdissimilar‚Äù here refers to the other and the discordant class.

original: de'i phyir 'dir don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir don 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the meaning here.

original: gang gi tshe rigs mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes nges par gzung ba de'i tshe mi mthun phyogs rnam pa gsum ka la yang gtan tshigs dgag pa thob pa la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rigs mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes nges par gzung ba de'i tshe mi mthun phyogs rnam pa gsum ka la yang gtan tshigs dgag pa thob pa la /
translated: When it is ascertained that it exists only in similar instances, then at that time, the refutation of the reason is obtained in all three discordant classes.

original: de dag bral ba la med pa zhes pa 'di brjod par mi bya ba kho na bden te /
analyzed: de dag bral ba la med pa zhes pa 'di brjod par mi bya ba kho na bden te /
translated: It is not correct to say that it does not exist in the absence of those.

original: gang 'dis bya ba de gzhan kho na las thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gang 'dis bya ba de gzhan kho na las thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because that which is to be accomplished is obtained from another alone.

original: brjod pa yang yin te /
analyzed: brjod pa yang yin te /
translated: It is also stated.

original: de 'di sbyor ba'i don du 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de 'di sbyor ba'i don du 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the application.

original: nges pa'i sgras ni 'dir sbyor ba kho na brjod par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: nges pa'i sgras ni 'dir sbyor ba kho na brjod par 'dod pa ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúniyama‚Äù here is intended to express application.

original: 'di'i blo nges par byed ces byas nas so zhes bshad do //üîΩde ltar 'gyur mod rigs mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes pa 'di las rigs mi mthun pa la yang dgag pa thob cing /
analyzed: 'di'i blo nges par byed ces byas nas so zhes bshad do // de ltar 'gyur mod rigs mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes pa 'di las rigs mi mthun pa la yang dgag pa thob cing /
translated: It is explained as ‚Äúmaking the mind certain with regard to this.‚Äù

original: de lta na yang mthun @219a * //
analyzed: de lta na yang mthun @219a * //
translated: Although this is so, from the phrase ‚Äúonly in that which is of a similar type‚Äù a negation is also obtained with regard to that which is of a dissimilar type.

original: phyogs la yang dgag pa byas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyogs la yang dgag pa byas par 'gyur te /
translated: Even though this is so, a negation is also made with regard to the similar class.

original: de ltar ni mthun phyogs kyang bsgrub bya'i chos las gzhan pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gzhan du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de ltar ni mthun phyogs kyang bsgrub bya'i chos las gzhan pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gzhan du 'gyur la /
translated: In this way, the similar class is also different from the predicate of the probandum because it is a property that is different from it.üîΩSince the reason is applied to that, there would be no certainty.

original: de la gtan tshigs 'jug go zhes pas ma nges par 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la gtan tshigs 'jug go zhes pas ma nges par 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: de dang bral ba kho na la med pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de dang bral ba kho na la med pa yin gyi /
translated: It is only in that which is devoid of it that it is nonexistent.

original: rigs mi mthun pa bdag la sogs pa med pa la ma yin zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa bdag la sogs pa med pa la ma yin zhes pa ste /
translated: It is not in the case of the nonexistent self and so on, which are of a dissimilar type.

original: de dang bral ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs can med pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de dang bral ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs can med pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúabsence of the existent‚Äù is the absence of the object to be established.

original: de dang bral ba'i mnyan pas kyang gzhan pa dang 'gal ba dag kyang gzung ngo //
analyzed: de dang bral ba'i mnyan pas kyang gzhan pa dang 'gal ba dag kyang gzung ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúabsence‚Äù also includes the other, i.e., the contradictory.

original: yang ci ltar na yod pa kho na med par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na yod pa kho na med par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How can the existent be the nonexistent?

original: de'i rnam pas dben pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rnam pas dben pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because of the absence of that form.

original: rigs mi mthun pa yang 'dir de dang bral ba'i skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir de la ltos pa kho nas rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa yang 'dir de dang bral ba'i skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir de la ltos pa kho nas rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the dissimilar class is also the occasion of the absence of that, it should be understood only in relation to that.

original: bdag la sogs pa med pa ye shes pa 'dis de dang rigs mi mthun pa'i dngos po ston to //üîΩ'di la bdag la sogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes pas /
analyzed: bdag la sogs pa med pa ye shes pa 'dis de dang rigs mi mthun pa'i dngos po ston to // 'di la bdag la sogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes pas /
translated: The word ‚Äúabsence‚Äù indicates the thing that is dissimilar to that.

original: bdag la sogs pa med pa ste //
analyzed: bdag la sogs pa med pa ste //
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúabsence‚Äù means the absence of self, etc.

original: mi rtag pa'i dngos po brjod do //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i dngos po brjod do //
translated: The word ‚Äúabsence‚Äù indicates the impermanent thing.

original: des 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: sngar bshad pa'i mi mthun phyogs rnam pa gsum kho na la med pa ste /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i mi mthun phyogs rnam pa gsum kho na la med pa ste /
translated: The absence of the three kinds of counteragents, as previously explained.

original: de dang rigs mi mthun pa'i mthun phyogs la ni ma yin no zhes pas /
analyzed: de dang rigs mi mthun pa'i mthun phyogs la ni ma yin no zhes pas /
translated: But not in the case of a similar instance that is dissimilar.

original: mthun phyogs kho na mi mthun phyogs su 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mthun phyogs kho na mi mthun phyogs su 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Thus, a similar instance is not necessarily a dissimilar instance.

original: chos gzhan dang ldan yang dngos por na tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos gzhan dang ldan yang dngos por na tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not different from the entity that possesses the other property.

original: chos gzhan dang ldan pa las gzhan nyid kyang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: chos gzhan dang ldan pa las gzhan nyid kyang ma yin gyi /
translated: Nor is it different from that which possesses the other property.

original: 'on kyang brjod par 'dod pa'i chos mi rten pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang brjod par 'dod pa'i chos mi rten pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: But rather, because the property that is intended to be expressed does not depend on it. This is the intended meaning.

original: de bzhin du 'di yang zhes pa brjod ma thag pa'i don chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid la bsgres nas ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di yang zhes pa brjod ma thag pa'i don chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid la bsgres nas ston to //
translated: In the same way, this also is taught by applying the meaning of the immediately preceding statement to the definition of an example of dissimilarity.

original: 'dir yang bsgrub par bya ba med pa zhes pa 'dis gzhan pa dang 'gal ba dag gi mi mthun phyogs dag kyang gzung ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang bsgrub par bya ba med pa zhes pa 'dis gzhan pa dang 'gal ba dag gi mi mthun phyogs dag kyang gzung ste /
translated: Here, the absence of the probandum is also included in the dissimilar instances of the other and the contradictory.

original: med pa nyid ni snga ma bzhin du de dag gi rigs mi mthun pa nyid de /
analyzed: med pa nyid ni snga ma bzhin du de dag gi rigs mi mthun pa nyid de /
translated: Because the absence is the dissimilar instance of those, as before.

original: 'dir yang bsgrub bya med pa skabs nyid yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: 'dir yang bsgrub bya med pa skabs nyid yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: Here, the absence of the probandum is the very context.

original: de la ltos par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la ltos par blta bar bya'o //
translated: It should be seen to be dependent on that.

original: nges na don 'dir 'gyur te /
analyzed: nges na don 'dir 'gyur te /
translated: If it is definite, this is the meaning:

original: 'dir yang dpe la ji ltar srid pa bzhin du mi mthun phyogs rnam pa gsum la med pa nyid bshad @219b par bya'o /
analyzed: 'dir yang dpe la ji ltar srid pa bzhin du mi mthun phyogs rnam pa gsum la med pa nyid bshad @219b par bya'o /
translated: Here, just as in the example, the non-existence in the three types of counter-correlate should be explained.

original: de dang rigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de dang rigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not in the counter-correlate that is not of the same type.

original: de kho na chos gzhan dang ldan pas gzhan nyid na ma yin te /
analyzed: de kho na chos gzhan dang ldan pas gzhan nyid na ma yin te /
translated: It is not due to having another property that is the same.

original: de'i phyir der chos gzhan dang ldan pa la yang 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs ni ma nges pa nyid du dogs par bya ba ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o /
analyzed: de'i phyir der chos gzhan dang ldan pa la yang 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs ni ma nges pa nyid du dogs par bya ba ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o /
translated: Therefore, it is thought that even in that case, the reason for engaging in having another property is not to be suspected of being indefinite.

original: ji ltar de dang bral ba la med pa zhes pa 'di sbyor ba'i don yin pa de bzhin du bsgrub bya med pa la yang med pa nyid ces pa 'di yang sbyor ba'i don no zhes pa 'di 'dir yang spyar nas ston par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar de dang bral ba la med pa zhes pa 'di sbyor ba'i don yin pa de bzhin du bsgrub bya med pa la yang med pa nyid ces pa 'di yang sbyor ba'i don no zhes pa 'di 'dir yang spyar nas ston par rig par bya'o //
translated: Just as this non-existence in what is devoid of that is the meaning of the application, in the same way, this non-existence in the absence of the probandum is also the meaning of the application. This should be understood to be shown by extension here as well.

original: de ltar gyur na 'dod pa grub pa cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na 'dod pa grub pa cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If that is the case, what is accomplished by the assertion? It is said:

original: rigs mi mthun pa la ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa la ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen there is no concomitance with the dissimilar‚Äù and so on.

original: bsgrub bya la rjes su 'gro ba yod na zhes pa 'dis ni rnam pa gang gis 'dir rigs mi mthun par 'dod pa de ston te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya la rjes su 'gro ba yod na zhes pa 'dis ni rnam pa gang gis 'dir rigs mi mthun par 'dod pa de ston te /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen there is concomitance with the probandum‚Äù shows the aspect by which it is held to be dissimilar here.

original: bsgrub par bya bas rjes su 'gro ba'i gtan tshigs kyi rigs mi mthun na zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya bas rjes su 'gro ba'i gtan tshigs kyi rigs mi mthun na zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: when the reason is not concomitant with the probandum.

original: don du mi sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs du ma'o //
analyzed: don du mi sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs du ma'o //
translated: Because it does not establish the meaning, it is a fallacious reason.

original: de rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i rjes su 'gro bar gyur pa na gang rang gi bsgrub par bya ba med pa dang rigs mi mthun pa de la /
analyzed: de rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i rjes su 'gro bar gyur pa na gang rang gi bsgrub par bya ba med pa dang rigs mi mthun pa de la /
translated: When it becomes concomitant with its probandum, then that which is not concomitant with its probandum

original: chos gzhan dang ldan na yang sgrub byed du byas pa na /
analyzed: chos gzhan dang ldan na yang sgrub byed du byas pa na /
translated: is a reason that is contradictory, as when another property is attributed to it.

original: gang bsgrub par 'dod ba de dang 'gal ba la 'jug pa 'dus pa nyid la sogs pa 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs su bshad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gang bsgrub par 'dod ba de dang 'gal ba la 'jug pa 'dus pa nyid la sogs pa 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs su bshad pa kho na'o //
translated: When that which is intended to be established is contradictory, it is explained as a contradictory reason, such as ‚Äúbecause of being an aggregate.‚Äù

original: sgrub byed du byas pa nyid ni gang sgrub par 'dod pa de dang mi 'gal ba chos gzhan dang ldan pa las mi 'gal na chos gzhan dang ldan pa la yang 'jug pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa mi 'gal pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du bshad pa kho
analyzed: sgrub byed du byas pa nyid ni gang sgrub par 'dod pa de dang mi 'gal ba chos gzhan dang ldan pa las mi 'gal na chos gzhan dang ldan pa la yang 'jug pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa mi 'gal pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du bshad pa kho
translated: The very thing that is the probandum is the reason, because it is not contradictory to that which is to be proven, and because it is not contradictory to the other property that is possessed.

original: na ste le'u gsum pa'o /
analyzed: na ste le'u gsum pa'o /
translated: The third chapter explains that the very thing that is the probandum is the reason, because it is not contradictory to the other property that is possessed.

original: // / yang ci ltar na gang las bsgrub par bya ba med par rigs mi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ba gang la 'gal bar 'jug pa de bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: // / yang ci ltar na gang las bsgrub par bya ba med par rigs mi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ba gang la 'gal bar 'jug pa de bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how is it that the reason that engages in contradiction with respect to that which is to be proven is the pervasion of the probandum?

original: gal te 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs kyi dngos por na bsgrub par bya ba des rjes su 'gro bar gyur na rigs mi mthun pa la ste /
analyzed: gal te 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs kyi dngos por na bsgrub par bya ba des rjes su 'gro bar gyur na rigs mi mthun pa la ste /
translated: If the reason that engages in contradiction were to be the entity of the probandum, then it would be the pervasion of the probandum.

original: gang rgol bas bsgrub par 'dod pa nges ni ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gang rgol bas bsgrub par 'dod pa nges ni ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: However, the opponent does not assert that which is to be proven.

original: 'di ni bsdus pa'i don te /
analyzed: 'di ni bsdus pa'i don te /
translated: This is the summarized meaning.

original: gal te chos gzhan dang ldan pa la gang 'jug pa de ma nges pa nyid @220a * //
analyzed: gal te chos gzhan dang ldan pa la gang 'jug pa de ma nges pa nyid @220a * //
translated: If that which engages in the other property is not ascertained, then it is not the reason.

original: du 'dod na /
analyzed: du 'dod na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de'i phyir 'ga' zhig kyang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba ma yin zhing 'gal bar yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'ga' zhig kyang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba ma yin zhing 'gal bar yang ma yin gyi /
translated: it is because nothing is a logical reason, nor is there a contradiction.

original: thams cad ma nges pa kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad ma nges pa kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: But everything is only indeterminate,

original: dngos po thams cad chos gzhan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad chos gzhan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all things are endowed with other properties.

original: de'i phyir gang gi mi mthun phyogs thams cad las ldog pa de chos gzhan dang ldan yang ma thun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rgyu kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gi mi mthun phyogs thams cad las ldog pa de chos gzhan dang ldan yang ma thun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rgyu kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, that which is the opposite of all discordant properties, even though endowed with other properties, is only the cause of correct knowledge when it occurs in the property-possessor that is the similar instance.

original: gang mthun phyogs thams cad la ldog pa de chos gzhan dang ldan na yang mi mthun phyogs la 'jug pa ni 'gal ba nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: gang mthun phyogs thams cad la ldog pa de chos gzhan dang ldan na yang mi mthun phyogs la 'jug pa ni 'gal ba nyid kho na'o //
translated: That which is the opposite of all similar properties, even though endowed with other properties, is only contradictory when it occurs in the discordant instance.

original: gang mthun phyogs la 'jug cing mi mthun phyogs la 'jug pa'am der dogs pa de ni ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang mthun phyogs la 'jug cing mi mthun phyogs la 'jug pa'am der dogs pa de ni ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: That which occurs in the similar instance and occurs in the discordant instance or is suspected of doing so is only indeterminate.

original: des sel pa'i ched du de dang bral ba la med pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: des sel pa'i ched du de dang bral ba la med pa zhes pa ste /
translated: In order to eliminate that, it is said that ‚Äúit does not exist in the absence of that.‚Äù

original: 'dis mi mthun phyogs la gtan tshigs med pa nyid kho na brjod par bya'i chos gzhan dang ldan pa'i mthun phyogs la yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dis mi mthun phyogs la gtan tshigs med pa nyid kho na brjod par bya'i chos gzhan dang ldan pa'i mthun phyogs la yang ma yin no //
translated: This is saying that the reason is nonexistent in the discordant side alone, but not in the similar instance that possesses another property.

original: tshul gsum pa gsal bar byed pa'i don du chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'o zhes pa de la'ang bsgrub bya med pa kho na la gtan tshigs med pa bshad par bya'i mthun phyogs nyid chos gzhan dang ldan pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa gsal bar byed pa'i don du chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'o zhes pa de la'ang bsgrub bya med pa kho na la gtan tshigs med pa bshad par bya'i mthun phyogs nyid chos gzhan dang ldan pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: The example of the dissimilar instance is for the purpose of clarifying the trimodal condition. This is saying that the reason is nonexistent in the mere absence of the property to be proven, but not in the similar instance that possesses another property.

original: 'gal ba nyid du bshad pa kho na'o zhes pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: 'gal ba nyid du bshad pa kho na'o zhes pa'i tshig ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù explains that the reason is contradictory.

original: 'di la yang mi mthun phyogs ni chos gzhan 'gal ba med pa shes bya nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir na mi mthun phyogs las gzhan te /
analyzed: 'di la yang mi mthun phyogs ni chos gzhan 'gal ba med pa shes bya nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir na mi mthun phyogs las gzhan te /
translated: Here, the discordant side is different from the discordant side because it possesses another property that is not contradictory, such as being an object of knowledge.

original: de las kyang mi mthun phyogs las cig shos la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs kyang ma nges par 'gyur zhes pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa bsal pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de las kyang mi mthun phyogs las cig shos la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs kyang ma nges par 'gyur zhes pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa bsal pa'i don du'o //
translated: Moreover, since the other is engaged in the opposite of that, the reason of contradiction would also be inconclusive. This is stated in order to dispel the false notion.

original: de ltar gyur na gzhan du yang gang la ma nges pa nyid brjod pa de la yang 'di lta kho nar ma nges pa nyid du blta bar bya'o zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na gzhan du yang gang la ma nges pa nyid brjod pa de la yang 'di lta kho nar ma nges pa nyid du blta bar bya'o zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: If that is the case, then in other cases as well, where there is mere expression of inconclusiveness, there too one should see it just as it is stated here. This is what is taught by the statement:

original: gang la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn any case, etc.‚Äù

original: thun mong ba'i khyad par nyid dang 'gal ba nyid kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid dag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thun mong ba'i khyad par nyid dang 'gal ba nyid kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid dag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The common characteristic itself and the contradiction would also become the proof.

original: re re gnyis su ma brjod pa la dper brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: re re gnyis su ma brjod pa la dper brjod par bya ste /
translated: An example is given for each of the two not being stated:

original: de'i phyir gnyis zhes 'di la 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyis zhes 'di la 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, ‚Äútwo‚Äù is explained here.

original: lus can ma yin pa'i zhes smos pa ni gtan tshigs nye bar mtshon pa'i don to //
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa'i zhes smos pa ni gtan tshigs nye bar mtshon pa'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúnon-embodied‚Äù is for the purpose of illustrating the reason.

original: gang gi phyir lus can ma yin pa kho na'i dbang @220b du byas nas chos mthun pa nyid tsam brjod pa na ma nges pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir lus can ma yin pa kho na'i dbang @220b du byas nas chos mthun pa nyid tsam brjod pa na ma nges pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Because when mere similarity of property is stated with respect to only the nonembodiment, it would follow that there would be no ascertainment.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: gtan tshigs thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs thams cad kyi'o //
translated: It is the reason of all.

original: 'di ltar yang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang /
translated: In this way,

original: de rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la ma nges pa nyid du mngon bar 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thal bar 'gyur ba ni mi 'dod pa 'bebs pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid kyi phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: de rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la ma nges pa nyid du mngon bar 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thal bar 'gyur ba ni mi 'dod pa 'bebs pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid kyi phyir yang ngo //
translated: because it is clearly desired that the reason be ascertained in the proof of permanence, and because the consequence has the characteristic of bringing about the undesirable,

original: rtag pa med pa la zhes pa 'di yang bsgrub bya med pa nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: rtag pa med pa la zhes pa 'di yang bsgrub bya med pa nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: this ‚Äúnonexistence of permanence‚Äù also illustrates the nonexistence of the probandum.

original: bsgrub bya thams cad med pa la gtan tshigs yod par gyur pa'i phyir na ma nges pa brtsad par mngon bar 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya thams cad med pa la gtan tshigs yod par gyur pa'i phyir na ma nges pa brtsad par mngon bar 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason exists in the nonexistence of all probandums, it is clearly desired that the reason be ascertained.

original: yod pa'i phyir zhes pa 'dis kyang yul gyi yul can la dogs pa bstan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yod pa'i phyir zhes pa 'dis kyang yul gyi yul can la dogs pa bstan par rig par bya'o //
translated: And by this ‚Äúbecause of existence,‚Äù one should understand that the object of the object is shown to be doubted.

original: de ltar ni de nyid du 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar ni de nyid du 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: This will be explained in the treatise itself.

original: gal te chos mthun pa nyid cam gyis brjod par bya na /
analyzed: gal te chos mthun pa nyid cam gyis brjod par bya na /
translated: If one were to state the mere similarity of attributes,

original: de las bsgrub bya la med na yang 'gyur ro zhes gtan tshigs thun mong ba nyid du dogs par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de las bsgrub bya la med na yang 'gyur ro zhes gtan tshigs thun mong ba nyid du dogs par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: then there would be the doubt that the reason is common to the dissimilar instances, since it would exist there even though the probandum does not.

original: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: de la yang chos mthun pa nyid tsam brjod pa na bsgrub bya med pa la gtan tshigs yod par dogs pas ma nges pa'o zhes bstan par bya'i /
analyzed: de la yang chos mthun pa nyid tsam brjod pa na bsgrub bya med pa la gtan tshigs yod par dogs pas ma nges pa'o zhes bstan par bya'i /
translated: When one states the mere similarity of attributes, there is the doubt that the reason exists where the probandum is absent, so it is taught that it is not ascertained.

original: gzhan pa'am 'gal ba la yod pa zhes pas ma nges pa zhes pa ni bstan par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan pa'am 'gal ba la yod pa zhes pas ma nges pa zhes pa ni bstan par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: But it is not taught that it is not ascertained because it exists in other or discordant instances.

original: chos gzhan dang ldan na yang zhes pa dgongs ba'o //
analyzed: chos gzhan dang ldan na yang zhes pa dgongs ba'o //
translated: The thought is that it exists even when possessing other attributes.

original: 'dir yang bsgrub par bya ba med pa skabs su bab pa nyid kyi phyir de la ltos pas don gzhan pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang bsgrub par bya ba med pa skabs su bab pa nyid kyi phyir de la ltos pas don gzhan pa shes par bya ste /
translated: Here, since the absence of the probandum is the relevant point, it is understood that the reason is different in meaning because it depends on that.

original: 'gal ba ni gang rgol bas bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod pa de la ltos pas so //
analyzed: 'gal ba ni gang rgol bas bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod pa de la ltos pas so //
translated: Contradiction is in relation to what the opponent accepts as the thesis.

original: 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na /
translated: Why is this?

original: tha dad du nye bar len pa'i shugs las so //üîΩgal te 'gal ba yang bsgrub par bya ba med pa la ltos pas brjod par 'dod par gyur na ni /
analyzed: tha dad du nye bar len pa'i shugs las so // gal te 'gal ba yang bsgrub par bya ba med pa la ltos pas brjod par 'dod par gyur na ni /
translated: It is implied by the fact that they are different.üîΩIf contradiction were also in relation to the absence of the thesis, then it would be sufficient to say, ‚ÄúIt is not the case that it is not.‚ÄùüîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.

original: gzhan pa la ma yin zhes pa 'di tsam brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan pa la ma yin zhes pa 'di tsam brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.

original: de ltar ni bsgrub par bya ba med pa las gzhan ni bsgrub bya yod pa ste /üîΩde yang bsgrub bya med pa dang 'gal ba kho na'o //
analyzed: de ltar ni bsgrub par bya ba med pa las gzhan ni bsgrub bya yod pa ste / de yang bsgrub bya med pa dang 'gal ba kho na'o //
translated: In that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.

original: de las kyang gzhan pa la ma yin zhes pa 'di kho nas 'gal ba la zhes pa 'dis rtogs par bya ba'i don rtogs zin pa nyid kyi phyir /üîΩ'di brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de las kyang gzhan pa la ma yin zhes pa 'di kho nas 'gal ba la zhes pa 'dis rtogs par bya ba'i don rtogs zin pa nyid kyi phyir / 'di brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur na /
translated: In that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.

original: brjod pa yang yin te /üîΩde'i bsgrub bya la ltos pas @221a * //
analyzed: brjod pa yang yin te / de'i bsgrub bya la ltos pas @221a * //
translated: In that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.

original: 'gal bar rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gal bar rigs par bya'o //
translated: In that case, ‚Äúit is not the case that it is not‚Äù would be sufficient to express contradiction.üîΩIn that case, ‚Äúit is not the case

original: 'dir pha rol gyi yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rgyu nyid du mngon par ma bsams pa la ma nges pa nyid du brjod par bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'dir pha rol gyi yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rgyu nyid du mngon par ma bsams pa la ma nges pa nyid du brjod par bya ba'am /
translated: Here, it should be said that the reason is indeterminate because it is not considered to be the cause of the other's right knowledge.

original: yang na 'gal ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: yang na 'gal ba nyid du'o //
translated: Or, it is contradictory.

original: de la rtogs pa snga ma la //
analyzed: de la rtogs pa snga ma la //
translated: Regarding the former understanding,

original: bsgrub bya med pa las gzhan bsgrub bya yod pa chos gzhan dang ldan pa la yang yod par gyur pa zhes ma nges pa nyid du rab tu bstan par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya med pa las gzhan bsgrub bya yod pa chos gzhan dang ldan pa la yang yod par gyur pa zhes ma nges pa nyid du rab tu bstan par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not to be taught that the presence of the probandum in something other than the absence of the probandum is indeterminate.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: bsgrub bya med pa la yang yod par gyur pa las sam der dogs pas so //
analyzed: bsgrub bya med pa la yang yod par gyur pa las sam der dogs pas so //
translated: It is because of the presence of the probandum in the absence of the probandum, or because of the suspicion of that.

original: gnyis pa la ni bsgrub bya dang 'gal ba chos gzhan dang ldan pa la yang yod par gyur ba zhes ma nges pa nyid du bstan par bya ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gnyis pa la ni bsgrub bya dang 'gal ba chos gzhan dang ldan pa la yang yod par gyur ba zhes ma nges pa nyid du bstan par bya ma yin gyi /
translated: In the second case, it is not to be taught that the presence of the probandum in something other than the contradictory property is indeterminate.

original: 'on kyang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs kyi gang bsgrub par bya ba de med pa la yang yod pa las sam /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs kyi gang bsgrub par bya ba de med pa la yang yod pa las sam /
translated: However, it is because of the presence of the contradictory reason in the absence of the probandum,

original: der dogs pas so //
analyzed: der dogs pas so //
translated: or because of the suspicion of that.

original: de ltar byas nas zhes pa /
analyzed: de ltar byas nas zhes pa /
translated: Having done that,

original: gang gi phyir bsgrub bya me dpa la gtan tshigs med pa nyid nye bar ma bstan pa na ma nges pa nyid du dogs kyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgrub bya me dpa la gtan tshigs med pa nyid nye bar ma bstan pa na ma nges pa nyid du dogs kyi /
translated: Because when the reason is not shown to be nonexistent in relation to the probandum, there is doubt about its being inconclusive.

original: chos gzhan dang ldan pa la yang phyogs dang mthun phyogs kho na la 'jug pa'i ni ma yin pa de'i phyir rtag pa ni rtsol ba las ma byung ba'o zhes pa chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi sbyor ba 'dis mi rtag pa med pa la gtan tshigs medüîΩpa rab tu bstan par bya'i /
analyzed: chos gzhan dang ldan pa la yang phyogs dang mthun phyogs kho na la 'jug pa'i ni ma yin pa de'i phyir rtag pa ni rtsol ba las ma byung ba'o zhes pa chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi sbyor ba 'dis mi rtag pa med pa la gtan tshigs med pa rab tu bstan par bya'i /
translated: But when it is endowed with another property, it is not in the similar instance alone. Therefore, this application of the dissimilar property, ‚ÄúThe permanent is not produced by effort,‚Äù should be taught to show that there is no reason for nonimpermanence.

original: mi rtag pa kho na chos gzhan dang ldan pa la ni ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa kho na chos gzhan dang ldan pa la ni ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: But it is not that impermanence alone is endowed with another property. This is the intended meaning.

original: yang ci ltar na de bstan par nus she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na de bstan par nus she na gsungs pa /
translated: Again, how can that be shown? It is said:

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúArising immediately upon exertion‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid dang rjes su 'brel pa de'i phyir de ldog pas de ldog par bstan par nus so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid dang rjes su 'brel pa de'i phyir de ldog pas de ldog par bstan par nus so //
translated: Because arising immediately upon exertion is related to impermanence, by negating that, it can be shown that that is negated.

original: sngar gzhan pa dang 'gal ba dag mi mthun phyogs nyid du brjod cing /
analyzed: sngar gzhan pa dang 'gal ba dag mi mthun phyogs nyid du brjod cing /
translated: Previously, the other and contradictory were stated to be the discordant class.

original: de'i phyir yang de la yang gtan tshigs med pa rab tu bstan par bya /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang de la yang gtan tshigs med pa rab tu bstan par bya /
translated: Therefore, it is also taught that there is no reason for that.

original: mi rtag pa las kyang rtag pa ni gzhan nyid dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa las kyang rtag pa ni gzhan nyid dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, from the impermanent, the permanent would be contradictory to otherness.

original: de las kyang mdo sde ba'i chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las kyang mdo sde ba'i chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe med par 'gyur te /
translated: Also, from that, the SautrƒÅntika‚Äôs discordant class would be without an example,üîΩbecause a permanent thing is not asserted.

original: dngos po rtag pa mi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dogs par byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: dngos po rtag pa mi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dogs par byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: Fearing that, it is said:

original: rtag pa med pa la ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rtag pa med pa la ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not for the non-existent permanent.‚Äù

original: 'di skad ston te mi mthun phyogs rnam pa gsum la @221b gang srid pa de la gtan tshigs med pa rab tu bstan par bya'o /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te mi mthun phyogs rnam pa gsum la @221b gang srid pa de la gtan tshigs med pa rab tu bstan par bya'o /
translated: This is taught: ‚ÄúThat which is possible for the three types of discordant classes should be taught to be without a reason.

original: cig shos la ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: cig shos la ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not for the other.‚Äù

original: yang ci'i phyir bzlog pa bstan par bya ba ma yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir bzlog pa bstan par bya ba ma yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Again, why is the opposite not to be taught? It is said:

original: ma gyur cig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma gyur cig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMay it not be so,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'jig rten pa yang spyir bzhin du bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi mi mthun phyogs dag lhan cig yod pa ston pa na rtag pa nyid kyis dam ma bcas pa'i byas ba nyid bsgrubs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa yang spyir bzhin du bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi mi mthun phyogs dag lhan cig yod pa ston pa na rtag pa nyid kyis dam ma bcas pa'i byas ba nyid bsgrubs par 'gyur ro //
translated: And in the case of a worldly example, when the presence of the discordant factors of the probandum and the probans are shown, then permanence would establish the probandum, produced.

original: de lta na 'o na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: In that case, etc.

original: gal te 'di dpe'i mtshan nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'di dpe'i mtshan nyid yin na /
translated: If this is the definition of an example,

original: de lta na 'o na 'gal ba dang ma nges pa'i gnyen por gnyis ka yang brjod par bya'o zhes ba brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na 'gal ba dang ma nges pa'i gnyen por gnyis ka yang brjod par bya'o zhes ba brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: then in that case, both the contradictory and the indefinite should be stated as the antidote.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: smras pa mi 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: smras pa mi 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said, No, etc.

original: gang gi tshe re zhig chos mthun pa nyid kyis khyab ba bstan par bya ba de'i tshe 'gal ba dang thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid dogs par mi srid pa kho na yin zhing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe re zhig chos mthun pa nyid kyis khyab ba bstan par bya ba de'i tshe 'gal ba dang thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid dogs par mi srid pa kho na yin zhing /
translated: When at times the pervasion by the similar instance is shown, then it is not possible that there is the doubt of the contradictory and the uncommon.

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba med pa kho na gtan tshigs med par brjod pa na thun mong ma yin pa nyid dogs pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba ci zhig / gal te rigs mthun pa la'ang 'gyur ba ma yin na ni /
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba med pa kho na gtan tshigs med par brjod pa na thun mong ma yin pa nyid dogs pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba ci zhig / gal te rigs mthun pa la'ang 'gyur ba ma yin na ni /
translated: By the dissimilar instance, when the reason is stated in the absence of the probandum, then the absence of the reason in the dissimilar instance is the uncommon reason.

original: bsgrub bya med pa kho na la med do zhes pa 'dir mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya med pa kho na la med do zhes pa 'dir mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so in the similar instance, then it would not be so in the absence of the probandum.

original: 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba zhes pa de la ni mthun phyogs la gtan tshigs yod par gyur pa cam kho na rab tu ston te chos mthun pa nyid kyis khyab pa mngon bar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba zhes pa de la ni mthun phyogs la gtan tshigs yod par gyur pa cam kho na rab tu ston te chos mthun pa nyid kyis khyab pa mngon bar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the worldly syllogism. In it, the mere presence of the reason in the similar instance is taught, because the pervasion is stated by the similar instance.

original: de'i phyir thun mong ba dogs pa srid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir thun mong ba dogs pa srid do //
translated: Therefore, the common reason is possible.

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis kyang bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi mi mthun phyogs dag gi yod par gyur ba tsam bstan par bya ba de'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa nyid dogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis kyang bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi mi mthun phyogs dag gi yod par gyur ba tsam bstan par bya ba de'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa nyid dogs pa'o //
translated: By the dissimilar instance, the mere presence of the probandum and the reason in the dissimilar instance is taught. Therefore, the uncommon reason is possible.

original: mtshan nyid ma yin zhes pa /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ma yin zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúNot a definition‚Äù means:

original: ji ltar dpe dag gi mtshan nyid de ltar re re brjod pa na yang ji skad bshad pa'i skyon du mi thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar dpe dag gi mtshan nyid de ltar re re brjod pa na yang ji skad bshad pa'i skyon du mi thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: just as the definition of an example is not applicable to each one when they are mentioned individually, so the error stated does not follow.

original: dper na bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi zhes pa /
analyzed: dper na bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúFor example, the subject of the probandum‚Äù means:

original: ji ltar 'di pha rol po'i 'dod pa la ltos pas brjod pa de ltar 'di yang ngo zhes ston to //
analyzed: ji ltar 'di pha rol po'i 'dod pa la ltos pas brjod pa de ltar 'di yang ngo zhes ston to //
translated: just as this is stated in dependence on the opponent‚Äôs assertion, so is this.

original: phyogs chos nyid tsam gtan tshigs nyid na ma nges pa thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ma nges pa gtan tshigs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //üîΩthal 'gyur ni thal bar bya bzhin pa'i dod zla la ltos pa nyid @222a * //
analyzed: phyogs chos nyid tsam gtan tshigs nyid na ma nges pa thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ma nges pa gtan tshigs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to // thal 'gyur ni thal bar bya bzhin pa'i dod zla la ltos pa nyid @222a * //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúit follows that the mere property of the position is the reason, because of the fallacy of indeterminacy‚Äù is that it follows that the mere property of the position is the reason, because of the fallacy of indeterminacy.

original: kyi phyir dang / mi 'dod pa 'bab pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: kyi phyir dang / mi 'dod pa 'bab pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The reductio is the opposite of what is being reduced to absurdity, because it depends on the opponent‚Äôs assertion, and because it has the nature of falling into what is unacceptable.

original: gtan tshigs nyid kyang ma 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de kho na dod zla'i sbyor bas gzhan pa'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid kyang ma 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de kho na dod zla'i sbyor bas gzhan pa'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The reason is also unacceptable, because it is the opposite of the opposite of the probandum by the application of the reductio.

original: yang ci zhes pa rigs mthun pa la khyab par byed pa dang khyab par byed pa ma yin pa dag gi gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig pa dag gi yang nus pa nye bar dmigs nas the tshom za bas 'dri'o //
analyzed: yang ci zhes pa rigs mthun pa la khyab par byed pa dang khyab par byed pa ma yin pa dag gi gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig pa dag gi yang nus pa nye bar dmigs nas the tshom za bas 'dri'o //
translated: Also, what? is asked because of doubt, having observed the possibility of a reason that is pervasion and non-pervasion in a homogeneous class.

original: khyad par nyid ni thun mong ma yin no //üîΩre re'i 'am gnyi ga'i ma brjod pa ni /
analyzed: khyad par nyid ni thun mong ma yin no // re re'i 'am gnyi ga'i ma brjod pa ni /
translated: The distinction is the uncommon [reason].

original: re re gnyis ka ma brjod pa'o //üîΩ'ga' zhig gi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: re re gnyis ka ma brjod pa'o // 'ga' zhig gi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The non-mention of either is the non-mention of either one or both.üîΩThe non-mention of both is the non-mention of either one or both.üîΩThe some and so on are for the sake of understanding the opponent.

original: pha rol po rtogs pa'i don du gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid yin no /
analyzed: pha rol po rtogs pa'i don du gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid yin no /
translated: It is an inference for the sake of others.

original: pha rol pos gal te dpe gang yang rung bas rtogs par bya ba'i don rab tu grub na /
analyzed: pha rol pos gal te dpe gang yang rung bas rtogs par bya ba'i don rab tu grub na /
translated: If the opponent understands the meaning to be proven by any example whatsoever,

original: gang yang rung ba brjod pa yang sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba brjod pa yang sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: then the statement of any one [example] is also a proof.

original: rab tu grub zin pa brjod pa ni don med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu grub zin pa brjod pa ni don med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the statement of what is already established is meaningless.

original: yan gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don to //
analyzed: yan gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don to //
translated: The word only has the meaning of restriction.

original: sgra las byung ba bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa ste rtogs pa nyid tsam du chos mthun pa nyid nye bar blangs nas sgra las byung ba bzhin du zhes pa dper rig par bya ste /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa ste rtogs pa nyid tsam du chos mthun pa nyid nye bar blangs nas sgra las byung ba bzhin du zhes pa dper rig par bya ste /
translated: Just as in the case of a syllogism means that, having taken up the mere similarity of the property to be established and the reason, the example is to be understood as being like the case of a syllogism.

original: mngon par ma brjod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par ma brjod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it is not stated.

original: gzhan du na sgra las byung ba ni rang gi don rjes su dpag pa nyid kyi phyir nges par ston pa 'di mi rigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du na sgra las byung ba ni rang gi don rjes su dpag pa nyid kyi phyir nges par ston pa 'di mi rigs par 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, it would be unreasonable to state the example, because the inference for oneself would already have been made.

original: thal bar 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrang gi don rjes su dpag pa la dpe'i thal bar 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro // rang gi don rjes su dpag pa la dpe'i thal bar 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because there would be no consequence.

original: don gyi bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: don gyi bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: There is no consequence of the example in the inference for oneself, because it is the nature of the object.

original: don gnyis ka lhur len pa sngon ma can ni mngon bar brjod pa la ltos pa me dpar rang don rjes su dpag pas nges pa'o //
analyzed: don gnyis ka lhur len pa sngon ma can ni mngon bar brjod pa la ltos pa me dpar rang don rjes su dpag pas nges pa'o //
translated: The inference for others, which is for the sake of both oneself and another, is the statement of the example, which is based on the statement, because the inference for oneself is ascertained without it.

original: de ltar ni sgra mngon sum du nye bar dmigs nas /
analyzed: de ltar ni sgra mngon sum du nye bar dmigs nas /
translated: Having directly perceived the words,

original: de rigs mthun pa gzhan la yod pa nyid dang / med pa la med pa nyid dran te /
analyzed: de rigs mthun pa gzhan la yod pa nyid dang / med pa la med pa nyid dran te /
translated: One recalls that which is similar to that, and that which is not, is not.

original: de tsam kho nas brjod par bya ba rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: de tsam kho nas brjod par bya ba rtogs par byed do //
translated: One understands the object of expression by that alone.

original: de'i phyir rtogs par byed pa nyid tsam nye par gzung nas dper byas pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtogs par byed pa nyid tsam nye par gzung nas dper byas pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, having taken up the mere capacity to understand, it is given as an example.

original: gnyis ka mi brjod pa zhes pa /
analyzed: gnyis ka mi brjod pa zhes pa /
translated: As for not stating both,

original: 'dir 'di ni dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir 'di ni dgongs pa ste /
translated: this is the intention here.

original: dpe la bsgrub bya'i chos ni sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po ste de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pas de'i rang bzhin nyid du ston te /
analyzed: dpe la bsgrub bya'i chos ni sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po ste de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pas de'i rang bzhin nyid du ston te /
translated: In the example, the property of the probandum is the thing that proves, and that alone is related to the inferential mark, so it is shown to be its nature.

original: gang byas pa'i rang bzhin skyed par byed pa de @222b mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa skyed par byed do zhes pa'i tshad ma dpes bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gang byas pa'i rang bzhin skyed par byed pa de @222b mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa skyed par byed do zhes pa'i tshad ma dpes bstan par bya'o //
translated: The valid cognition that whatever has the nature of being produced has the nature of being impermanent should be shown by an example.

original: gzhan du na chos gcig yod par gyur ba las /
analyzed: gzhan du na chos gcig yod par gyur ba las /
translated: Otherwise, from the existence of one property,

original: de las gzhan pas kyang 'byung bar bya'o zhes pa'i nges pa med pa'i phyir 'khrul bar dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pas kyang 'byung bar bya'o zhes pa'i nges pa med pa'i phyir 'khrul bar dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: there would be no certainty that the other would also occur, so there would be doubt about error.

original: tshad ma des kyang de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshad ma des kyang de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: and that valid cognition also expresses the relation to that much.

original: rang gi rgyu kho na las byas pa de ltar gyur par skyes pa gang yin pa 'jig pa'i ngang can ni skad cig tsam gnas pa'i chos can te /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu kho na las byas pa de ltar gyur par skyes pa gang yin pa 'jig pa'i ngang can ni skad cig tsam gnas pa'i chos can te /
translated: That which is produced from its own cause in that way, which is born in that condition, which is perishable by nature, which has the property of remaining for just a moment,

original: gzhan las de'i dngos po khegs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan las de'i dngos po khegs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not produced from another, because its existence is refuted.

original: yang na rgyu'i dngos por te /
analyzed: yang na rgyu'i dngos por te /
translated: Or, in the state of being a cause,

original: de yod pa kho na las 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes don gzhan dpe yis rab tu bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de yod pa kho na las 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes don gzhan dpe yis rab tu bstan par bya'o //
translated: because it arises only when that exists. In this way, the other meaning should be fully taught by means of an example.

original: de ltar de'i dngos po dang rgyu'i dngos por rab tu grub pa na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag 'grub po //
analyzed: de ltar de'i dngos po dang rgyu'i dngos por rab tu grub pa na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag 'grub po //
translated: Thus, when its existence and the state of being a cause are established, the positive and negative concomitance are established.

original: gang rnams de'i dngos po dang rgyu'i dngos po dag rab tu grub pa kha na yin pa de rnams la gtan tshigs kho na brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gang rnams de'i dngos po dang rgyu'i dngos po dag rab tu grub pa kha na yin pa de rnams la gtan tshigs kho na brjod par bya ste /
translated: For those who establish its existence and the state of being a cause, only the reason should be stated.

original: gang gi don du dpe brjod par bya ba'i don te grub zin to zhes pas de brjod pas ci zhig ces pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi don du dpe brjod par bya ba'i don te grub zin to zhes pas de brjod pas ci zhig ces pa'o //
translated: For the sake of which the example is to be stated, that meaning is already established, so what is the point of stating it?

original: 'di ni rang gi 'dod pa la ltos pas dgongs pa brjod pa'o //üîΩpha rol gyi 'dod pa la ltos pas ni mthun phyogs la bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag yod par gyur pa tsam bshad pa'i ched du rigs mthun pa'i dpe brjod cing /
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi 'dod pa la ltos pas dgongs pa brjod pa'o // pha rol gyi 'dod pa la ltos pas ni mthun phyogs la bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag yod par gyur pa tsam bshad pa'i ched du rigs mthun pa'i dpe brjod cing /
translated: This is stated in terms of one‚Äôs own assertion.üîΩIn terms of the other‚Äôs assertion, the similar example is stated for the sake of merely explaining the existence of the probandum and the probans in the concordant class.

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe yang bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi mi mthun phyogs dag gi lhan cig 'byung ba tsam bshad pa'i ched du ste /
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe yang bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi mi mthun phyogs dag gi lhan cig 'byung ba tsam bshad pa'i ched du ste /
translated: The dissimilar example is stated for the sake of merely explaining the co-occurrence of the discordant classes of the probandum and the probans.

original: gang rnams de gnyis ga rtogs zin pa de rnams kyi ngor gnyis ka mi brjod pa ste ;
analyzed: gang rnams de gnyis ga rtogs zin pa de rnams kyi ngor gnyis ka mi brjod pa ste ;
translated: For those who have already understood both of those, neither is stated,

original: dpes rtogs par bya ba'i don grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: dpes rtogs par bya ba'i don grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: because the meaning to be understood through the example has already been established.üîΩThis is the intended meaning.

original: don gyis go bas zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: don gyis go bas zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBy implication‚Äù and so on

original: 'di ni rang gi 'dod pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi 'dod pas bshad pa'o //
translated: is stated in terms of one‚Äôs own assertion.
