original: 'dir yang dpes de'i dngos po gtan tshigs kyi dngos por ston par sems bzhin pas don gyi go pas gcig brjod pas gnyis pa 'grub par gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dir yang dpes de'i dngos po gtan tshigs kyi dngos por ston par sems bzhin pas don gyi go pas gcig brjod pas gnyis pa 'grub par gsungs so //
translated: Here, it is thought that the entity of the example is shown to be the entity of the reason, and it is said that by stating one thing, the other is established by implication.

original: de lta na gang byas pa de mi rtag pa kho na'o zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: de lta na gang byas pa de mi rtag pa kho na'o zhes brjod pa na /
translated: Thus, when it is said, ‚ÄúWhatever is produced is impermanent,‚Äù

original: don gzhan ma yin par gyur pa na /
analyzed: don gzhan ma yin par gyur pa na /
translated: if it is not a different object,

original: gsal bar 'di ni 'di'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: gsal bar 'di ni 'di'i rang bzhin te /
translated: it is clearly this nature of that.

original: de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa tshad mas mthong zhing de'i dngos por nges pa'i phyir @223a * //
analyzed: de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa tshad mas mthong zhing de'i dngos por nges pa'i phyir @223a * //
translated: Just that is seen by valid cognition to be related, and it is ascertained to be its entity.

original: ro zhes 'brel pa shes pa ni don gyis go bas mi rtag pa nyid med na byas pa nyid du mi 'gyur zhes par 'gyur te tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: ro zhes 'brel pa shes pa ni don gyis go bas mi rtag pa nyid med na byas pa nyid du mi 'gyur zhes par 'gyur te tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro /
translated: Thus, the cognition of the relation is by implication. It would be, ‚ÄúIf impermanence did not exist, production would not exist,‚Äù because they are not different.

original: gzhan du na de yod pa na yod pa kho na'o zhes pa 'di kho na mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na de yod pa na yod pa kho na'o zhes pa 'di kho na mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, this alone, ‚ÄúWhen it exists, it exists,‚Äù would not be so.

original: de med pa na mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes pa 'di brjod pa na /
analyzed: de med pa na mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes pa 'di brjod pa na /
translated: When this is stated, ‚ÄúIf it does not exist, it would not exist,‚Äù

original: de yod par rigs pa ni gsal bar 'di ni 'di'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de yod par rigs pa ni gsal bar 'di ni 'di'i rang bzhin te /
translated: it is clearly this nature of that.

original: gang gis de med pa na mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis de med pa na mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: Because it is not possible otherwise.

original: gzhan du na mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes de'i rang bzhin nyid du rtogs pas rjes su 'gro ba dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes de'i rang bzhin nyid du rtogs pas rjes su 'gro ba dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, by understanding its nature, one remembers its invariable concomitance.

original: de bzhin du gang na du ba yod pa der mer 'gyur ba khon zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gang na du ba yod pa der mer 'gyur ba khon zhes brjod pa na /
translated: Similarly, when it is said that where there is smoke, there is fire,

original: gang gis du ba yod pa mer gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba du ba ni me'i 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: gang gis du ba yod pa mer gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba du ba ni me'i 'bras bu ste /
translated: smoke is the effect of fire, because it is smoke that is invariably accompanied by fire.

original: gzhan du na don gzhan de dang rjes su 'brel ba'i des ba med pa'i phyir na rang bzhin rang dbang can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du na don gzhan de dang rjes su 'brel ba'i des ba med pa'i phyir na rang bzhin rang dbang can du 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, it would be independent, because it would not be invariably related to that other thing, fire.

original: de med ba la yang rang bzhin ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir na med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de med ba la yang rang bzhin ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir na med pa ma yin no //
translated: And it is not nonexistent, because its nature is complete even when it is not present.

original: 'bras bu la ni gdon mi za bar rgyur 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu la ni gdon mi za bar rgyur 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: It is invariably accompanied by its cause, because it is the effect.

original: 'di kho na ni rgyu'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di kho na ni rgyu'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the nature of a cause.

original: gang don gzhan yod pa na rang bzhin nye bar sgrub cing /
analyzed: gang don gzhan yod pa na rang bzhin nye bar sgrub cing /
translated: When the other thing exists, its nature is established,

original: 'bras bu yang de yod pa kho na la yod pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu yang de yod pa kho na la yod pa ste /
translated: and the effect exists only when it exists.

original: de yang du ba la yod cing de'i phyir du ba 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de yang du ba la yod cing de'i phyir du ba 'bras bu'o //
translated: Moreover, smoke exists there, and therefore smoke is the effect.

original: de ltar rjes su 'gro bas de 'bras bu nyid du rig pa'i /
analyzed: de ltar rjes su 'gro bas de 'bras bu nyid du rig pa'i /
translated: In that way, by the pervasion, the understanding of that as the effect isüîΩunderstood by implication.

original: sreg par byed pa med pa na du ba 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes don gyis ldog pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sreg par byed pa med pa na du ba 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes don gyis ldog pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: When there is no fire, there is no smoke.

original: de bzhin du me med pa la du ba med pa kho na'o zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: de bzhin du me med pa la du ba med pa kho na'o zhes brjod pa na /
translated: In the same way, when it is said that where there is no fire, there is no smoke,üîΩthe pervasion is understood by implication that where there is smoke, there is fire.

original: du ba la me gdon mi za bar zhes don gyis rjes su 'gro ba rtogs so zhes pa'o sgrub par byed pa'i ngag gcig la gnyis ka dag sbyor bar 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: du ba la me gdon mi za bar zhes don gyis rjes su 'gro ba rtogs so zhes pa'o sgrub par byed pa'i ngag gcig la gnyis ka dag sbyor bar 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not asserted that both are applied in a single proof statement,

original: don med ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: don med ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: because that would be meaningless.

original: rjes su dpag pa la yang zhes rang gi don rjes su dpag pa la'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la yang zhes rang gi don rjes su dpag pa la'o //
translated: Also, in inference, with regard to an inference for oneself,

original: tshul 'di zhes pa rtogs pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: tshul 'di zhes pa rtogs pa'i tshul lo //
translated: this method, the method of understanding,

original: dran pa skyed par byed pa kho na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa so sor rtogs pa dag phyogs chos nges par gyur pa na rang don rjes su dpag pa la yang 'di mthong ngo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dran pa skyed par byed pa kho na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa so sor rtogs pa dag phyogs chos nges par gyur pa na rang don rjes su dpag pa la yang 'di mthong ngo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The mere production of memory is the realization of the individual presence and absence of the forward and reverse [pervasiveness]. When the property of one part is ascertained, this is seen in inference for one's own sake as well.

original: de ston par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ston par gsungs pa /
translated: That is taught:

original: gal te 'di zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te 'di zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: If this... and so forth.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
translated: For that very reason...

original: gang gi phyir rang don rjes su dpag pa la yang tshul 'di mthong ngo zhes pa'i don yin pa @223b de'i phyir gzhan don rjes su dpag pa la tshul 'di blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang don rjes su dpag pa la yang tshul 'di mthong ngo zhes pa'i don yin pa @223b de'i phyir gzhan don rjes su dpag pa la tshul 'di blta bar bya ste /
translated: means that because this method is seen in inference for one's own sake, this method should be seen in inference for the sake of others.üîΩBecause it has a prior... teaches that.

original: de ni sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir zhes ston cing thal bar 'gyur ba las kyang /
analyzed: de ni sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir zhes ston cing thal bar 'gyur ba las kyang /
translated: From the consequence...

original: nye bar sbyor ba la sogs pa rnams dgag pa bsgrub pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: nye bar sbyor ba la sogs pa rnams dgag pa bsgrub pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: The application... and so forth are stated for the purpose of refuting the proof.

original: rang gis nges bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rang gis nges bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Although ascertained by oneself... and so forth.

original: ji ltar bdag nyid la nges pa skyed pa de ltar pha rol po rnams la yang des pa skyed pa'i ched du /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag nyid la nges pa skyed pa de ltar pha rol po rnams la yang des pa skyed pa'i ched du /
translated: Just as one generates certainty for oneself, so also, in order to generate certainty in others,

original: gang las 'dod par 'gyur ba dang / gang las phyogs chos nyid dang 'brel pa dag gi bsgrub bya brjod pa bsgrub bya gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'o//
analyzed: gang las 'dod par 'gyur ba dang / gang las phyogs chos nyid dang 'brel pa dag gi bsgrub bya brjod pa bsgrub bya gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'o//
translated: one should state the thesis that is to be proven, which is related to the property of the subject and the reason, in a way that clarifies the thesis.

original: des na phyogs la sogs pa'i tshig las gzhan pa de la nye bar mi mkho ba shes pa la sogs pa rnams gzhan don rjes su dpag pa la dor ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: des na phyogs la sogs pa'i tshig las gzhan pa de la nye bar mi mkho ba shes pa la sogs pa rnams gzhan don rjes su dpag pa la dor ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Therefore, in an inference for the sake of others, one should omit other words such as ‚Äúposition,‚Äù and other words such as ‚Äúknows‚Äù that are not necessary for the understanding of the meaning.

original: gzhan dag song zhes pa 'dir phyogs chos la sogs pa rjod pa las zhes brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag song zhes pa 'dir phyogs chos la sogs pa rjod pa las zhes brtag par bya'o //
translated: Others should understand that in this case, ‚Äúhaving gone‚Äù should be analyzed as ‚Äúhaving stated the property of the subject and so on.‚Äù

original: yang ci ltar 'chad par byed pa'i don can brjod pa gsal bar byed pa la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: yang ci ltar 'chad par byed pa'i don can brjod pa gsal bar byed pa la 'jug pa ste /
translated: Moreover, how does one engage in clarifying the meaning of what is to be stated, which has the meaning of what is to be explained?

original: dper na rigs pa des smra'o zhes pa 'dir smra ba ji ltar yin pa lta bu ste skad kyi byings rnams ni du ma'i don can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dper na rigs pa des smra'o zhes pa 'dir smra ba ji ltar yin pa lta bu ste skad kyi byings rnams ni du ma'i don can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: For example, it is like the word ‚Äúsay‚Äù in the sentence ‚ÄúHe says by that reasoning.‚Äù

original: 'brel pa ni med na mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni med na mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: The relation is the invariable relation.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba bstan pa'i don du phyogs brjod pa zhes pa ni phyogs kyi sgra ni 'dir don gyi rnam grangs so //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba bstan pa'i don du phyogs brjod pa zhes pa ni phyogs kyi sgra ni 'dir don gyi rnam grangs so //
translated: In order to show the object of inference, the author says, ‚ÄúThe statement of the position.‚Äù The word ‚Äúposition‚Äù here is a synonym for ‚Äúobject.‚Äù

original: ji skad du gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: yod pa'i don ni phyogs zhes so //
analyzed: yod pa'i don ni phyogs zhes so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe object that exists is called the position.‚Äù

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: rjes su dpag pa'i dus su don gang ci yang rung ba brjod pa de rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i dus su don gang ci yang rung ba brjod pa de rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa'i don du ste /
translated: At the time of inference, whatever object is stated is for the purpose of understanding the object of inference.

original: de la dgos pa gzhan cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la dgos pa gzhan cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no other purpose at all.

original: phyogs chos la sogs pa brjod pa nus pa mngon par brjod pa kho na ni gzhan don rjes su dpog pa la yan lag gi dngos po ste /
analyzed: phyogs chos la sogs pa brjod pa nus pa mngon par brjod pa kho na ni gzhan don rjes su dpog pa la yan lag gi dngos po ste /
translated: The statement of the property of the position and so on is only the expression of the capacity, which is the factor in the inference for the sake of others.

original: de'i phyir de kho na nye bar blang ngo zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na nye bar blang ngo zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the intended meaning is that one should take up reality.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: gzhan gyi yang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi yang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNor is it of another,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dis de ma thag par brjod pa kho na'i yan lag gi dngos po'o zhes pa 'di gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dis de ma thag par brjod pa kho na'i yan lag gi dngos po'o zhes pa 'di gsal bar byed do //
translated: This clarifies that the immediately preceding statement is a component of the argument.

original: shes 'dod la sogs pa rnams kyi zhes pas shes 'dod dang the tshom dang dogs pa dang nus pa thob pa rnams 'phangs pa yin no //üîΩnye bar @224a * //üîΩsbyor ba dang mjug sdud dag sogs pa'i sgras 'phangs na'ang /
analyzed: shes 'dod la sogs pa rnams kyi zhes pas shes 'dod dang the tshom dang dogs pa dang nus pa thob pa rnams 'phangs pa yin no // nye bar @224a * // sbyor ba dang mjug sdud dag sogs pa'i sgras 'phangs na'ang /
translated: ‚ÄúThose who desire to know, etc.‚Äù implies those who desire to know, those who doubt, those who suspect, and those who have attained ability.üîΩThe application and conclusion are implied by the word ‚Äúand so on.‚Äù

original: slar yang khyad par du spangs pa ni //
analyzed: slar yang khyad par du spangs pa ni //
translated: Even though they are implied, they are again specifically excluded.

original: rigs pa can pa rnams kyis shes par 'dod pa sun phyung nas /
analyzed: rigs pa can pa rnams kyis shes par 'dod pa sun phyung nas /
translated: Having refuted the desire to know of the NaiyƒÅyikas,

original: de dag yan lag gzhan nyid du rnam par gzhan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag yan lag gzhan nyid du rnam par gzhan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are different components, they are different in nature.

original: de dag yan lag gzhan nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag yan lag gzhan nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: They are not even components in a different sense,

original: brjod zin pa dang nus pa med pa'i don ston pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: brjod zin pa dang nus pa med pa'i don ston pa'i phyir te /
translated: because they show a meaning that has already been stated and is not possible.

original: ji ltar rigs par ro //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs par ro //
translated: As is appropriate.

original: dpe'i tshig kyang zhes pa la sogs pas brjod zin pa'i don ston pa'i phyir ro zhes pa 'di ma nges pa nyid du smras so //üîΩgtan tshigs kyi don ston pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ;
analyzed: dpe'i tshig kyang zhes pa la sogs pas brjod zin pa'i don ston pa'i phyir ro zhes pa 'di ma nges pa nyid du smras so // gtan tshigs kyi don ston pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ;
translated: The word example is also used to show the meaning of the reason, he says. This is an uncertain statement.üîΩ To show the meaning of the reason, he says, because the example shows the presence and absence of the reason in the similar and dissimilar cases.

original: gang gi phyir dpes mthun phyogs dang mi mthun phyogs dag la yod pa dang med pa nyid dag gi gtan tshigs kyi don kho na ston to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dpes mthun phyogs dang mi mthun phyogs dag la yod pa dang med pa nyid dag gi gtan tshigs kyi don kho na ston to //
translated: Because the example shows only the meaning of the reason in the similar and dissimilar cases.

original: gal te gtan tshigs las zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs las zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: If you say from the reason, etc.,

original: lan 'debs so //
analyzed: lan 'debs so //
translated: he replies.

original: gtan tshigs las zhes pa gtan tshigs kyi tshig las so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs las zhes pa gtan tshigs kyi tshig las so //
translated: From the reason means from the words of the reason.

original: gal te yang gtan tshigs las dpe tha dad med par bsgrags te /
analyzed: gal te yang gtan tshigs las dpe tha dad med par bsgrags te /
translated: If it is proclaimed that the example is not different from the reason,

original: des kyang gtan tshigs kyi don gyi phyogs gcig brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des kyang gtan tshigs kyi don gyi phyogs gcig brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it expresses one part of the meaning of the reason.

original: de lta na yang nye bar sbyar ba la sogs pa bzhin du dgos pa med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang nye bar sbyar ba la sogs pa bzhin du dgos pa med pa ma yin te /
translated: Even so, it is not purposeless, like the application, etc.

original: gtan tshigs kyi tshig gis ma brjod pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi tshig gis ma brjod pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the meaning of the reason is indicated without the words of the reason.

original: gtan tshigs 'brel pa sgrub don du //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'brel pa sgrub don du //
translated: For the sake of establishing the connection of the reason.

original: zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid rab tu bstan pa'i don du'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid rab tu bstan pa'i don du'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: for the sake of teaching the invariable concomitance of the probandum.

original: logs shig ces pa ma 'brel ba ste /
analyzed: logs shig ces pa ma 'brel ba ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúelsewhere‚Äù means ‚Äúwithout connection.‚Äù

original: logs pa'i don mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: logs pa'i don mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the meaning of ‚Äúelsewhere‚Äù is expressed.

original: logs par 'gyur mod de gtan tshigs kyi tshig brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i don ma 'brel ba'i don mngon par brjod par 'gyur mod ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: logs par 'gyur mod de gtan tshigs kyi tshig brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i don ma 'brel ba'i don mngon par brjod par 'gyur mod ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúIt would be elsewhere‚Äù means: the meaning of the reason would be expressed without the words of the reason.

original: gtan tshigs lhag ma rab tu 'grub pa'i don du zhes pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs lhag ma rab tu 'grub pa'i don du zhes pa /
translated: For the sake of establishing the remainder of the reason.

original: gtan tshigs las gzhan gang yin pa de ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs las gzhan gang yin pa de ni lhag ma'o //
translated: That which is other than the reason is the remainder.

original: de yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag dang / de'i mi mthun phyogs dag lhan cig 'byung ba pha rol bos mngon par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: de yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag dang / de'i mi mthun phyogs dag lhan cig 'byung ba pha rol bos mngon par 'dod pa ste /
translated: And that is the invariable concomitance of the probandum and the probans, and of their opposites, which the opponent accepts.

original: de rab tu 'grub pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de rab tu 'grub pa'i don du'o //
translated: For the sake of establishing that.

original: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa nyid kyi phyir bum pa bzhin zhes byas pa na /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa nyid kyi phyir bum pa bzhin zhes byas pa na /
translated: When it is said, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent because of being produced, like a pot,‚Äù

original: byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid dag lhan cig 'byung ba bum pa la rtogs par byed la /
analyzed: byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid dag lhan cig 'byung ba bum pa la rtogs par byed la /
translated: the co-occurrence of being produced and impermanent is understood in the pot.

original: @224b de bzhin du rtag pa ni ma byas pa'o zhas byas pa na /
analyzed: @224b de bzhin du rtag pa ni ma byas pa'o zhas byas pa na /
translated: Similarly, when it is said, ‚ÄúThe permanent is unproduced,‚Äù

original: nam mkha' la rtag pa dang ma byas pa nyid dag gi'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la rtag pa dang ma byas pa nyid dag gi'o //
translated: in space, the permanence and unproduced are understood.

original: de'i phyir dpe ni logs pa kho nar 'gyur mod pa'o //üîΩ'jig rten mtshungs phyir logs pa min //
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe ni logs pa kho nar 'gyur mod pa'o // 'jig rten mtshungs phyir logs pa min //
translated: Therefore, the example is indeed mistaken.üîΩBecause of being similar to the world, it is not mistaken.

original: zhes pa 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba dang mtshungs pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba dang mtshungs pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it follows that it is similar to a worldly syllogism.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ga sungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ga sungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: de lta na ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba la dpe ni gtan tshigs kyi don dang ma 'brel ba nyid bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba la dpe ni gtan tshigs kyi don dang ma 'brel ba nyid bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the example in a worldly syllogism is not connected to the meaning of the reason, it is said:

original: dpe brjod dang chos mthun zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dpe brjod dang chos mthun zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, like a pot and having the property of being produced and so on.

original: dpe brjod bum pa la sogs pa dang byas pa nyid la sogs pa chos mthun nyid ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyis brjod do //
analyzed: dpe brjod bum pa la sogs pa dang byas pa nyid la sogs pa chos mthun nyid ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyis brjod do //
translated: The world expresses the example, such as a pot, and the property of being produced, and so on, as having the same property.

original: mtshan nyid kyi dbang gis sbyor bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi dbang gis sbyor bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: It is connected by the power of the definition.

original: de rnams kyi rtags kyi mtshan nyid kyang dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rtags kyi mtshan nyid kyang dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes pa'o //
translated: And the definition of the reason is that which proves the probandum from the example and having the same property.

original: de ltar yang sbyor ba las byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'dis dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid 'ba' zhig brjod de /üîΩsgra mi rtag ste byas pa nyid kyi phyir bum pa bzhin zhes kyi /
analyzed: de ltar yang sbyor ba las byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'dis dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid 'ba' zhig brjod de / sgra mi rtag ste byas pa nyid kyi phyir bum pa bzhin zhes kyi /
translated: Thus, in the syllogism because it is produced, this only expresses the example and having the same property.üîΩIt does not express the probandum and the proof, as in Sound is impermanent because of being produced, like a pot.

original: bsgrub bya sgrub byed nyid ma brjod do zhes med na mi 'byung ba bstan pa'i stobs kyis bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid 'thob kyi /
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub byed nyid ma brjod do zhes med na mi 'byung ba bstan pa'i stobs kyis bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid 'thob kyi /
translated: The force of the demonstration of the invariable concomitance obtains the status of being the proof of the probandum, as in Sound is impermanent because of being produced, like a pot.

original: chos mthun pa nyid tsam brjod pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid tsam brjod pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not merely the similarity of the property that is stated.

original: 'di ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: This is how it is.

original: bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes pa'i tshig las na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes pa'i tshig las na /
translated: From the statement, ‚ÄúThe reason is that which establishes the probandum,‚Äù

original: ci ltar bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid ma brjod pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid ma brjod pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: how is it that the nature of establishing the probandum is not stated? It is said:

original: ji ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúHow?‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid ni yan lag thams cad kyi thun mong pa'i ngo bo mtshon par bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid ni yan lag thams cad kyi thun mong pa'i ngo bo mtshon par bya ba ste /
translated: Because the nature of establishing the probandum is indicated by all the members in common,

original: de mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: that is not the definition.

original: de kho na yongs su shes par bya ba'i ched du mtshan nyid bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de kho na yongs su shes par bya ba'i ched du mtshan nyid bya ba yin te /
translated: The definition is made for the purpose of fully understanding that.

original: de'i phyir dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid tsam kho na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid du zhes pas sbyor ba la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid tsam kho na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid du zhes pas sbyor ba la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the mere statement of the example and the similarity of the property are to be applied as the definition of the reason.

original: de tshod tsam gyis gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba sgrub bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de tshod tsam gyis gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba sgrub bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not that just by that much the reason proves the probandum.

original: gzhan du na sgra rtag ste lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'di yang 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan du na sgra rtag ste lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'di yang 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Otherwise, this would also be a reason: ‚ÄúSound is permanent because of being non-embodiment.‚ÄùüîΩTo respond to that, it is said:

original: de ltar yang ni dpe tsam nyid ces pa'o//
analyzed: de ltar yang ni dpe tsam nyid ces pa'o//
translated: ‚ÄúIn that way, it is just an example.‚Äù

original: @225a * // de lta na yang dpe nyid tsam rab tu ston pa ni sbyor ba la bstan te /
analyzed: @225a * // de lta na yang dpe nyid tsam rab tu ston pa ni sbyor ba la bstan te /
translated: Even so, the mere example is taught in the syllogism.

original: bum pa bzhin du byas pa nyid kyi phyir mi rtag ces pa la gtan tshigs la rjes su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: bum pa bzhin du byas pa nyid kyi phyir mi rtag ces pa la gtan tshigs la rjes su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúLike a pot, because of being produced, it is impermanent‚Äù is not a reason because it does not apprehend the reason.

original: lhan cig 'byung ba tsam bstan pas ni gtan tshigs rjes su 'dzin pa ci yang byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung ba tsam bstan pas ni gtan tshigs rjes su 'dzin pa ci yang byas pa ma yin no //
translated: By merely teaching co-occurrence, nothing is done to apprehend the reason.

original: ci ste yang 'gyur mod ces pa la sogs pas ni chos mi mthun pa nyid kyang gtan tshigs rjes su 'dzin ba'i ngor nus pa med pa nyid smras pa'o //
analyzed: ci ste yang 'gyur mod ces pa la sogs pas ni chos mi mthun pa nyid kyang gtan tshigs rjes su 'dzin ba'i ngor nus pa med pa nyid smras pa'o //
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúBut it is possible,‚Äù and so on, then even the dissimilar example is said to be incapable of apprehending the reason.

original: bsgrub par bya ba med na gtan tshigs med pa rab tu bstan bas rjes su gzung bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med na gtan tshigs med pa rab tu bstan bas rjes su gzung bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: If there is no probandum, then the absence of the reason is taught, and it is accepted.

original: bsgrub bas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag lhan cig spyod pa tsam bstan pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag lhan cig spyod pa tsam bstan pas ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that the mere co-occurrence of the probandum and the reason is taught.

original: 'jig rten pa'i sbyor bas kyang 'di tsam kho na bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i sbyor bas kyang 'di tsam kho na bya ba ste /
translated: Even in worldly usage, this much alone is done:

original: zlog pas rtag pa'i dpe ldog pa'i don du zhes pa /
analyzed: zlog pas rtag pa'i dpe ldog pa'i don du zhes pa /
translated: The reversal is for the purpose of reversing the example of permanence.

original: ma byas pa nyid zlog pas te byas pa nyid kyis rtag pa'i dpe ldog pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: ma byas pa nyid zlog pas te byas pa nyid kyis rtag pa'i dpe ldog pa'i don du ste /
translated: The reversal of non-production is for the purpose of reversing the example of permanence by production.

original: nam mkha' bzhin du rtag pa ma yin no zhes rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pas sgra byas pa'i dpe yin pa med do zhes pa'i don to //üîΩci ste yang zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa'i ched du /
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du rtag pa ma yin no zhes rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pas sgra byas pa'i dpe yin pa med do zhes pa'i don to // ci ste yang zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa'i ched du /
translated: It is not permanent like space, meaning that there is no example of sound being produced by space and so on that is permanent.

original: gtan tshigs rjes su 'dzin pa tshol pa yin zhing /
analyzed: gtan tshigs rjes su 'dzin pa tshol pa yin zhing /
translated: If, on the other hand, the reason is sought for the purpose of establishing the probandum,üîΩthen the reason is accepted.

original: de gal te dpe tsam gyis 'gyur na gtan tshigs rjes su 'dzin pa don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de gal te dpe tsam gyis 'gyur na gtan tshigs rjes su 'dzin pa don med par 'gyur te /
translated: If that were to be by mere example, then the reason would be pointless,

original: dpe tsam gyis bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pas so zhes pa bsams ba'o //
analyzed: dpe tsam gyis bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pas so zhes pa bsams ba'o //
translated: because the probandum would be established by mere example.

original: 'grub pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba rjes su 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: 'grub pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba rjes su 'dzin pa'o //
translated: It is only the establishment that is the probandum.

original: 'di yod pa ma yin te zhes pa dpe tsam gyis bsgrub par bya ba rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di yod pa ma yin te zhes pa dpe tsam gyis bsgrub par bya ba rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: This is not existent, that is, the probandum is not established by mere example.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na ;
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na ;
translated: Why is that?

original: de la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBecause there is also in that . . .‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs bcas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i dang bsgrub bya tsam gyi ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs bcas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i dang bsgrub bya tsam gyi ste /
translated: The probandum with a reason and the mere probandum,

original: bsgrub bya tsam gyi zhes pa phyi mar mngon bar brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsgrub bya tsam gyi zhes pa phyi mar mngon bar brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: the mere probandum is stated in the latter,

original: snga ma ni gtan tshigs bcas pa bsgrub par bya ba'i zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma ni gtan tshigs bcas pa bsgrub par bya ba'i zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: so the former is understood to be the probandum with a reason.

original: de'i khyad par gyi'am /
analyzed: de'i khyad par gyi'am /
translated: The difference of that,

original: de'i sgras bsgrub bar bya ba la bsnyegs so //üîΩdpe yin na ste /
analyzed: de'i sgras bsgrub bar bya ba la bsnyegs so // dpe yin na ste /
translated: the word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the probandum.üîΩIf it is an example,

original: dpe yin pa na'o //
analyzed: dpe yin pa na'o //
translated: if it is an example.

original: dpe ni thug pa med 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: dpe ni thug pa med 'gyur zhing //
translated: The example would be endless.

original: gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dpe yin na'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dpe yin na'o //
translated: If the example were the probandum together with the reason,

original: phyi ma dag yin na ni mi mthun phyogs las zlog pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi ma dag yin na ni mi mthun phyogs las zlog pa yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: then the counter-example would also have to be stated.

original: dper na bum pa ni byas @225b pa'i phyir mi rtag ste /üîΩde bzhin du sgra yang yin no zhes pa dper na bum pa byas pa nyid kyis mi rtag ba nyid du rjes su dpag pa de lta bu sgra yang yin no zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dper na bum pa ni byas @225b pa'i phyir mi rtag ste / de bzhin du sgra yang yin no zhes pa dper na bum pa byas pa nyid kyis mi rtag ba nyid du rjes su dpag pa de lta bu sgra yang yin no zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: For example, ‚ÄúThe pot is impermanent because it is produced.üîΩSound is also like that.‚Äù This means that just as the pot is inferred to be impermanent because of being produced, so is sound.

original: slar yang bum pa mi rtag pa nyid la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ji ltar sgra la dpes mi rtag pa nyid 'grub pa de bzhin du bum pa la ste /
analyzed: slar yang bum pa mi rtag pa nyid la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ji ltar sgra la dpes mi rtag pa nyid 'grub pa de bzhin du bum pa la ste /
translated: Again, ‚ÄúThe pot is also impermanent, etc.‚Äù Just as impermanence is established by the example in sound, so it is in the pot.

original: de bzhin du de'i dpe la yang ngo zhes pa thug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i dpe la yang ngo zhes pa thug pa med pa'o //
translated: And so on, up to the example of that. Thus there is an infinite regress.

original: nam mkha' bzhin du rtag pa ni ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du rtag pa ni ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: It is not permanent like space.

original: rtag pa nyid bgag pas mi rtag pa nyid tsam bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes ston par byed do //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid bgag pas mi rtag pa nyid tsam bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes ston par byed do //
translated: It shows that by negating permanence, impermanence is established.

original: des ni nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: des ni nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIn the case of space and so on,‚Äù and so forth.

original: mi mthun phyogs las ldog pa med pa ni go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs las ldog pa med pa ni go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The absence of the opposite is not the indicator,üîΩbecause of that, it is not permanent like space.

original: de'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin du rtag pa ni ma yin no zhes pa 'di brjod bar 'dod pa na /
analyzed: de'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin du rtag pa ni ma yin no zhes pa 'di brjod bar 'dod pa na /
translated: When this is what is intended,

original: byas pa nyid kyi nye bar sbyor ba ston pas nam mkha' la sogs ba mi mthun phyogs rnams las de'i ldog pa nye bar bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyi nye bar sbyor ba ston pas nam mkha' la sogs ba mi mthun phyogs rnams las de'i ldog pa nye bar bstan par bya ste /
translated: the application of ‚Äúbecause of being produced‚Äù is shown. Space and so on are the opposites. Their absence is indicated.üîΩIt is not suitable to be produced. This is pointless.

original: byas pa nyid las gyur na mi rung ngo zhes 'di ni don med pa nyid do zhes pa'o yod pas yang ma yin no zhes ba bum pa bzhin du mi rtag pa'o zhes pa 'di tsam gyis de rnams las ldog pa rtogs pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: byas pa nyid las gyur na mi rung ngo zhes 'di ni don med pa nyid do zhes pa'o yod pas yang ma yin no zhes ba bum pa bzhin du mi rtag pa'o zhes pa 'di tsam gyis de rnams las ldog pa rtogs pa ma yin pas so //
translated: It is not the case that it is not so because it exists. It is not the case that it is not so because it is impermanent like a pot. This is because it is not understood that it is the opposite of those.

original: snam bu la sogs pa bzhin du ni ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: snam bu la sogs pa bzhin du ni ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: It is not like a cloth and so on.

original: khyad par gzhan bkag pas khyad par bsgrub par bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: khyad par gzhan bkag pas khyad par bsgrub par bya'o zhes ston to //
translated: In particular, it shows that difference is to be established by the exclusion of other.

original: de lta na yang snam bu la sogs pa rnams las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de lta na yang snam bu la sogs pa rnams las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Even so, cloth, etc. are from threads, etc. and so on.

original: khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin du snam bu la sogs pa yang mi mthun phyogs kho na ste /
analyzed: khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin du snam bu la sogs pa yang mi mthun phyogs kho na ste /
translated: If difference is to be established, then cloth, etc. are just the opposite, like space, etc.

original: de'i phyir yang de las kyang gtan tshigs ldog par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang de las kyang gtan tshigs ldog par brjod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, the reason must be stated as excluded from that, too.

original: gzhan du na byas pa nyid kyi phyir snam bu bzhin du mi rtag go zhes par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na byas pa nyid kyi phyir snam bu bzhin du mi rtag go zhes par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be like saying, Sound is impermanent because it is produced, like a cloth.

original: dpe tsam bstan pas de rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe tsam bstan pas de rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it understood by merely showing an example.

original: snam bu la sogs pa rnams kyang byas pa nyid las yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: snam bu la sogs pa rnams kyang byas pa nyid las yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Cloth, etc. are not existent just from being produced.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni thams cad du rnam pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin zhes pa khyad par dang ldan pa ma yin zhes pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni thams cad du rnam pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin zhes pa khyad par dang ldan pa ma yin zhes pa'i bar ro //
translated: The probandum is not everywhere endowed with a form, up to not endowed with a difference.

original: thams cad du zhes smos pa ni kha cig tu rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid srid ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: thams cad du zhes smos pa ni kha cig tu rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid srid ba'i phyir te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin every way‚Äù is stated because it is possible that something has an aspect in some cases.

original: dper na 'dir me'o zhes pa der ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ni chos can gyi ngo bo yin gyi chos kyi ngo bo ni ma yin te /üîΩchos can yang rnam pa dang ldan @226a * //
analyzed: dper na 'dir me'o zhes pa der ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ni chos can gyi ngo bo yin gyi chos kyi ngo bo ni ma yin te / chos can yang rnam pa dang ldan @226a * //
translated: For example, in the statement ‚ÄúHere, fire,‚Äù the predicate of the probandum is the nature of the subject, not the nature of the predicate.

original: pa nyid srid pas so //
analyzed: pa nyid srid pas so //
translated: This is because the subject is possible as having an aspect.

original: yang na bsgrub bar bya ba ni thams cad du rnam pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: yang na bsgrub bar bya ba ni thams cad du rnam pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: Or, the probandum is not in every way having an aspect.

original: spyi kho na ni mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pas bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: spyi kho na ni mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pas bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: The mere universal is the probandum by the exclusion of non-possession.

original: thams cad du zhes ba nges par 'dzin par blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: thams cad du zhes ba nges par 'dzin par blta bar bya ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin every way‚Äù should be viewed as a restriction.

original: thams cad kho nar rnam pa dang ldan pa ma yin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad kho nar rnam pa dang ldan pa ma yin zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not in every way having an aspect.

original: 'o na 'ga' zhig tu rnam pa dang ldan pa yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na 'ga' zhig tu rnam pa dang ldan pa yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: But is it not the case that in some cases it has an aspect?

original: de ltar ni sreg par byed pa la sogs pa rnams khyad par dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar ni sreg par byed pa la sogs pa rnams khyad par dang ldan pa ste /
translated: In that case, those that burn and so on have a particular.

original: rtsva las byung ba dang lo ma las byung ba la sogs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rtsva las byung ba dang lo ma las byung ba la sogs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because there is a difference between those that arise from grass and those that arise from leaves and so on.

original: 'di yod pa ma yin te /üîΩde las yang rtsva las byung ba dang lo ma las byung ba la sogs pa sreg par byed pa'i khyad par sgrub par byed pa na yang rtsva las byung ba la sogs pa sreg par byed pa'i spyi kho na bsgrub bar bya'o zhes pas ci'i phyir rnam pa
analyzed: 'di yod pa ma yin te / de las yang rtsva las byung ba dang lo ma las byung ba la sogs pa sreg par byed pa'i khyad par sgrub par byed pa na yang rtsva las byung ba la sogs pa sreg par byed pa'i spyi kho na bsgrub bar bya'o zhes pas ci'i phyir rnam pa
translated: This is not so,üîΩbecause when establishing the difference of those that burn that arise from grass and those that burn that arise from leaves and so on, the mere generality of that which burns is established.

original: dang ldan pa nyid yin /
analyzed: dang ldan pa nyid yin /
translated: Why is it not the case that the example is endowed with the property to be proven?

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason it is said:üîΩIt is not related to the meaning of the thesis because the mere impermanence is the thesis.

original: dam bca' ba'i don dang yang ma 'brel ba ste mi rtag pa nyid tsam gyis dam bcas pa'i phyir ro zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid tsam gyis dam bcas pa na /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don dang yang ma 'brel ba ste mi rtag pa nyid tsam gyis dam bcas pa'i phyir ro zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid tsam gyis dam bcas pa na /
translated: When the mere impermanence is the thesis,

original: de la ltos pa kho nas bya bzhin pa'i dpe'i don 'thad par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de la ltos pa kho nas bya bzhin pa'i dpe'i don 'thad par 'gyur zhing /
translated: the meaning of the example that is like the action of burning is tenable only in dependence on that.

original: khyad par la ltos pas ni dam bca' ba'i don dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par la ltos pas ni dam bca' ba'i don dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: But it is not related to the meaning of the thesis because it depends on a difference.

original: gzhan dam bcas shing gzhan kho na nye bar dpog pas so zhes byas nas so //üîΩgal te yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩdpe gtan tshigs las tha dad pa nyid du gyur na phyogs kyi chos tsam kho na gtan tshigs so zhes pa 'di thob ste /
analyzed: gzhan dam bcas shing gzhan kho na nye bar dpog pas so zhes byas nas so // gal te yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste / dpe gtan tshigs las tha dad pa nyid du gyur na phyogs kyi chos tsam kho na gtan tshigs so zhes pa 'di thob ste /
translated: Because of the promise to others, and because of the inference to others alone.

original: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub par bya bsgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩyang de ltar gyur na mi 'dod pa cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub par bya bsgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro // yang de ltar gyur na mi 'dod pa cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If, on the other hand, the example is different from the reason, then the mere property of the subject is the reason, because of the definition of the reason as that which proves the probandum by means of the similarity of properties.

original: de lta na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And if that is so, what is undesirable? He says, In that case, too, etc.

original: de la 'khrul ba'i skabs yod do zhes pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun phyogs la gtan tshigs kyi mi mthun phyogs rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'khrul ba'i skabs yod do zhes pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun phyogs la gtan tshigs kyi mi mthun phyogs rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There, there is the possibility of error means that the contrary of the reason is shown with regard to the contrary of the probandum.

original: gang gi yang chos mi mthun pa nyid kho nas yin pa de'i yang thun mong ma yin pa gtan tshigs nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi yang chos mi mthun pa nyid kho nas yin pa de'i yang thun mong ma yin pa gtan tshigs nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: And if it is the dissimilarity of both, then it follows that the uncommon reason itself is the example.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la gtan tshigs yod par gyur pa nyid ma bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la gtan tshigs yod par gyur pa nyid ma bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the presence of the reason in similar instances has not been stated.

original: gang gi yang gnyis ka brjod @226b bar bya ba de la mi srid de /
analyzed: gang gi yang gnyis ka brjod @226b bar bya ba de la mi srid de /
translated: And if it is the expression of both, that is impossible.

original: gnyi gar gnyi ga brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi gar gnyi ga brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because both are the expression of both.

original: dang po dang tha ma'i gsum pa'i dpe brjod phyi ma dag la zhes ba /
analyzed: dang po dang tha ma'i gsum pa'i dpe brjod phyi ma dag la zhes ba /
translated: The last examples of the first and third are stated in the last two.

original: dang po gsum gyi dper brjod phyi ma ni mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir rtsol ma thag tu byung pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dang po gsum gyi dper brjod phyi ma ni mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir rtsol ma thag tu byung pa zhes pa'o //
translated: The last examples of the first three are ‚Äúbecause of impermanence‚Äù and ‚Äúbecause of arising immediately after exertion.‚Äù

original: 'di la bum pa la sogs pa chos mthun pa nyid kyis dpe dang / nam mkha' la sogs pa chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi sa te /
analyzed: 'di la bum pa la sogs pa chos mthun pa nyid kyis dpe dang / nam mkha' la sogs pa chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi sa te /
translated: Here, the pot, etc., are examples by similarity, and space, etc., are examples by dissimilarity.

original: dpe gnyis ka la yod na yang ma nges pa nyid de /
analyzed: dpe gnyis ka la yod na yang ma nges pa nyid de /
translated: If both examples exist, it is still uncertain,

original: glog la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: glog la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because lightning, etc., exist in the dissimilar class.

original: mtha' ma gsum la dpe brjod phyi ma ni reg par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rtag go zhes pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' ma gsum la dpe brjod phyi ma ni reg par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rtag go zhes pa ste /
translated: The latter three are always so, because they are not to be touched.

original: 'di la yang nam mkha' la sogs pa chos mthun pa nyid kyis dpe dang / chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis bum pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang nam mkha' la sogs pa chos mthun pa nyid kyis dpe dang / chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis bum pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Here, space, etc. are examples by way of similarity, and pots, etc. are examples by way of dissimilarity.

original: de lta na yang las la sogs pa mi mthun phyogs la yod pa'i phyir ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang las la sogs pa mi mthun phyogs la yod pa'i phyir ma nges pa'o //
translated: Still, because of the existence of karma, etc. in the opposite class, there is no certainty.

original: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya gnyis mi ldan//
analyzed: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya gnyis mi ldan//
translated: The reason is not endowed with the two, the probandum.

original: zhes pa gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya dang gnyis po ni gtan tshigs bsgrub bya gnyis te /
analyzed: zhes pa gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya dang gnyis po ni gtan tshigs bsgrub bya gnyis te /
translated: The two, the reason and the probandum, are the reason and the probandum.

original: de dang mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dang mi ldan pa'o //
translated: It is not endowed with those two.

original: yang gnyis ni gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya'o //
analyzed: yang gnyis ni gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya'o //
translated: The two are the reason and the probandum.

original: 'di ci las she na /
analyzed: 'di ci las she na /
translated: What is this from?

original: 'di kho na skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / gzhan yang ma thos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di kho na skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / gzhan yang ma thos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this is the very occasion, and also because the others are not heard.

original: de yi mi mthun phyogs med byas //
analyzed: de yi mi mthun phyogs med byas //
translated: The opposite class is not made.

original: zhes pa de'i sgras gtan tshigs nyid la sogs pa la bsnyegs shing /
analyzed: zhes pa de'i sgras gtan tshigs nyid la sogs pa la bsnyegs shing /
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù is extended to the reason, etc.

original: mi mthun phyogs kyi sgras 'dir gtan tshigs nyid la sogs pa med pa tsam brjod par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs kyi sgras 'dir gtan tshigs nyid la sogs pa med pa tsam brjod par 'dod pa ste /
translated: The words ‚Äúnon-concordant side‚Äù here are intended to express the mere absence of the reason, etc.

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa med pa dang bral ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa med pa dang bral ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the reason, etc. are not absent, are not lacking.

original: rjes 'gro zlog pa rnam gnyis dag / ces pa chos mthun pa nyid dang / chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi bye brag las so //
analyzed: rjes 'gro zlog pa rnam gnyis dag / ces pa chos mthun pa nyid dang / chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi bye brag las so //
translated: The two, the forward and reverse pervasions, are due to the distinction of the similar and the dissimilar.

original: der snang ba zhes pa dpe ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: der snang ba zhes pa dpe ltar snang ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Appearing there‚Äù is a pseudo-example.

original: rjes 'gro med pa yang zhes pa /
analyzed: rjes 'gro med pa yang zhes pa /
translated: ‚Äú Also without forward pervasion‚Äù

original: yang gi sgra ni sdud pa la'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni sdud pa la'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù includes the reverse pervasion.

original: rnam gnyis dag ces 'jug go //
analyzed: rnam gnyis dag ces 'jug go //
translated: ‚Äú The two‚Äù are the forward and reverse pervasions.

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa yang dpe ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa yang dpe ltar snang ba ste /
translated: ‚Äú Also without forward pervasion‚Äù is a pseudo-example.

original: de yang gang du bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag dang de'i mi mthun phyogs dag lhan cig 'byung ba tsam ston par byed kyi khyab pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang gang du bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag dang de'i mi mthun phyogs dag lhan cig 'byung ba tsam ston par byed kyi khyab pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is a pseudo-example when it merely shows the co-occurrence of the probandum and the probans and their discordant sides, but does not show the pervasion.

original: gzhan rnams ni rnam gnyis zhes pa 'di yang gi sgras sdud par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni rnam gnyis zhes pa 'di yang gi sgras sdud par byed pa ste /
translated: The others are included by the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúthe two.‚Äù

original: rjes 'gro med pa yang @227a * //
analyzed: rjes 'gro med pa yang @227a * //
translated: Nor is there concomitance.

original: chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi bye brag las rnam pa gnyis so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi bye brag las rnam pa gnyis so zhes zer ro //
translated: It is twofold by the distinction of similarity and dissimilarity.

original: 'o na chos can ma grub pa yang dpe ltar snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na chos can ma grub pa yang dpe ltar snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: Well, isn't the unestablished subject also a pseudo-example?

original: de yang 'dir ma bsdus te /
analyzed: de yang 'dir ma bsdus te /
translated: And that is not included here.

original: de'i phyir yang ma khyab pa nyid do zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang ma khyab pa nyid do zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is not pervasion.

original: gnyis ka dang mi ldan pa zhes pa 'di kho nas don gyis na chos mthun pa nyid nye bar drangs pas chos can ma grub pa yang dpe ltar snang ba nyid du bshad do //
analyzed: gnyis ka dang mi ldan pa zhes pa 'di kho nas don gyis na chos mthun pa nyid nye bar drangs pas chos can ma grub pa yang dpe ltar snang ba nyid du bshad do //
translated: He says: By this alone, devoid of both, the similarity is implicitly drawn, and the unestablished subject is explained as a pseudo-example.

original: nam mkha' la sogs pa rtag par khas ma blangs pa la ni gnyis ka dang ldan pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa rtag par khas ma blangs pa la ni gnyis ka dang ldan pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible for the unaccepted permanent things such as space to have both.

original: chos mthun pa nyid nye bar drangs pa smos pa ni /
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid nye bar drangs pa smos pa ni /
translated: The mention of the implicit similarity is

original: de med pa'i phyir de las mi 'jug pa las zhes pa chos mi mthun pa nyid nye bar blangs pa ni chos can ma grub pa la skyon med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir de las mi 'jug pa las zhes pa chos mi mthun pa nyid nye bar blangs pa ni chos can ma grub pa la skyon med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is not the case, the statement ‚Äúbecause it does not engage in that‚Äù is a non-homologous example, because there is no fault in the non-establishment of the subject.

original: dper na kha cig zer pa zhes pa bye brag pa rnams so //
analyzed: dper na kha cig zer pa zhes pa bye brag pa rnams so //
translated: For example, ‚Äúsome say‚Äù refers to the Vai≈õe·π£ikas.

original: 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i dpe ltar snang ba ni de rnams kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid kyis yongs su bsdus pa ma yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i dpe ltar snang ba ni de rnams kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid kyis yongs su bsdus pa ma yin no zhes ston to //
translated: This shows that a non-pervasive example is not included by their definition of an example.

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa med ces pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa med ces pa la sogs pas /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the absence of reasons, etc.‚Äù

original: 'di rnams dpe ltar snang ba nyid yin pa la gtan tshigs gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di rnams dpe ltar snang ba nyid yin pa la gtan tshigs gsungs so //
translated: This states the reason why these are only seemingly similar to examples.

original: gtan tshigs gang rnams kyi dang po yin pa de 'di rnams ni gtan tshigs la sogs pa rnams te sogs pa'i sgras ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya'i mtshan nyid gnyis dang / de rnams kyi mi mthun phyogs gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gang rnams kyi dang po yin pa de 'di rnams ni gtan tshigs la sogs pa rnams te sogs pa'i sgras ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya'i mtshan nyid gnyis dang / de rnams kyi mi mthun phyogs gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Those that are the first of the reasons are these reasons, etc. The term ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the probandum, the two characteristics of the reason and the probandum, and the identification of their discordant classes.

original: 'di la gtan tshigs la sogs pa rnams yod pa ma yin pas na gtan tshigs sogs med do //
analyzed: 'di la gtan tshigs la sogs pa rnams yod pa ma yin pas na gtan tshigs sogs med do //
translated: Since reasons, etc. do not exist in this, there are no reasons, etc.

original: de 'di ni dpe min pa ste /
analyzed: de 'di ni dpe min pa ste /
translated: This is not an example,

original: de'i mtshan nyid mi brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid mi brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its definition is not supported.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ni dpe'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ni dpe'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: For this is the definition of an example:

original: gtan tshigs la bsgrub bya rjes su 'gro ba dang gang du med ba la med pa yang ston par byed pa'o zhes pa 'di 'di rnams la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la bsgrub bya rjes su 'gro ba dang gang du med ba la med pa yang ston par byed pa'o zhes pa 'di 'di rnams la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: it shows that the probandum is concomitant with the reason and that where the reason does not exist, the probandum also does not exist. But this is not the case for these.

original: rjes 'gro phyin ci log sogs pa'i //
analyzed: rjes 'gro phyin ci log sogs pa'i //
translated: Because of the pervasion being reversed, etc.

original: zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgras rjes su 'gro ba med pa yongs su bsdu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgras rjes su 'gro ba med pa yongs su bsdu'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù in ‚Äúbecause of the pervasion being reversed, etc.‚Äù includes the absence of pervasion.

original: yang ci'i phyir rjes 'gro phyin ci log la sogs pa dpe ltar snang ba yin te /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir rjes 'gro phyin ci log la sogs pa dpe ltar snang ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, why are the reversed pervasion, etc. seeming examples?

original: ji srid du 'di la skyon 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji srid du 'di la skyon 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: As long as there is no fault in this, one may say, ‚ÄúIt is not so.‚Äù

original: nye bar bsdu ba ma 'brel ba zhes pa ste /
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba ma 'brel ba zhes pa ste /
translated: The summary is ‚Äúdisconnected.‚Äù

original: gal te yang don gyi skyon med pa @227b de lta na'ang nye bar bsdu ba dang ma 'brel pa'i phyir dpe ltar snang ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gal te yang don gyi skyon med pa @227b de lta na'ang nye bar bsdu ba dang ma 'brel pa'i phyir dpe ltar snang ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Even if there is no fault in the meaning, it is a pseudo-example because it is not related to the conclusion.

original: nye bar bsdu ba ni med na mi 'byung ba nyid de /
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba ni med na mi 'byung ba nyid de /
translated: The conclusion is the invariable concomitance.

original: thams cad du sgrub par byed pa la bsgrub par bya ba nye bar bsdu ba ste nye bar 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du sgrub par byed pa la bsgrub par bya ba nye bar bsdu ba ste nye bar 'dren pa'o //
translated: In every case, the probandum is concluded, that is, inferred, from the probans.

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pa na yang gtan tshigs med pa'i'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pa na yang gtan tshigs med pa'i'o //
translated: When the probandum is absent, the probans is also absent.

original: de dang ma 'brel ba ni rnam par bral ba'o //
analyzed: de dang ma 'brel ba ni rnam par bral ba'o //
translated: Not related to that is being separated from it.

original: yang ci'i phyir nye bar bsdu ba dang ma 'brel ba yin zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir nye bar bsdu ba dang ma 'brel ba yin zhen gsungs pa /
translated: Again, why is it not related to the conclusion? It is said:

original: 'brel pa rab tu ma bstan phyir //üîΩzhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa rab tu ma bstan phyir // zhes pa ste /
translated: Because the relation is not taught.

original: 'brel ba ni med na mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel ba ni med na mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: The relation is the invariable concomitance.

original: de yod du zin kyang rab tu ston pa ni rjes 'gro phyin ci log la sogs pa la srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yod du zin kyang rab tu ston pa ni rjes 'gro phyin ci log la sogs pa la srid pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if that exists, the teaching is not possible in the case of a mistaken pervasion, etc.

original: de'i phyir 'di nye bar bsdu ba dang ma 'brel ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di nye bar bsdu ba dang ma 'brel ba'o zhes pa'o //

original: de dag gi 'brel pa ston pa dpe'o zhes pa /
analyzed: de dag gi 'brel pa ston pa dpe'o zhes pa /

original: de dag gi ste de 'dra ba dang de med na mi 'byung ba'i bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag gi 'brel pa ste med na mi 'byung ba nyid gang gis nges par ston pa de dpe'o //
analyzed: de dag gi ste de 'dra ba dang de med na mi 'byung ba'i bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag gi 'brel pa ste med na mi 'byung ba nyid gang gis nges par ston pa de dpe'o //
translated: The example is that which shows the relation, the invariable concomitance, of the probandum and the probans, which are like that, i.e., where the probandum is absent if the probans is absent.

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo ston pa gsungs pa /

analyzed: gang 'di rjod par byed pa dper na bum pa bzhin zhes pa ste /
translated: That which is the expression, e.g., ‚Äúlike a pot,‚Äù

original: ngag gang gis 'brel pa nges par ston pa de dpe'o //
analyzed: ngag gang gis 'brel pa nges par ston pa de dpe'o //
translated: is the example, the statement by which the relation is shown.

original: yang de ci 'dri ba zhig ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang de ci 'dri ba zhig ce na gsungs pa /
translated: Again, what is that like? It is stated:

original: gang rtsol ba las byung ba de mi rtag pa'o zhe'o //
analyzed: gang rtsol ba las byung ba de mi rtag pa'o zhe'o //
translated: That which arises from effort is impermanent.

original: de lta na yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Even so, etc.

original: de ltar yang mtshan nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa yin na dper na bum pa bzhin pa 'di mi rigs te /üîΩdpe nyid du dper brjod par te /
analyzed: de ltar yang mtshan nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa yin na dper na bum pa bzhin pa 'di mi rigs te / dpe nyid du dper brjod par te /
translated: Even so, if it is conceptualization of the definition, ‚Äúlike a pot,‚Äù this is not correct.üîΩThe example is the illustration of the example.

original: dpe ngag tu brjod bar smra ba'i'o //
analyzed: dpe ngag tu brjod bar smra ba'i'o //
translated: The example is the statement of the example.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that? It is stated:

original: nges par bstan par bya ba ni dpe ma yin pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: nges par bstan par bya ba ni dpe ma yin pa'i phyir zhes pa /

original: bstan par 'os pa na nges par bstan par bya ba ste /
analyzed: bstan par 'os pa na nges par bstan par bya ba ste /

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i don to //

original: gang 'di rjod par byed pa zhes pa'i tshig las /
analyzed: gang 'di rjod par byed pa zhes pa'i tshig las /

original: de'i dpe nyid med do //
analyzed: de'i dpe nyid med do //

analyzed: dper na bum pa bzhin zhes pa 'dis kyang brjod par bya ba kho na brjod do /
translated: By this, ‚Äúlike a pot,‚Äù only the expressed is expressed.

original: de las kyang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de las kyang mi rigs te /
translated: That is also unreasonable.

original: rjod par byed ba la dpe nyid du brjod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / don gyi bdag nyid kyang dper brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rjod par byed ba la dpe nyid du brjod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / don gyi bdag nyid kyang dper brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the expression itself is expressed as an example, and the meaning itself is expressed as an example.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod dper na bum pa bzhin zhes pa 'dis sa rjod par byed pa kho na 'dir dpe nyid du dper brjod de /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod dper na bum pa bzhin zhes pa 'dis sa rjod par byed pa kho na 'dir dpe nyid du dper brjod de /
translated: ‚ÄúThat is so. By this, ‚Äòlike a pot,‚Äô only the expression is expressed here as an example.

original: bum pa zhes pa'i tshig 'di'i tshig gi don ni rang gi ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: bum pa zhes pa'i tshig 'di'i tshig gi don ni rang gi ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Because the meaning of the word ‚Äòpot‚Äô is its own nature.‚Äù

analyzed: @228a * // 'di tsam gyis kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúEven by this much‚Äù and so on.

analyzed: dper na bum pa bzhin zhes pa'i tshig 'di tsam gyis med na mi 'byung ba nyid nges par bstan par mi nus te /

analyzed: de'i phyir 'di yang dpe nyid du mi rigs so //

original: de dag gi zhes brjod mi bya //
analyzed: de dag gi zhes brjod mi bya //

original: zhes pa 'di la brjod par mi byed pa la rgyu nges par bstan pa ma yin no zhes dris pa /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di la brjod par mi byed pa la rgyu nges par bstan pa ma yin no zhes dris pa /
translated: Here, it is asked, ‚ÄúIs it not the case that the reason is demonstrated by ‚Äòshould not be said‚Äô?‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa'o //
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu gsungs pa /
analyzed: rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: The reason is stated:

original: phan tshun bsgrub bya nyid ma gyur //
analyzed: phan tshun bsgrub bya nyid ma gyur //

analyzed: zhes pa'o // med na mi 'byung ba nyid ni 'brel ba yin la zhes pa /

analyzed: gzhan ni rjes su dpog pa la nye bar mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro // de yang de dag gi zhes brjod pa'i phyir /

analyzed: gnyis ka dag la yang yod do zhes dam bcas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gzhan du na bsgrub par bya bas gtan tshigs la 'brel pa nges par ston pa zhes brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de las kyang phan tshun bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de ston pa ji ltar rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

original: chos mthun tsam gyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos mthun tsam gyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy mere similarity of property,‚Äù and so on.

original: dper na bum pa bzhin zhes pa chos mthun pa nyid tsam 'dis ldog pa'i tshig med par med na mi 'byung ba nyid nges par bstan pa nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa bzhin zhes pa chos mthun pa nyid tsam 'dis ldog pa'i tshig med par med na mi 'byung ba nyid nges par bstan pa nus pa ma yin no //
translated: For example, ‚Äúlike a pot,‚Äù by this mere similarity of property, without a term of exclusion, non-occurrence cannot be taught.

analyzed: don gyis go bas zhes pa la sogs pa ni chos mthun pa nyid kyi sbyor ba kho nas khyab pa nye bar bstan pa na shugs kyis ldog pa rtogs pa kho na ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBy implication,‚Äù and so on, is that by the mere application of similarity, when pervasion is taught, the exclusion is only understood by implication.

original: 'di kho na ston par byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di kho na ston par byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: This is precisely what is taught, as stated:

original: gang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: de yang gzhan kho na las grub po zhes pas brjod par bya ba ma yin no //

analyzed: 'di 'gyur mod //

analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi sbyor ba bstan pa'i don du 'di brjod pa'o zhe na gsungs pa /

original: de mi mthun phyogs med mi 'byung //
analyzed: de mi mthun phyogs med mi 'byung //

original: 'brel pa la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAlso in the case of the relation,‚Äù and so on.

analyzed: gal te khyod kyis yongs su brtags pa'i chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi sbyor bas bsgrub bya rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur na mdzes te /
translated: If the probandum were to be accepted by the application of the counter-correlate that you imagine, that would be fine.

original: de rab tu bstan @228b pa'i don du 'bad pa yin na /
analyzed: de rab tu bstan @228b pa'i don du 'bad pa yin na /
translated: If the effort were for the sake of demonstrating that,

analyzed: de yang med do zhes pas 'di mi rigs so //
translated: that would not exist, and so this is unreasonable.

analyzed: gal te rtag pa rtsol ba las ma byung ba'o zhes ba bsgrub par ston par byed na rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ma yin pa cis she na /
translated: If one were to demonstrate the proof of ‚Äúthe permanent is not arisen from effort,‚Äù why would it not be the case that it is not the pervasion?

original: de yis gzhan ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de yis gzhan ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that, the other . . .‚Äù and so on.

original: de las gzhan rab tu bsgrub pa yang ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de las gzhan rab tu bsgrub pa yang ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: He states the demonstration of the proof of the other.

original: dam ma bcas pa kho na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dam ma bcas pa kho na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: rtag pa nyid dang rtsol ba las ma byung ba dag gi 'brel ba rab tu ston pa na de dag kho na'i bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po bstan par 'gyur gyi gtan tshigs snga ma la phan 'dogs pa 'ga' zhig ni ma yin
analyzed: rtag pa nyid dang rtsol ba las ma byung ba dag gi 'brel ba rab tu ston pa na de dag kho na'i bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po bstan par 'gyur gyi gtan tshigs snga ma la phan 'dogs pa 'ga' zhig ni ma yin
translated: When the relation of permanence and not arisen from effort is demonstrated, only the relation of the probandum and the proof is shown, but it is not the case that there is any benefit to the former reason.

analyzed: no // 'dir 'gyur mod sgrub pas kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi 'brel ba rab tu ston pa na phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba kho na ste /

analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya bas khyab ba rab tu ston pa ni gtan tshigs la rjes su 'dzin par yin pas so //

analyzed: cig shos la ma yin te /

analyzed: 'gal ba dag gcig la mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na gsungs pa /

analyzed: bsgrub pas kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: 'dis mdo sde pa'i phyogs la brten pa'i khas blangs pa nyams pa gsungs so //

original: phan tshun med na mi 'byung ba'ang //
analyzed: phan tshun med na mi 'byung ba'ang //
translated: Also, the mutual non-arising of

analyzed: zhes pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag gi 'brel ba nges par ston pa zhes pa'i tshig las gnyis ka dag gi phan tshun du med na mi 'byung ba ste mi 'byung ba nyid bshad par bya'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The word connection in the phrase the connection of the discordant factors should be understood as meaning the mutual non-occurrence of the two, that is, the non-occurrence of the two.

analyzed: de las kyang glog la sogs pa rnams kyang rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pas khas blangs pas gnod pa'o //
translated: And from that, even lightning, etc. would be permanent, is stated, and so it is contradicted by what is accepted.

original: rtsol ba las skyas so zhes pa rtsol skyes te /
analyzed: rtsol ba las skyas so zhes pa rtsol skyes te /

analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: de nas dngos po'i rkyen no //

analyzed: reg par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir sgra rtag pa ste blo bzhin zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ma grub pa nyid do //

analyzed: bum pa bzhin zhes pa bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi @229a * //
translated: Like a pot is the probandum and because of being a product is the probative sign.

original: chos ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: chos ma grub pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLike a pot‚Äù is a nonestablished property of the thesis and the proof.

original: 'di 'brel pa tsam brjod pa ni zhes pa la /
analyzed: 'di 'brel pa tsam brjod pa ni zhes pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThis is merely the expression of a connection‚Äù means that

translated: from the words ‚Äúwhat is expressed,‚Äù the connection between the thesis and the proof is what is to be taught, and that is what is asserted as the example.

analyzed: bstan par bya ba bum pa la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
