analyzed: de'i phyir de ma grub pa'i don can nyid kyis dpe ltar snang ba nyid du smra bar rigs pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable to say that it is a pseudoexample because it has a meaning that is not established.

original: 'di skad du brjod par bya zhes pa /üîΩ'brel brjod par byed pa'i ngag dpe nyid na /
analyzed: 'di skad du brjod par bya zhes pa / 'brel brjod par byed pa'i ngag dpe nyid na /
translated: ‚ÄúThis is said‚Äù means thatüîΩif the statement that expresses the connection is itself the example,

original: rjod par byed pa kho na 'brel pa ston par mi nus pa gang yin pa de kho na dpe ltar snang ba nyid du rigs so //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa kho na 'brel pa ston par mi nus pa gang yin pa de kho na dpe ltar snang ba nyid du rigs so //
translated: then it is reasonable to say that only what is able to teach the connection is a pseudoexample.

original: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log ston pa'i rjod par byed pa kho na dpe ltar snang ba nyid du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log ston pa'i rjod par byed pa kho na dpe ltar snang ba nyid du brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, only a statement that teaches a reversed concomitance should be called a pseudo-example.

original: gang rtag pa de reg pa dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes slob par byed do //
analyzed: gang rtag pa de reg pa dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes slob par byed do //
translated: It teaches that whatever is permanent is not in contact.üîΩWhat is the reason that this is a pseudo-example? It is said:

original: yang 'di dpe ltar snang ba yin pa'i rgyu ci zhe na gsungs pa 'dis ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang 'di dpe ltar snang ba yin pa'i rgyu ci zhe na gsungs pa 'dis ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: By this.

original: gcig nyid ma yin zhes pa la sogs pas blo dang bum pa dag dpe ltar snang ba nyid du khas blangs nas mtshan nyid ma khyab pa nyid du ston to //
analyzed: gcig nyid ma yin zhes pa la sogs pas blo dang bum pa dag dpe ltar snang ba nyid du khas blangs nas mtshan nyid ma khyab pa nyid du ston to //
translated: By ‚Äúnot one‚Äù and so forth, having accepted that the mind and the pot are pseudo-examples, he shows that the definition is not pervaded.

original: gang gi phyir ma grub pa'i don can nyid kho na dpe'i skyon ma yin no zhes /üîΩgtan tshigs bsgrub bya gnyis mi ldan ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir ma grub pa'i don can nyid kho na dpe'i skyon ma yin no zhes / gtan tshigs bsgrub bya gnyis mi ldan ;
translated: Since it is not the case that only having an unestablished meaning is a fault of the example,

original: / zhes pa la sogs pas nye bar bstan zin to /
analyzed: / zhes pa la sogs pas nye bar bstan zin to /
translated: it has been demonstrated by ‚ÄúThe reason and the probandum are not related‚Äù and so forth.

original: // / bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid las zhes pa la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya ba ni sgra la sogs pa chos can no //
analyzed: // / bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid las zhes pa la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya ba ni sgra la sogs pa chos can no //
translated: The statement from the similarity to the probandum and so on is as follows: The probandum is the subject, such as sound, and so on.

original: de dang chos mthun pa nyid ni gang byas pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de dang chos mthun pa nyid ni gang byas pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: The similarity to that is being produced and so on.

original: sgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid de las de'i chos rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid de las de'i chos rtogs pa ste /
translated: From that similarity to the probandum, there is the understanding of its property.

original: bsgrub par bya ba de'i chos mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba de'i chos mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: The property of that probandum is impermanence and so on.

original: de'i chos rtogs shing go bar byed pa'i ngang tshul 'di'i yin pa zhes pa ni de'i chos rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i chos rtogs shing go bar byed pa'i ngang tshul 'di'i yin pa zhes pa ni de'i chos rtogs pa ste /
translated: The one who has the nature of causing the understanding and realization of that property is the one who understands that property.

original: 'jig rten pa'i yongs su rtogs par byed pa po rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i yongs su rtogs par byed pa po rnams kyi'o //
translated: It is of those who cause worldly understanding.

original: don gang la blo ma mtshungs pa de dpe ste bum pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: don gang la blo ma mtshungs pa de dpe ste bum pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The object to which the mind is not equal is the example, such as a pot and so on.

original: de dpe brjod de /
analyzed: de dpe brjod de /
translated: That is the statement of the example.

original: dper brjod par bya ba'o zhes pas na dpe brjod do //
analyzed: dper brjod par bya ba'o zhes pas na dpe brjod do //
translated: Since it is to be stated as an example, it is the statement of the example.

original: yang na 'dis bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i chos dag gi 'brel ba dper brjod par bya'o zhes pa dpe brjod do //
analyzed: yang na 'dis bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i chos dag gi 'brel ba dper brjod par bya'o zhes pa dpe brjod do //
translated: Or, it is a statement of an example of the relation between the property to be established and the property that establishes it.

original: de las bzlog @229b pa las kyang phyin ci log go zhes pa dpe ste dper brjod pa'o zhes rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: de las bzlog @229b pa las kyang phyin ci log go zhes pa dpe ste dper brjod pa'o zhes rjes su 'jug go //
translated: The opposite of that is the opposite example.

original: de las zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid la snyeg go //üîΩde las zlog pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mi mthun pa nyid do //
analyzed: de las zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid la snyeg go // de las zlog pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mi mthun pa nyid do //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the similarity to the property to be established.üîΩThe opposite of that is the dissimilarity to the property to be established.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mi mthun pa nyid de las dpe phyin ci log gi dpe brjod de /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mi mthun pa nyid de las dpe phyin ci log gi dpe brjod de /
translated: From that dissimilarity to the property to be established, an opposite example is stated.

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe brjod do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe brjod do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that an example of dissimilarity is stated.

original: sgra mi rtag ba bsgrub pa la byas pa nyid kyi phyir /üîΩbum pa bzhin dang nam mkha' bzhin //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ba bsgrub pa la byas pa nyid kyi phyir / bum pa bzhin dang nam mkha' bzhin //
translated: In the proof of sound as impermanent because of being produced,üîΩthe example is like a pot and like space,

original: zhes pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: respectively.

original: 'di la yang zhes pa rtsod pa bsgrub pa la skyon yod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi ;
analyzed: 'di la yang zhes pa rtsod pa bsgrub pa la skyon yod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi ;
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù means that not only is there a fault in the proof of the thesis,

original: 'o na ci zhe na 'di la yang ngo zhes pa yang gi sgra'i don to //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na 'di la yang ngo zhes pa yang gi sgra'i don to //
translated: but also in this case, this is the meaning of the word ‚Äúalso.‚Äù

original: gal te gtan tshigs kyi don las dpe la sogs pa kho na yin na gtan tshigs kyi phyogs gcig ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs kyi don las dpe la sogs pa kho na yin na gtan tshigs kyi phyogs gcig ma yin te /
translated: If the example and so on are only the meaning of the reason, then it is not a part of the reason.

original: de ltar gyur na kho bo'i sbyor ba bzhin du de gtan tshigs kyi don dang rjes su 'brel pa nyid du gdon mi za bar brjod par bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na kho bo'i sbyor ba bzhin du de gtan tshigs kyi don dang rjes su 'brel pa nyid du gdon mi za bar brjod par bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were the case, then, like my syllogism, it would not be necessary to state that it is necessarily related to the meaning of the reason.

original: de la skyon ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la skyon ci zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is the fault in that? It is said:

original: de lta na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven so,‚Äù and so on.

original: yang ci ltar chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid dag med par nam mkha' dpe nyid du thal bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci ltar chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid dag med par nam mkha' dpe nyid du thal bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it that, if similarity and dissimilarity do not exist, it follows that space is the example? It is said:

original: yod pa nyid do zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: yod pa nyid do zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
translated: ‚ÄúIt exists,‚Äù and so on.

original: nam mkha' la yang bsgrub par bya ba sgra dang chos mthun pa nyid kyang yod pa nyid dang reg par bya ba nyid la sogs pa yod cing /
analyzed: nam mkha' la yang bsgrub par bya ba sgra dang chos mthun pa nyid kyang yod pa nyid dang reg par bya ba nyid la sogs pa yod cing /
translated: Also, space has the property of being sound, and it has the property of being touchable, and so on.

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyang mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid dang skye ldan ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyang mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid dang skye ldan ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: It has the property of not being audible, of not being a living being, and so on.

original: de las kyang gcig kho na dpe gnyis ka nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /üîΩgang las chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid 'di las dper ma yin par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: de las kyang gcig kho na dpe gnyis ka nyid du thal bar 'gyur te / gang las chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid 'di las dper ma yin par 'gyur ba /
translated: And from that, it follows that one thing is both an example and not an example.

original: 'di la khyad par cung zad nye bar blangs pa ni med pas so //
analyzed: 'di la khyad par cung zad nye bar blangs pa ni med pas so //
translated: Because it is not the case that there is the slightest difference in the property of the subject, the property of the example, and the property of the counter-example.

original: 'o na nam mkha' la chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe nyid yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na nam mkha' la chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe nyid yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt space itself the counter-example?

original: de'i phyir thal bar 'gyur bas ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir thal bar 'gyur bas ci yin zhe na /
translated: So what is the point of this consequence?

original: gang gi las kyang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi las kyang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dgongs pa ste /
translated: The point is that it follows that space itself is the counter-example.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid nye bar bkod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid nye bar bkod pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the non-audibility is stated.

original: snga mas zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid las de'i chos @230a * //
analyzed: snga mas zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid las de'i chos @230a * //
translated: The word former refers to the fact that the property of the probandum is understood from the similarity to the property-possessor.

original: rtogs pas zhes pa 'dis dang / bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mi mthun pa nyid las de'i chos rtogs pa zhes pa 'dis kyang ngo //
analyzed: rtogs pas zhes pa 'dis dang / bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mi mthun pa nyid las de'i chos rtogs pa zhes pa 'dis kyang ngo //
translated: The word understood refers to the fact that the property of the probandum is understood from the dissimilarity to the property-possessor.

original: 'di yang snga ma nyid de /
analyzed: 'di yang snga ma nyid de /
translated: This is also the former.

original: mdo'i lhag ma la ltos bas so //üîΩgang gi phyir 'di ltar zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: mdo'i lhag ma la ltos bas so // gang gi phyir 'di ltar zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: Because it depends on the remainder of the s≈´tra.

original: chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid mi smos pa'i rgyu gsungs so //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid mi smos pa'i rgyu gsungs so //
translated: The reason why similarity and dissimilarity are not mentioned is stated by because of this... and so on.

original: phyi rol gyi don nye bar ma bsdus pa zhes pa chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid tsam las gzhan pa'i don ni phyi rol gyi don te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don nye bar ma bsdus pa zhes pa chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid tsam las gzhan pa'i don ni phyi rol gyi don te /
translated: The meaning of external object not included is that the object other than mere similarity and dissimilarity is the external object,

original: de yang khyab pa ste med na mi 'byung ba nyid do zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de yang khyab pa ste med na mi 'byung ba nyid do zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: and that is the pervasion, the invariable concomitance.

original: de'i nye bar bsdus pa ni rtogs par bya ba'i yul nyid du nye bar sbyar ba ste /
analyzed: de'i nye bar bsdus pa ni rtogs par bya ba'i yul nyid du nye bar sbyar ba ste /
translated: Its summary is applied as the object of understanding.

original: gsal bar byed pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it clarifies.

original: de med na dpe la go bar byed pa nyid med do zhes pa dag gi don to //
analyzed: de med na dpe la go bar byed pa nyid med do zhes pa dag gi don to //
translated: The meaning is that if that does not exist, there is no exemplification.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi de'i chos rtogs pa zhes pa 'di kho nas khyab pa yang thob pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi de'i chos rtogs pa zhes pa 'di kho nas khyab pa yang thob pa kho na ste /
translated: That is so, but the pervasion is also obtained just by this alone, the understanding of its property.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na de'i chos rtogs pa nyid mi srid pas so zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na de'i chos rtogs pa nyid mi srid pas so zhe na /
translated: Otherwise, the understanding of its property itself is impossible.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: de'i chos rtogs pa nyid du yang ma grub pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i chos rtogs pa nyid du yang ma grub pa zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not established as the understanding of its property itself.

original: 'am zhes pa ni rnam par brtags pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'am zhes pa ni rnam par brtags pa'i don to //
translated: Or has the meaning of an examination.

original: chos mthun pa nyid can dang chos mi mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe ma smros pa'am zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid can dang chos mi mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe ma smros pa'am zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of or is that the example with similarity and the example with dissimilarity are not stated.

original: ji ltar de med par de mi srid pa'i phyir de'i chos rtogs pa nyid kyis khyab pa 'phangs pa de ltar chos mthun pa nyid la sogs pa yang /
analyzed: ji ltar de med par de mi srid pa'i phyir de'i chos rtogs pa nyid kyis khyab pa 'phangs pa de ltar chos mthun pa nyid la sogs pa yang /
translated: Just as the pervasion by the understanding of its property is implied because it is impossible without that, so also similarity and so on.

original: de med par de srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de med par de srid pa ma yin te /
translated: Without that, it is not possible.

original: de'i phyir yang de smos par bya ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang de smos par bya ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not to be mentioned.

original: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa de'i chos rtogs pa nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa de'i chos rtogs pa nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúIf it is not so,‚Äù etc., the so-called ‚Äúrealization of its property‚Äù

original: bsgrub par bya ba mngon par gsal bar nus pa nyid de /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba mngon par gsal bar nus pa nyid de /
translated: is the very ability to manifest the probandum.

original: de yang yin lag thams cad kyi thun mong ba'o zhes pas /
analyzed: de yang yin lag thams cad kyi thun mong ba'o zhes pas /
translated: And that is common to all the members.

original: de'i chos rtags pa'i dpe brjod do zhes pa 'di tsam brjod pa na /
analyzed: de'i chos rtags pa'i dpe brjod do zhes pa 'di tsam brjod pa na /
translated: Therefore, the example of the property of that is stated.

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang dpe nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang dpe nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: When just this much is stated, the example is also of the reason, etc.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs la sogs pa rnams las lhag ma khyad par du bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs la sogs pa rnams las lhag ma khyad par du bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, the remainder is to be distinguished from the reason, etc.

original: snga mas zhes pa yang skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir na lhag ma snga mas zhes rnams par shes par bya zhing /
analyzed: snga mas zhes pa yang skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir na lhag ma snga mas zhes rnams par shes par bya zhing /
translated: Since the previous one is also the context, the remainder is to be understood by the previous one.

original: de yang chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid do //
translated: And that is the similarity and dissimilarity of the property.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid las de'i @230b chos rtogs pa gang yin pa de'i dpe de dpe brjod pa ste /
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid las de'i @230b chos rtogs pa gang yin pa de'i dpe de dpe brjod pa ste /
translated: The example of that is the statement of the example of that which is the understanding of its property from the similarity and dissimilarity of properties.

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not the reason, etc.

original: don med pa nyid la rigs pa ma brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don med pa nyid la rigs pa ma brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the uselessness is not stated as a reason.üîΩBut in the case of the useful, there is a reason, he thinks.

original: don dang bcas pa nyid la yang 'thad pa yod do zhes sems bzhin pas smras pa /
analyzed: don dang bcas pa nyid la yang 'thad pa yod do zhes sems bzhin pas smras pa /
translated: He says:

original: ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
translated: How?

original: / de'i chos rtogs pa nyid kyis ni zhes pa la sogs pas 'thad pa de ston to //
analyzed: / de'i chos rtogs pa nyid kyis ni zhes pa la sogs pas 'thad pa de ston to //
translated: He shows that reason, beginning with ‚ÄúBecause of the understanding of its property, etc.‚Äù

original: bsgrub bya dang chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid dang ldan pa'i don la zhes pa /
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid dang ldan pa'i don la zhes pa /
translated: The meaning of the possession of the similarity and dissimilarity of properties with the probandum is

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid ni byas pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid ni byas pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: the similarity of properties with the probandum is such as being produced, etc.

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid ni de las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid ni de las bzlog pa'o //
translated: The dissimilarity of properties is the opposite of that.

original: de dang ldan pa bum pa la sogs pa dang nam mkha' la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa bum pa la sogs pa dang nam mkha' la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: The possession of that is such as the pot, etc., and such as the sky, etc.

original: rim pa ji lta bar bsgrub par bya ba dang bzlog pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid thob bo //
analyzed: rim pa ji lta bar bsgrub par bya ba dang bzlog pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid thob bo //
translated: One obtains the property of the probandum and the property of the counter-instance, respectively.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos dang ldan pa ste bum pa la sogs pa la dang ; bzlog pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid nam mkha' la sogs pa la thob bo //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos dang ldan pa ste bum pa la sogs pa la dang ; bzlog pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid nam mkha' la sogs pa la thob bo //
translated: The property of the probandum is the property of impermanence, etc., and the property of the counter-instance is the property of space, etc.

original: yang ci'i phyir rnyed ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir rnyed ce na gsungs pa /
translated: Again, why is it obtained? It is said:

original: gzhan du na des zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩbsgrub par bya ba de dang de las bzlog pa'i chos dang bral ba'i dpe ni de'i chos rtogs par byed pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: gzhan du na des zhes pa la sogs pa ste / bsgrub par bya ba de dang de las bzlog pa'i chos dang bral ba'i dpe ni de'i chos rtogs par byed pa ma yin pas so //
translated: Otherwise, that, etc.üîΩThe example, which is devoid of the property of the probandum and the property of the counter-instance, is not the cause of understanding that property.

original: rab tu grub pa'i de'i chos rtogs pa nyid ces pa rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba la nges pa'i chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi chos dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: rab tu grub pa'i de'i chos rtogs pa nyid ces pa rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba la nges pa'i chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi chos dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: The very understanding of that property, which is well-established, is the property of the similarity of the property and the property of the dissimilarity of the property for the proponent and the opponent.

original: rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba la nges pa bsgrub par bya ba dang de las bzlog pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid kyang rnyed do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba la nges pa bsgrub par bya ba dang de las bzlog pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid kyang rnyed do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one finds the property of the probandum and the property of the counter-pervasion in the opponent and the respondent.

original: ci ltar rnyed ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar rnyed ce na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it found? It is said:

original: bshad pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The explanation, etc.

original: blo mthun pa ni log par rtogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: blo mthun pa ni log par rtogs pa med pa'o //
translated: The agreement is the absence of misunderstanding.

original: rnam grangs phyir zhes pa yan lag thams cad ni bsgrub par bya ba khong du chud pa rgyu nyid kyi phyir de'i chos rtogs par byed pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba rnams te gang la bsgrub par bya ba mngon par gsal bar nus pa med pa de ni
analyzed: rnam grangs phyir zhes pa yan lag thams cad ni bsgrub par bya ba khong du chud pa rgyu nyid kyi phyir de'i chos rtogs par byed pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba rnams te gang la bsgrub par bya ba mngon par gsal bar nus pa med pa de ni
translated: The reason because of the enumeration is that all the members are the cause of understanding the probandum, and the expressions of the words that make one understand the property of the probandum. That which is incapable of manifesting the probandum

original: yan lag nyid du mi 'dod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: yan lag nyid du mi 'dod pa kho na'o //
translated: is not accepted as a member at all.

original: gang gi phyir yan lag thams cad ces pa la sogs pas de'i rnam grangs nyid ston par byed do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yan lag thams cad ces pa la sogs pas de'i rnam grangs nyid ston par byed do //
translated: The reason because of the enumeration is shown by because all the members, etc.

original: gang gi phyir yan lag thams cad bsgrub par bya ba'i chos rtogs par byed pa @231a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yan lag thams cad bsgrub par bya ba'i chos rtogs par byed pa @231a * //
translated: Because all the members make one understand the property of the probandum,üîΩand because the words that make one understand the property of the probandum are the cause of understanding the probandum,üîΩthe words that make one understand the property of the probandum are the members of the proof.

original: nyid yin pa de'i phyir rnam grangs so //
analyzed: nyid yin pa de'i phyir rnam grangs so //
translated: Because it is that, it is a synonym.

original: yang 'di ni ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang 'di ni ci yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, what is this?

original: skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Because it is the context,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos rtogs par byed pa zhes pa'i sgra 'di rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos rtogs par byed pa zhes pa'i sgra 'di rtogs par bya ste /
translated: the word ‚Äúrealizer‚Äù of the property of the probandum should be understood.

original: de'i chos rtogs pa nyid kho na nyid ni rnam grangs ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i chos rtogs pa nyid kho na nyid ni rnam grangs ma yin te /
translated: That very property of the probandum is not a synonym,

original: don gyi bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: don gyi bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the very nature of the object.

original: de ni sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan no //üîΩyang na de la 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan nye bar btags pa las rjod par byed pa ni /
analyzed: de ni sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan no // yang na de la 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan nye bar btags pa las rjod par byed pa ni /
translated: That is the reason for the application of the word.

original: de'i chos rtogs pa nyid kyi sgras brjod do //
analyzed: de'i chos rtogs pa nyid kyi sgras brjod do //
translated: Or, the expression ‚Äúthat very property of the probandum‚Äù is stated by the word ‚Äúrealizer‚Äù through the imputation of the reason for the application of that word.

original: de nyid kyis zhes pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBy that very‚Äù

original: de'i chos rtogs pa smos pas so //
analyzed: de'i chos rtogs pa smos pas so //
translated: means by mentioning the property of the probandum.

original: 'di zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang de las bzlog pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang de las bzlog pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù means the property of the opposite of the probandum.

original: ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i sgra'am /
analyzed: ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i sgra'am /
translated: ‚ÄúHow‚Äù means by the word that proves the probandum.

original: yan lag gi sgra ni yan lag thams cad kyi rnam grangs yin pa nyid kyi phyir 'di 'thob par nus pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: yan lag gi sgra ni yan lag thams cad kyi rnam grangs yin pa nyid kyi phyir 'di 'thob par nus pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: The term ‚Äúpart‚Äù is a synonym for all parts, and therefore it is not possible to obtain it.

original: de'i chos rtogs par byed pa'i sgra yang ngo //
analyzed: de'i chos rtogs par byed pa'i sgra yang ngo //
translated: Likewise, the term ‚Äúrealizing its property‚Äù is also so.

original: 'o na 'di med par 'di mi srid pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na 'di med par 'di mi srid pa'i phyir /
translated: Well, since this is not possible without that,

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid las 'phen pa yin te /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid las 'phen pa yin te /
translated: it is projected from the very fact of not occurring without it.

original: 'tshod pa la phru ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'tshod pa la phru ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like a pot, etc. for cooking.

original: de'i chos rtogs pa zhes pa'i sgra 'di yan lag thams cad kyi rnam grangs kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i chos rtogs pa zhes pa'i sgra 'di yan lag thams cad kyi rnam grangs kyang ma yin te /
translated: The term ‚Äúrealizing its property‚Äù is not a synonym for all parts.

original: des na 'dis 'di nus pa ma yin no zhes pa 'di cis brjod ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na 'dis 'di nus pa ma yin no zhes pa 'di cis brjod ce na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, how is it said that this is not possible by this? It is said:

original: 'di nyid gcig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid gcig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This very one, etc.

original: rigs pa gang kho na las 'di 'thob pa kho na las chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyang ste /
analyzed: rigs pa gang kho na las 'di 'thob pa kho na las chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyang ste /
translated: From just that reasoning, there is similarity of property and dissimilarity of property.

original: rigs pa de kho na ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rigs pa de kho na ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: That very reasoning is taught:

original: gzhan du na de zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: gzhan du na de zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
translated: Otherwise, that, etc.

original: / bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can zhes pa'i don zhes pa 'dis kyang de'i chos rtogs pa zhes pa 'di la /
analyzed: / bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can zhes pa'i don zhes pa 'dis kyang de'i chos rtogs pa zhes pa 'di la /
translated: The meaning of the phrase the property to be established is also indicated by the word this in the phrase the understanding of its property.

original: de'i sgras yon tan du gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'ang bsnyegs so zhes ston to //
analyzed: de'i sgras yon tan du gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'ang bsnyegs so zhes ston to //
translated: The word its also refers to the property to be established, which is a quality.

original: chos mthun pa nyid la bsnyegs so zhe na de'i sgra don med pa nyid kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid la bsnyegs so zhe na de'i sgra don med pa nyid kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: If it is said that the word its refers to similarity, then the word its would be meaningless,

original: de la mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the property of impermanence, etc., does not exist in that.

original: gnyis ka'i chos dang ldan pas kyang ma yin zhes pa /
analyzed: gnyis ka'i chos dang ldan pas kyang ma yin zhes pa /
translated: Nor is it the case that the example possesses the property of both,

original: gal de de la gnyis ka'i chos dang ldan pa'i dpes don gzhan par mdo 'di 'gyur mod /
analyzed: gal de de la gnyis ka'i chos dang ldan pa'i dpes don gzhan par mdo 'di 'gyur mod /
translated: because if this s≈´tra were to be interpreted as having a different meaning by the example possessing the property of both,üîΩthen the word its would be meaningless.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i don rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes pa na /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i don rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes pa na /
translated: This is because the meaning that is intended to be expressed is understood.

original: @231b mdo'i rnam par brtags pa nye bar bkod pa 'di ni /
analyzed: @231b mdo'i rnam par brtags pa nye bar bkod pa 'di ni /
translated: This s≈´tra analysis is set forth as follows:

original: khyab pa gsal bar byed pa 'di tsam med par bsgrub par bya ba'i don rtogs par nus pa ma yin no zhes sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: khyab pa gsal bar byed pa 'di tsam med par bsgrub par bya ba'i don rtogs par nus pa ma yin no zhes sngar bshad zin to //
translated: Without this mere indication of the pervasion, the meaning to be established cannot be understood, as was explained earlier.

original: 'dis ni chos kyang 'di yin la rtogs pa yang yin pa ni /
analyzed: 'dis ni chos kyang 'di yin la rtogs pa yang yin pa ni /
translated: This shows that the dharma is this, and it is also realization.

original: de'i chos rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i chos rtogs pa'o //
translated: The dharma of that is realization.

original: de 'di la yod do zhes pa do'i chos rtogs pa can te /
analyzed: de 'di la yod do zhes pa do'i chos rtogs pa can te /
translated: That exists in this, so it is one who has the dharma of realization.

original: rtogs pa smos pas byas pa la sogs pa rnams rdzas dang ldan pa nyid du rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: rtogs pa smos pas byas pa la sogs pa rnams rdzas dang ldan pa nyid du rtogs par byed de /
translated: By mentioning realization, it is understood that action and so on are substantially existent.üîΩSome assert that action and impermanence are not the nature of things. Therefore, to refute that, existence is mentioned.

original: kha cig bya ba nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid dag ni dngos po'i ngo bo ma yin pa dag go zhes 'dod pa de'i phyir de dgag pa'i ched du yod pa smos so zhes gang brjod pa 'di yang so sor spangs so //
analyzed: kha cig bya ba nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid dag ni dngos po'i ngo bo ma yin pa dag go zhes 'dod pa de'i phyir de dgag pa'i ched du yod pa smos so zhes gang brjod pa 'di yang so sor spangs so //
translated: This is also rejected individually.

original: dngos po'i chos dang ldan pa'i dpes kyang phyi rol gyi don nye bar bsdus pa med par bsgrub par bya ba'i don rtogs par nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos dang ldan pa'i dpes kyang phyi rol gyi don nye bar bsdus pa med par bsgrub par bya ba'i don rtogs par nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even with an example that possesses the dharma of a thing, it is not possible to understand the object to be established without the inclusion of external objects.

original: gzhan yang gal te byas pa nyid la sogs pa rnams dngos por gyur par mngon par 'dod na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te byas pa nyid la sogs pa rnams dngos por gyur par mngon par 'dod na /
translated: Moreover, if action and so on are asserted to be things,

original: de rnams ci'i nang du 'dus pa yin zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams ci'i nang du 'dus pa yin zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: and ‚ÄúIn what are they included?‚Äù

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa rnams rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams su nang du 'dus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa rnams rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams su nang du 'dus pa ma yin te /
translated: The universals of product, etc., are not included among the substances, qualities, and actions,

original: yon tan dang las rnams la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan dang las rnams la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they exist in qualities and actions.

original: spyi dang 'du ba dag gi yang ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi dang 'du ba dag gi yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor are they included among universals and inherence,

original: rgyu'i dbang du gyur pa'i bdag nyid thob pa ni 'bras bu nyid dang 'jig pa'i ngang can nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: rgyu'i dbang du gyur pa'i bdag nyid thob pa ni 'bras bu nyid dang 'jig pa'i ngang can nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid yin la /
translated: because the state of being an effect is due to the power of a cause, and the state of being impermanent is due to the state of being subject to destruction.

original: de spyi dang 'du ba dag la yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de spyi dang 'du ba dag la yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor do universals and inherence exist in universals and inherence,

original: rtag pa nyid du dam bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid du dam bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are postulated as permanent.

original: 'dir blo'i rgyu med pa'i phyir yang 'du bas bsdus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir blo'i rgyu med pa'i phyir yang 'du bas bsdus pa ma yin no //
translated: Nor are they included among inherence, because the intellect has no cause.

original: khyad par gyis kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par gyis kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor are they included among particularities,

original: de ni rdul phra rab la 'du ba can kho nar 'dod cing /
analyzed: de ni rdul phra rab la 'du ba can kho nar 'dod cing /
translated: because particularities are asserted to inhere only in atoms.

original: byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid dag 'bras bu'i rdzas kho na la 'du ba'o /
analyzed: byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid dag 'bras bu'i rdzas kho na la 'du ba'o /
translated: The universals of product and impermanence inhere only in the substances that are effects.

original: 'di dag ni blo dang sgra rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyu nyid yang yin la khyad par ni de las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni blo dang sgra rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyu nyid yang yin la khyad par ni de las bzlog pa'o //
translated: These are the causes of the following of the mind and of the word. The difference is the opposite of that.

original: gang du byas pa nyid la sogs pa nang du 'dus par 'gyur ba tshig gi don drug las gzhan pa'i dngos po yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang du byas pa nyid la sogs pa nang du 'dus par 'gyur ba tshig gi don drug las gzhan pa'i dngos po yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And there is no entity other than the six topics that can be included in the category of the produced, etc.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid smos pa yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid smos pa yang mi rigs te /
translated: It is also unreasonable to mention the similarity to the subject of the probandum,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid kyis byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro @232a * //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid kyis byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro @232a * //
translated: because the possession of the property of the probandum is not made by the similarity to the subject of the probandum.

original: zhes pas 'di ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pas 'di ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: Thus this is pointless.

original: 'di la yang zhes pa /
analyzed: 'di la yang zhes pa /
translated: And here also,

original: snga ma'i brjod pa kho na la skyon yod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: snga ma'i brjod pa kho na la skyon yod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: not only does the former statement have the fault,

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: but what, then?

original: mdo'i rnam par brtag pa 'di la yang ngo zhes ston to //
analyzed: mdo'i rnam par brtag pa 'di la yang ngo zhes ston to //
translated: This examination of the s≈´tra also has it.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can rjes su 'jal ba nyid la zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid las zhes pa gtan tshigs la lnga pa ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can rjes su 'jal ba nyid la zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid las zhes pa gtan tshigs la lnga pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe subject to be proven is inferred from the similar instance‚Äù means that the subject to be proven is inferred from the similar instance.

original: de las kyang gal te bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid las te byas pa nyid la sogs pa las bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can no zhes dpe bum pa la sogs pa nges par byas na /
analyzed: de las kyang gal te bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid las te byas pa nyid la sogs pa las bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can no zhes dpe bum pa la sogs pa nges par byas na /
translated: If the subject to be proven is inferred from the similar instance, that is, from being a product and so on, then the example, such as a pot, is ascertained.

original: de la yang dpe gzhan brjod par bya zhing /
analyzed: de la yang dpe gzhan brjod par bya zhing /
translated: But then another example would have to be stated for that example.

original: de la yang gzhan pa'o zhes pas dpe thug pa med par 'gyur bar /
analyzed: de la yang gzhan pa'o zhes pas dpe thug pa med par 'gyur bar /
translated: And then another for that, and so on, so that there would be an infinite regress of examples.

original: gtan tshigs bcas pa'i bsgrub bya tsam //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bcas pa'i bsgrub bya tsam //
translated: The subject to be proven is just the reason.

original: zhes pa la sogs pas bshad zin to //üîΩgsal bar byed pa'i rgyu'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas bshad zin to // gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: This is explained by ‚ÄúThe subject to be proven is just the reason‚Äù and so on.

original: dpe la sogs pa rnams ni gsal bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: dpe la sogs pa rnams ni gsal bar byed pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is from the perspective of the cause that makes it clear‚Äù means that the example and so on are that which makes it clear.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i mtshan mar gyur pa rnams te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i mtshan mar gyur pa rnams te /
translated: They are the signs of the object of inference.

original: shes par byed pa yang shes zin pa kho na ni sgron ma la sogs pa bzhin du shes par bya ba'i don gsal bar byed do zhes pa 'di ni brjod zin to //
analyzed: shes par byed pa yang shes zin pa kho na ni sgron ma la sogs pa bzhin du shes par bya ba'i don gsal bar byed do zhes pa 'di ni brjod zin to //
translated: The illuminator, moreover, illuminates the object to be illuminated, just like a lamp. This has already been stated.

original: de'i phyir de rab tu 'grub pa'i ched du 'bad ba gzhan bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de rab tu 'grub pa'i ched du 'bad ba gzhan bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, in order to establish that, it is not necessary to establish another effort.

original: gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa gal te shes par byed pa'i rgyu yang /
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa gal te shes par byed pa'i rgyu yang /
translated: If, on the other hand, the cause of illumination

original: rab tu 'grub pa'i ched du 'bad pa gnas par bya ba yin na dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes bshad pa /
analyzed: rab tu 'grub pa'i ched du 'bad pa gnas par bya ba yin na dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes bshad pa /
translated: is to be established by effort, then the reason is stated: ‚Äúbecause of the similarity to the example.‚Äù

original: 'di la yang chos mthun pa nyid nges pa'i don du 'bad par bya bar rigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di la yang chos mthun pa nyid nges pa'i don du 'bad par bya bar rigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this case, it would be reasonable to make an effort for the sake of ascertaining the similarity.

original: gzhan rnams ni zhes pa zla ba'i ri mo pa rnams so //
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni zhes pa zla ba'i ri mo pa rnams so //
translated: ‚ÄúOthers‚Äù are the moon-painters.

original: de rnams ni de'i tshes rtogs pa dpe'o zhes pa 'di la /
analyzed: de rnams ni de'i tshes rtogs pa dpe'o zhes pa 'di la /
translated: The understanding of the moon by those is the example.

original: don de brjod par bya ba dpe nyid na /
analyzed: don de brjod par bya ba dpe nyid na /
translated: In this case, the statement of the meaning is itself the example.

original: ngag gi yan lag nyid nyams par 'gyur ro zhes bsams nas /
analyzed: ngag gi yan lag nyid nyams par 'gyur ro zhes bsams nas /
translated: and the branch of speech itself would be impaired.

original: de'i chos rtogs pa nyid ni dpe'i dpe brjod do zhes 'don to //
analyzed: de'i chos rtogs pa nyid ni dpe'i dpe brjod do zhes 'don to //
translated: Thus, the example of the example is stated in order to understand the Dharma.

original: 'di la yang zhes pa'i yang gi sgra de ni /
analyzed: 'di la yang zhes pa'i yang gi sgra de ni /
translated: In this case, the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in ‚Äúin this case also‚Äù

original: 'don pa snga ma kho na la skyon yod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: 'don pa snga ma kho na la skyon yod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: indicates that not only is there a fault in the former statement,

original: 'o na ci zhe na 'di la yang zhes ston to //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na 'di la yang zhes ston to //
translated: but also in this one.

original: ci'i phyir chos mthun pa nyid @232b dang chos mi mthun pa nyid smos pa rigs pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir chos mthun pa nyid @232b dang chos mi mthun pa nyid smos pa rigs pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not logical to mention similarity and dissimilarity?

original: de ltar go byed de ma mthong //
analyzed: de ltar go byed de ma mthong //
translated: It is not seen to be the means of understanding in that way.

original: zhes byas nas zhes phyi rol gyi don nye bar bsdus pa med par go bar byed pa nyid med do zhes pa 'di bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes byas nas zhes phyi rol gyi don nye bar bsdus pa med par go bar byed pa nyid med do zhes pa 'di bshad zin to //
translated: Thus, having said that, it has been explained that without the inclusion of external objects, there is no means of understanding.

original: chos mthun nyid kyang mi rigs 'gyur //
analyzed: chos mthun nyid kyang mi rigs 'gyur //
translated: Similarity is also illogical.

original: zhes khyad par med par brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes khyad par med par brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is stated without distinction,

original: khong du ma chud pa 'dri bar byed de /
analyzed: khong du ma chud pa 'dri bar byed de /
translated: one who has not understood asks a question:

original: ci zhig tu 'am zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig tu 'am zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is the purpose of the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù and so on?

original: 'dir ci zhig tu zhes pa la sogs pa bzhi rnams dri ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir ci zhig tu zhes pa la sogs pa bzhi rnams dri ba'o //
translated: Here, the four beginning with ‚Äúwhat‚Äù are questions.

translated: Therefore, it is just the case that the meaning is not established.üîΩTo explain that, he says,

original: dpes ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dpes ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe example, etc.‚Äù

original: dpes ni gcig tu byed pa las te khyad par med par byed pa las zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dpes ni gcig tu byed pa las te khyad par med par byed pa las zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The example performs the single activity, i.e., it performs the activity without distinction.

original: gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa gtan te khyab pa rab tu gsal ba med par yang /
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa gtan te khyab pa rab tu gsal ba med par yang /
translated: Otherwise, etc.

original: gcig tu byed pa tsam las de dang ldan pa mi rtag pa nyid du 'grub pa kho nar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gcig tu byed pa tsam las de dang ldan pa mi rtag pa nyid du 'grub pa kho nar 'gyur na /
translated: It would be established as impermanent, merely by virtue of being the same as that.

original: de ltar gyur na ni /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na ni /
translated: If that were the case,

original: gal te bum pa dang chos mthun pa nyid bstan pa las gzhan yang khyad par med par byed na bum pa'i chos thams cad sgra la 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gal te bum pa dang chos mthun pa nyid bstan pa las gzhan yang khyad par med par byed na bum pa'i chos thams cad sgra la 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: then if the mere similarity to a pot were taught, then all the qualities of the pot would be obtained in sound.

original: de lta bu la sogs pa'i ltag chod rnams lan kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta bu la sogs pa'i ltag chod rnams lan kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: Such and other consequences would be the only response.

original: sun 'byin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be a refutation alone.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni chos mthun pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni chos mthun pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The term ‚Äúand so on‚Äù includes the same similarity of qualities and so on.

original: phyi'i don nye bar sdud pa la ni thal bar 'gyur ba 'di med de /
analyzed: phyi'i don nye bar sdud pa la ni thal bar 'gyur ba 'di med de /
translated: This consequence does not apply to the positing of external objects,

original: yongs su gnas pa mi mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su gnas pa mi mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the mode of abiding is not the same.

original: de rnams kyi khyab pa bstan par nus pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyi khyab pa bstan par nus pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to demonstrate their pervasion.

original: ci ste zhes pa phyogs gnyis pa nye bar dgod pa'o //
analyzed: ci ste zhes pa phyogs gnyis pa nye bar dgod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù introduces the second position.

original: byas @234b ba nyid du grub pa la zhes pa byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'di las rtogs pa la khyad par nye bar sbyar bar bya'o zhes pa de rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: byas @234b ba nyid du grub pa la zhes pa byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'di las rtogs pa la khyad par nye bar sbyar bar bya'o zhes pa de rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The phrase in the proof of being a product is to be understood as because of being a product. The word only is to be supplied to the word understood.

original: khyad par nye bar sbyor ba de nyid khyad par gzhan rnam par gcod bas ston pa smras pa /üîΩbum pa bzhin du byas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: khyad par nye bar sbyor ba de nyid khyad par gzhan rnam par gcod bas ston pa smras pa / bum pa bzhin du byas pa yin gyi /
translated: The very application of the distinction is stated to be the exclusion of other distinctions.

original: snam bu la sogs pa bzhin du ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: snam bu la sogs pa bzhin du ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is like a pot, not like a cloth, etc.

original: khyad par rang rten la rjes 'gro //
analyzed: khyad par rang rten la rjes 'gro //
translated: The distinction is restricted to its basis.

original: zhes pa / rang gi rten la nges pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / rang gi rten la nges pa'o //
translated: It is restricted to its own basis.

original: gal te de ni rten gzhan la 'jug par 'gyur na spyi kho nar 'gyur gyi khyad par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de ni rten gzhan la 'jug par 'gyur na spyi kho nar 'gyur gyi khyad par ni ma yin no //
translated: If it applied to another basis, it would be a universal, not a distinction.

original: de'i phyir sgra ni bum pa bzhin byas pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra ni bum pa bzhin byas pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said, Sound is not a product like a pot.

original: rnam pa gzhan du skyes pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du skyes pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: In another way, it is said, because of being produced in another way.

original: bum pa ni 'jim pa'i gong bu la sogs pa rnams las skyes la /
analyzed: bum pa ni 'jim pa'i gong bu la sogs pa rnams las skyes la /
translated: A pot is produced from a lump of clay, etc.

original: sgra ni rkan la sogs pa yang dag par sbyor ba la sogs pa rnams las so zhes pas sgra ni bum ba bzhin du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni rkan la sogs pa yang dag par sbyor ba la sogs pa rnams las so zhes pas sgra ni bum ba bzhin du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: Sound is from the correct conjunction of the palate, etc. Thus, sound is not produced like a pot.

original: de ni gtan tshigs kho nas bshad do zhes pa 'di yang /
analyzed: de ni gtan tshigs kho nas bshad do zhes pa 'di yang /
translated: This is explained by the reason itself.

original: snga ma bzhin du yan lag gzhan yin pa nyams pa gsungs so //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du yan lag gzhan yin pa nyams pa gsungs so //
translated: This also states the loss of the other part, as before.

original: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ni de byas pa nyid du brjod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ni de byas pa nyid du brjod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: If, etc. means that it is not at all said to be produced.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What, then?

original: ma byas pa nyid dgag pa tsam bya ba ste /
analyzed: ma byas pa nyid dgag pa tsam bya ba ste /
translated: The mere negation of non-production is the action.

original: yang de ci'i don du zhe na smras pa /
analyzed: yang de ci'i don du zhe na smras pa /
translated: Again, for what purpose is that? It is said:

original: de dang lhan cig spyod pa'i rtag pa nyid dgag pa'i don du zhes pa ma byas pa de dang lhan cig spyod pa'i rtag ba nyid dgag ba'i don du ste /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig spyod pa'i rtag pa nyid dgag pa'i don du zhes pa ma byas pa de dang lhan cig spyod pa'i rtag ba nyid dgag ba'i don du ste /
translated: For the purpose of negating permanence concomitant with that.

original: dper na nam mkha' bzhin du ma byas par 'gyur ba ma yin pa de ltar rtag par yang ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' bzhin du ma byas par 'gyur ba ma yin pa de ltar rtag par yang ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: For example, like space, it is not non-produced, and likewise it is permanent.

original: gnyen po'i phyogs kyang mi ldan pa ste zhes pa gnyen po'i phyogs ni byas ba nyid kyis ma byas pa nyid de /
analyzed: gnyen po'i phyogs kyang mi ldan pa ste zhes pa gnyen po'i phyogs ni byas ba nyid kyis ma byas pa nyid de /
translated: The factor of the antidote is non-production itself, because it is produced.

original: lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not coexist.

original: de mi ldan ba ni sgra la go skabs med pa'o //
analyzed: de mi ldan ba ni sgra la go skabs med pa'o //
translated: It is not endowed with that, because there is no opportunity for sound.üîΩAnd the universal is also stated as the reason.

original: spyi yang gtan tshigs nyid kyis brjod do zhes brjod par bya zhes pa ni kyang gi sgra las so zhes ba'o //
analyzed: spyi yang gtan tshigs nyid kyis brjod do zhes brjod par bya zhes pa ni kyang gi sgra las so zhes ba'o //
translated: The word also is from the word ‚Äútoo.‚Äù

original: 'o na byas ba nyid dgag pa bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na byas ba nyid dgag pa bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that production itself is to be refuted?

original: byas pa nyid brjod par bya'o zhes pa 'di'i phyogs la brten pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: byas pa nyid brjod par bya'o zhes pa 'di'i phyogs la brten pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that this statement, ‚ÄúProduction itself should be stated,‚Äù is based on that position.

original: des na ci'i phyir bsdu ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: des na ci'i phyir bsdu ba yin zhe na /
translated: So why is it included?

original: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i dngos po'i chos dag ni gang kho na gcig dgag pa de kho na cig shos kyi sgrub pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i dngos po'i chos dag ni gang kho na gcig dgag pa de kho na cig shos kyi sgrub pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The thought is that phenomena which are mutually exclusive are such that the negation of one is the affirmation of the other.

original: gzhan rnams ni dang gi sgra @235a * //
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni dang gi sgra @235a * //
translated: The others are from the word ‚Äútoo.‚Äù

original: 'dir rnam par brtag pa'i don to zhes smra'o //
analyzed: 'dir rnam par brtag pa'i don to zhes smra'o //
translated: Here the word ‚Äútoo‚Äù has the meaning of ‚Äúalso.‚Äù

original: mi ldan ba ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: mi ldan ba ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: byas pa nyid yod na zhes ba la sogs pa /
analyzed: byas pa nyid yod na zhes ba la sogs pa /
translated: If it were produced, etc.

original: gang gi gang na 'gal ba yod pa na de na srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi gang na 'gal ba yod pa na de na srid pa ma yin te /
translated: When there is a contradiction between two things, one of them cannot exist in the other.

original: dper na me la grang ba'i reg pa bzhin sgra la yang ma byas pa nyid dang 'gal ba byas pa nyid yod do zhes pa rang bzhin 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: dper na me la grang ba'i reg pa bzhin sgra la yang ma byas pa nyid dang 'gal ba byas pa nyid yod do zhes pa rang bzhin 'gal ba'o //
translated: For example, just as there is no cold touch in fire, so also there is a contradiction between sound and non-production, and production exists in sound. This is a contradiction of intrinsic nature.

original: gang zhig gang du grub pa mi srid pa de ni der dgag bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang du grub pa mi srid pa de ni der dgag bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: That which is impossible in something cannot be negated in that.

original: dper na lag ba'i mthil du lag ldan gyi khyu bzhin sgra la yang ma byas pa nyid kyi mi srid pa grub bo //
analyzed: dper na lag ba'i mthil du lag ldan gyi khyu bzhin sgra la yang ma byas pa nyid kyi mi srid pa grub bo //
translated: For example, just as a flock of birds is impossible on the palm of the hand, so also the impossibility of non-production in sound is established.

original: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o zhes pa tshogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o zhes pa tshogs pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the compound is: a contradiction with the pervader.

original: ma byas pa nyid dang lhan cig rgyu ba zhes pa 'dir yang mi dmigs pa gnyis po de kho na snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs pas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ma byas pa nyid dang lhan cig rgyu ba zhes pa 'dir yang mi dmigs pa gnyis po de kho na snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs pas brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here also, the two non-apprehensions of being concomitant with non-production should be stated by implication from the previous verse.

original: 'di ni 'dir khyad par yin te gcig la /
analyzed: 'di ni 'dir khyad par yin te gcig la /
translated: This is the difference here: in one,

original: sgra la yang rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba mi rtag pa yod do zhes pa ;
analyzed: sgra la yang rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba mi rtag pa yod do zhes pa ;
translated: Sound also has impermanence, which is the opposite of permanence.

original: phyogs kyi chos te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos te /
translated: This is the property of the subject.

original: sgra la yang rtag pa nyid kyi mi srid pa grub bo zhes pa gzhan la'o //
analyzed: sgra la yang rtag pa nyid kyi mi srid pa grub bo zhes pa gzhan la'o //
translated: Sound also has the impossibility of permanence, which is the other.

original: ci ste yang zhes pa la sogs pas ma grub pa nyid smras so //
analyzed: ci ste yang zhes pa la sogs pas ma grub pa nyid smras so //
translated: If someone says that the reason is not established, then beginning with ‚ÄúIf one applies the reason of similarity,‚Äù he responds.

original: gal te chos mthun pa nyid sbyor na /
analyzed: gal te chos mthun pa nyid sbyor na /
translated: If one applies the reason of similarity,

original: de las byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid dag 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de las byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid dag 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
translated: then the impermanence of what is produced would be established from that,

original: de las kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi ldan pa'o //
translated: and from that, the absence of the property of the dissimilar class.

original: gang gi tshe chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi nye bar sbyor ba kho nas mi rtag pa nyid 'grub pa'i ched du rtag pa nyid dgag pa byas pa de'i tshe 'di gnyis ka yang med do zhes pas gtan tshigs ma grub bo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi nye bar sbyor ba kho nas mi rtag pa nyid 'grub pa'i ched du rtag pa nyid dgag pa byas pa de'i tshe 'di gnyis ka yang med do zhes pas gtan tshigs ma grub bo //
translated: When one applies the reason of dissimilarity just for the sake of establishing impermanence by negating permanence, then at that time both of these are nonexistent, and therefore the reason is not established.

original: khyad par gyis kyang de rtogs 'gyur //
analyzed: khyad par gyis kyang de rtogs 'gyur //
translated: One also understands that by a distinguishing feature.

original: zhes pa thun mong ma yin pas kyang zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa thun mong ma yin pas kyang zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means ‚Äúby an uncommon feature.‚Äù

original: 'di 'dod pa yang ma yin na zhes pa sgra mi rtag ces khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di 'dod pa yang ma yin na zhes pa sgra mi rtag ces khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you do not accept that, then you accept that sound is impermanent.

original: gzhan yang mi rtag pa nyid 'grub pa la mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: gzhan yang mi rtag pa nyid 'grub pa la mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Moreover, it is the same in establishing impermanence.

original: sgra mi rtag ste mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Sound is impermanent because it is audible.

original: rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams mnyan par bya ba ma yin par mthong ste /
analyzed: rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams mnyan par bya ba ma yin par mthong ste /
translated: Permanence is seen in space and so on, which are not audible.

original: de ltar sgra ni mnyan bya ma yin pa ma yin no zhes byas na rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pa la mnyan par bya ba nyid med pa'i phyir na mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid dang lhan cig spyod pa'i rtag pa nyid bkag pas @235b
analyzed: de ltar sgra ni mnyan bya ma yin pa ma yin no zhes byas na rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pa la mnyan par bya ba nyid med pa'i phyir na mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid dang lhan cig spyod pa'i rtag pa nyid bkag pas @235b
translated: If you say that sound is not not audible, then because permanence is concomitant with not being audible, the permanence of space and so on is refuted.

original: mi rtag pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus impermanence is established.

original: de yang mi 'thad ba nyid kyi phyir 'di mi 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: de yang mi 'thad ba nyid kyi phyir 'di mi 'dod pa ste /
translated: But that is unacceptable because it is untenable.

original: gang gi phyir dngos po gcig la phan tshun 'gal ba'i chos dag rigs pa ma yin bas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po gcig la phan tshun 'gal ba'i chos dag rigs pa ma yin bas so //
translated: Because it is illogical for mutually contradictory phenomena to exist in one thing.

original: skyon 'di tsam gyis grol ba yang ma yin no zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: skyon 'di tsam gyis grol ba yang ma yin no zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: This is not liberation merely through these faults.

original: 'di la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: 'di la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
translated: The response to that is stated:üîΩ‚ÄúHere, too, there is the consequence of permanence.‚Äù

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa'o zhes pa'i sbyor ba 'di la yang rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa'o zhes pa'i sbyor ba 'di la yang rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it arises immediately after effort, it is impermanent. In this syllogism, there is the consequence of permanence.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: glog la sogs pa chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis te glog la sogs pa rtsol ba las ma byung ba mi rtag par mthong zhing /
analyzed: glog la sogs pa chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis te glog la sogs pa rtsol ba las ma byung ba mi rtag par mthong zhing /
translated: Because of the dissimilarity of the example, such as lightning. Lightning, which is not arisen from effort, is seen to be impermanent.

original: sgra ni de ltar rtsol ba las ma byung ba ma yin no zhes byas ba na /
analyzed: sgra ni de ltar rtsol ba las ma byung ba ma yin no zhes byas ba na /
translated: Sound, however, is not like that, not arisen from effort.

original: rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba dang ldan cig spyod pa'i mi rtag ba nyid bkag pa rtag pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba dang ldan cig spyod pa'i mi rtag ba nyid bkag pa rtag pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the refutation of the impermanence that is concomitant with not being arisen immediately after effort establishes permanence.

original: gal te chos mi mthun pa nye bar sbyor ba nyid 'ba' zhig byed na /
analyzed: gal te chos mi mthun pa nye bar sbyor ba nyid 'ba' zhig byed na /
translated: If one merely applies a dissimilar example,

original: 'di la rigs pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: 'di la rigs pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: there is not the slightest logic here.

original: 'di la 'thad pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la 'thad pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no justification for this at all.

original: 'o na rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs ma byas pa nyid med ba kho na rigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs ma byas pa nyid med ba kho na rigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Well, isn‚Äôt it the case that the reason of permanence is just the absence of being made?

original: gtan tshigs med par bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa ni 'thad pa ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs med par bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa ni 'thad pa ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is not tenable that the probandum is established without a reason.

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúNo,‚Äù and so on.

original: gal te rtag pa la ma byas pa nyid kho na gcig pu gtan tshigs su 'gyur na de med pa na med par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: gal te rtag pa la ma byas pa nyid kho na gcig pu gtan tshigs su 'gyur na de med pa na med par 'gyur mod /
translated: If permanence were just the reason of the absence of being made, then it would not exist when that does not exist.

original: de yang med de gang gi phyir skye ba dang ldan ba nyid ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams kyang rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'dod pas so //üîΩyang ci'i phyir gtan tshigs gcig log pa kho nas bsgrub par bya ba ldog par mi 'gyur zhe na smras pa /
analyzed: de yang med de gang gi phyir skye ba dang ldan ba nyid ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams kyang rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'dod pas so // yang ci'i phyir gtan tshigs gcig log pa kho nas bsgrub par bya ba ldog par mi 'gyur zhe na smras pa /
translated: But that is not the case, because the reason of permanence is asserted to be the absence of being a product and so on.

original: ma gyur cig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma gyur cig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Again, why is it that just the negation of one reason does not entail the negation of the probandum? He says, ‚ÄúIt does not,‚Äù and so on.

original: gal te gtan tshigs gcig med pa na yang bsgrub par bya ba med par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs gcig med pa na yang bsgrub par bya ba med par 'gyur na /
translated: If the probandum were nonexistent even when one reason does not exist,üîΩthen the probandum would not exist when all the reasons exist.

original: de ltar gyur pa na lus can nyid dang yan lag can nyid la sogs pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa na lus can nyid dang yan lag can nyid la sogs pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir /
translated: In that case, because there is no reason for the existence of corporeality, part-wholes, etc.,

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa yod pa na yang /
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa yod pa na yang /
translated: even if producedness, etc. exist,

original: mi rtag pa nyid khegs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid khegs par 'gyur ro //
translated: impermanence is refuted.

original: yang ci ltar lus can nyid mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: yang ci ltar lus can nyid mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: Moreover, how is corporeality a reason for impermanence?

original: ji srid du lus can rdul phra rab rnams rtag pa nyid du pha rol pos mngon par 'dod do zhe na /üîΩskyon @236a * //
analyzed: ji srid du lus can rdul phra rab rnams rtag pa nyid du pha rol pos mngon par 'dod do zhe na / skyon @236a * //
translated: As long as corporeal things, the subtle particles, are manifestly asserted by the opponent to be permanent.

original: 'di ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ma yin te /
translated: This is not a fault.

original: 'dir sogs pa'i sgra ni rnam par brjod ba yin zhing /
analyzed: 'dir sogs pa'i sgra ni rnam par brjod ba yin zhing /
translated: Here the word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù is an expression.

original: des na mtshan nyid mchog nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: des na mtshan nyid mchog nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore, because of the excellence of the definition,

original: dper brjod ni 'dir dbang can ma yin no //
analyzed: dper brjod ni 'dir dbang can ma yin no //
translated: the example is not authoritative here.

original: yang na dngos po'i stobs la ltos pas 'di bshad kyi khas blangs la ltos pa ni ma yin no ;
analyzed: yang na dngos po'i stobs la ltos pas 'di bshad kyi khas blangs la ltos pa ni ma yin no ;
translated: Or, this is explained by relying on the power of fact, not by relying on assertion.

original: / gal te de ltar nye bar sbyor ba mi rigs na /
analyzed: / gal te de ltar nye bar sbyor ba mi rigs na /
translated: If it is not reasonable to apply it in that way,

original: 'o na rigs pa ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na rigs pa ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: then how is it reasonable? It is said:

original: phyi rol gyi don la ltos pas ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la ltos pas ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because it depends on external objects, etc.

original: ci ltar phyi rol gyi don la ltos pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar phyi rol gyi don la ltos pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How does it depend on external objects? It is said:

original: gang gi phyir zhes ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because, etc.

original: phyi rol smos pa ni 'ba' zhig pa'i bum pa dang / nam mkha' yod pa dang med pa nyid tsam la ltos pa sems lhur byed pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol smos pa ni 'ba' zhig pa'i bum pa dang / nam mkha' yod pa dang med pa nyid tsam la ltos pa sems lhur byed pa'o //
translated: The mention of external objects refers to the mind that is intent on the mere existence and non-existence of an isolated pot and space.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: rtag pa nyid byas pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid byas pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes pa ste /
translated: Nothing permanent is produced at all.

original: mi rtag pa nyid dang bral ba'i byas pa yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid dang bral ba'i byas pa yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that a product devoid of impermanence does not exist.

original: 'dis ldog pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ldog pa gsungs so //
translated: This states the contrapositive.

original: mi rtag pa yang yod de bum pa bzhin zhes pa 'dis kyang rjes 'gro'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa yang yod de bum pa bzhin zhes pa 'dis kyang rjes 'gro'o //
translated: Also, impermanent things exist, like a pot. This also states the positive concomitance.

original: rjes 'gro dang ldog pa la ltos nas /
analyzed: rjes 'gro dang ldog pa la ltos nas /
translated: In dependence on the positive and negative concomitance,

original: de bstan pa'i ched du nam mkha' bzhin dang bum pa bzhin zhes phyogs gcig dper brjod ba tsam nye bar sbyar ba'o zhes pas kho bo'i lugs kyis nam mkha' sogs nye bar sbyar ba rigs so //
analyzed: de bstan pa'i ched du nam mkha' bzhin dang bum pa bzhin zhes phyogs gcig dper brjod ba tsam nye bar sbyar ba'o zhes pas kho bo'i lugs kyis nam mkha' sogs nye bar sbyar ba rigs so //
translated: In this way, the application of space and so on is correct in our system.

original: de ltar nye bar sbyor ba yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ltar nye bar sbyor ba yang mi rigs te /
translated: Such an application is not correct.

original: dper brjod nyid 'ba' zhig tu ma zad do //
analyzed: dper brjod nyid 'ba' zhig tu ma zad do //
translated: Not only is it an example.

original: slar yang brjod pa kho na las zhes /üîΩgtan tshigs nye bar bstan pa las dam bca' ba slar yang brjod pa ni mjug sdud do zhes pa'i mdo las so //
analyzed: slar yang brjod pa kho na las zhes / gtan tshigs nye bar bstan pa las dam bca' ba slar yang brjod pa ni mjug sdud do zhes pa'i mdo las so //
translated: ‚ÄúAgain, it is only stated‚ÄùüîΩmeans that the conclusion is the restatement of the thesis from the statement of the reason.

original: gtan tshigs nges par bstan ba las de ma thag tu ste de sngon ma can zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nges par bstan ba las de ma thag tu ste de sngon ma can zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúImmediately after the statement of the reason‚Äù means that it has a predecessor.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: de'i phyir byas pa nyid kyi phyir sgra mi rtag go zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir byas pa nyid kyi phyir sgra mi rtag go zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore sound is impermanent because it is produced.

original: 'dis ni rang gi tshig kho nas mjug sdud yan lag gzhan nyid bsal lo zhes ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni rang gi tshig kho nas mjug sdud yan lag gzhan nyid bsal lo zhes ston to //
translated: This shows that the otherness of the conclusion is refuted by his own words.

original: slar yang brjod pa yan lag gzhan nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: slar yang brjod pa yan lag gzhan nyid yin na ni /
translated: If the restatement were a different part,

original: lan cig ma yin par brjod pa ni yin la mtha' yas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan cig ma yin par brjod pa ni yin la mtha' yas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The answer is not just once, but it becomes limitless.

original: kha cig 'di la lan smra ste //üîΩbsgrub par bya ba'i don mngon par brjod pa ni dam bca' ste /
analyzed: kha cig 'di la lan smra ste // bsgrub par bya ba'i don mngon par brjod pa ni dam bca' ste /
translated: Some people give the following answer to this:üîΩThe statement of the proposition is the expression of the object to be established.

original: gtan tshigs kyi yul des bstan @236b par bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi yul des bstan @236b par bya'o //
translated: The statement of the reason is the means of establishing that.

original: grub pa'i ngo bo'i don sgrub par byed pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa ni mjug sdud kyis so //
analyzed: grub pa'i ngo bo'i don sgrub par byed pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa ni mjug sdud kyis so //
translated: The conclusion is the result of establishing the nature of the object.

original: des na slar yang brjod pa nyid med do zhes ba'o //
analyzed: des na slar yang brjod pa nyid med do zhes ba'o //
translated: Therefore, there is no repetition.

original: de mi rigs te /
analyzed: de mi rigs te /
translated: This is not correct.

original: grub pa'i ngo bo rjod par byed pa nyid yin na ni sgrub par byed pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: grub pa'i ngo bo rjod par byed pa nyid yin na ni sgrub par byed pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir te /
translated: If it is the expression of the nature of the object to be established, then the proof is not tenable,

original: dper na sgra mnyan par bya'o zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sgra mnyan par bya'o zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: just as in the case of the statement, Sound should be heard.

original: de lta na yang sgrub par byed pa ni yan lag rnams so zhes pa'i dam bca' ba nyams so //
analyzed: de lta na yang sgrub par byed pa ni yan lag rnams so zhes pa'i dam bca' ba nyams so //
translated: Even so, the statement of the proposition that the proof is the parts is undermined.

original: gzhan rnams ni rnam pa gzhan du mjug sdud yan lag gzhan nyid du rab tu ston bar byed de /
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni rnam pa gzhan du mjug sdud yan lag gzhan nyid du rab tu ston bar byed de /
translated: Others present the conclusion as a separate part in a different way.

original: sgra mi rtag go zhes ba dam bca' ba 'di lus dang / byas pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i gtan tshigs 'di rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag go zhes ba dam bca' ba 'di lus dang / byas pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i gtan tshigs 'di rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: The thesis, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent,‚Äù and the reason, ‚Äúbecause it is produced,‚Äù are the inference.

original: bum pa bzhin zhes pa'i dpe 'di mngon sum mo //
analyzed: bum pa bzhin zhes pa'i dpe 'di mngon sum mo //
translated: The example, ‚Äúlike a pot,‚Äù is the direct perception.

original: ji ltar bum pa byas pa nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa de ltar sgra'o zhes pa nye bar sbyor ba 'di nye bar 'jal ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bum pa byas pa nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa de ltar sgra'o zhes pa nye bar sbyor ba 'di nye bar 'jal ba'o //
translated: The application, ‚ÄúJust as a pot, because it is produced, is impermanent, so is sound,‚Äù is the analogy.

original: tshad ma bzhi bo 'di rnams kyi yul gcig pa nyid du shes pa'i don du mjug bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: tshad ma bzhi bo 'di rnams kyi yul gcig pa nyid du shes pa'i don du mjug bsdu ba ste /
translated: The conclusion is for the purpose of understanding that these four valid cognitions have the same object.

original: de'i phyir byas pa nyid kyi phyir mi rtag go zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir byas pa nyid kyi phyir mi rtag go zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, because it is produced, it is impermanent.

original: 'di yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di yang mi rigs te /
translated: This is also not correct.

original: gal te rnam pa gzhan du rtogs pa mi 'byung na thams cad legs mod /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa gzhan du rtogs pa mi 'byung na thams cad legs mod /
translated: If it is not the case that the understanding does not occur in a different way, then everything is fine.

original: de med kyang phyogs chos dang 'brel ba brjod ba tsam las rtogs pa mthong ngo zhes pas /
analyzed: de med kyang phyogs chos dang 'brel ba brjod ba tsam las rtogs pa mthong ngo zhes pas /
translated: However, even without that, the understanding is seen to occur from the mere statement of the property of the position and the relation.

original: de nye bar mkho ba ci zhig 'dis ni dam bca' ba dang nye bar sbyor ba dag kyang sgrub par byed pa yin pa nyid spangs so //
