analyzed: de nye bar mkho ba ci zhig 'dis ni dam bca' ba dang nye bar sbyor ba dag kyang sgrub par byed pa yin pa nyid spangs so //
translated: This also rejects the establishment of the thesis and the application.

original: pha rol pos yongs su brtags pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe rnams kyang ji ltar sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag nyid du 'thad pa ma yin pa de ltar bshad zin to //
analyzed: pha rol pos yongs su brtags pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe rnams kyang ji ltar sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag nyid du 'thad pa ma yin pa de ltar bshad zin to //
translated: It has been explained how the reasons and examples imagined by the opponent are not tenable as the members of an establishment.

original: de ltar dam bca' ba la sogs pa rnams kho na re zhig sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'thad pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de ltar dam bca' ba la sogs pa rnams kho na re zhig sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'thad pa ma yin na /
translated: Thus, if the thesis and so on are not tenable as the establishment,üîΩwhy is the conclusion not tenable as the establishment?

original: ci'i phyir / yul gcig tu 'chad pa las mjug sdud yin zhes pas mjug sdud mi rigs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir / yul gcig tu 'chad pa las mjug sdud yin zhes pas mjug sdud mi rigs so //
translated: The conclusion is not tenable as the establishment because it is a summary of the explanation of a single object.

original: gnyis ka rab tu grub pa dpe'o zhes pa gnyis ka rab tu grub cing nges pa gang du yin pa de gnyis ka rab tu grub pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis ka rab tu grub pa dpe'o zhes pa gnyis ka rab tu grub cing nges pa gang du yin pa de gnyis ka rab tu grub pa ste /
translated: The example is the establishment of both. The example is that which is the establishment of both.

original: gnyis ka ni gtan tshigs dang dam bca' ba dag gam de'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis ka ni gtan tshigs dang dam bca' ba dag gam de'i don to //
translated: Both refers to the reason and the thesis, or it refers to their meaning.

original: nam mkha' dper na thal ba'am //
analyzed: nam mkha' dper na thal ba'am //
translated: Space is an example like ashes.

original: zhes pa phyogs dang po la'o //
analyzed: zhes pa phyogs dang po la'o //
translated: This is the first position.

original: ngag gi phyogs gcig nyid kyang min //
analyzed: ngag gi phyogs gcig nyid kyang min //
translated: Nor is it just one part of speech.

original: zhes pa gnyis ba la'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gnyis ba la'o //
translated: This is the second.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyis ka ltar na yang khas blangs pa nyams so //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis ka ltar na yang khas blangs pa nyams so //
translated: Thus, in both cases, your assertion is undermined.

original: @237a * // de yi yon tan nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /üîΩdam bca' dang / gtan tshigs dag sgra'i bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: @237a * // de yi yon tan nyid kyi phyir zhes pa / dam bca' dang / gtan tshigs dag sgra'i bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because they are its qualities.üîΩThe thesis and the reason are the nature of sound,

original: sgra yang nam mkha'i yon tan no //
analyzed: sgra yang nam mkha'i yon tan no //
translated: because sound is a quality of space.

original: zhes pa'i gzhung lugs las so //
analyzed: zhes pa'i gzhung lugs las so //
translated: This is the scriptural system.

original: de'i chos dag zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i chos dag ste /
analyzed: de'i chos dag zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i chos dag ste /
translated: Its qualities. The qualities of the probandum and the probans,

original: mi rtag pa dang byas pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang byas pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
translated: such as impermanence and being produced,

original: gang du rab tu grub pa dag go zhes pa don bum pa la sogs par ro //
analyzed: gang du rab tu grub pa dag go zhes pa don bum pa la sogs par ro //
translated: are well established in the object, such as a pot.

original: ngag gi yan lag nyid mi rigs so zhes pa /
analyzed: ngag gi yan lag nyid mi rigs so zhes pa /
translated: It is unreasonable to be a part of speech.

original: ji skad du bshad pa /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa /
translated: As it was explained,

original: lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa ni dbye ba yod pa na tha mi dad par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa ni dbye ba yod pa na tha mi dad par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
translated: when there is a division, the desire to express together is the transformation of those that operate without distinction.

original: don dang sgra dag la tha mi dad par 'jug pa nyid yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: don dang sgra dag la tha mi dad par 'jug pa nyid yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not the case that the meaning and the words are employed without distinction.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ma brjod phyir ;
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ma brjod phyir ;
translated: Because the pervasion is not stated,

original: / zhes ba la sogs ba ste /
analyzed: / zhes ba la sogs ba ste /
translated: and so on.

original: ji ltar kho bo cag gi gtan tshigs kyi med na mi 'byung ba nyid dpes ston pa de ltar bye brag ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar kho bo cag gi gtan tshigs kyi med na mi 'byung ba nyid dpes ston pa de ltar bye brag ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
translated: The invariable concomitance of our reason is shown by the example, but this is not the case for the Vaise~ika.

original: de las kyang dpe ltar snang ba'o //üîΩsnga ma bzhin zhes pa /
analyzed: de las kyang dpe ltar snang ba'o // snga ma bzhin zhes pa /
translated: Therefore, it is a pseudo-example.üîΩAs before means

original: sngar ji skad du bshad pa /
analyzed: sngar ji skad du bshad pa /
translated: as it was previously explained.

original: rjes 'gro phyin ci log rnam gnyis //
analyzed: rjes 'gro phyin ci log rnam gnyis //
translated: The pervasion is not stated, and there are two kinds of erroneous pervasion.

original: rjes 'gro med pa'ang der snang ba'o zhes pa de ltar 'dir yang brjod par bya'o //üîΩrnam pa gnyis ka ltar na yang mi rigs so zhes pa /
analyzed: rjes 'gro med pa'ang der snang ba'o zhes pa de ltar 'dir yang brjod par bya'o // rnam pa gnyis ka ltar na yang mi rigs so zhes pa /
translated: There is also the appearance of non-pervasion. All of this should be said here as well.

original: gal te gtan tshigs dam bca' ba dag gnyis ka smos pas 'dzin na dang / gal te de'i don dag na'o //üîΩsgrub byed nyid dang dpe'i don kyang /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs dam bca' ba dag gnyis ka smos pas 'dzin na dang / gal te de'i don dag na'o // sgrub byed nyid dang dpe'i don kyang /
translated: In both ways, it is not correct. If both the reason and the thesis are stated, and if their meanings are independent,

original: rang dbang yin na don med do //
analyzed: rang dbang yin na don med do //
translated: then the proof itself and the meaning of the example are meaningless.

original: zhes pa / bsgrub par bya ba yang dag par 'grub pa'i don du gnyer bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa / bsgrub par bya ba yang dag par 'grub pa'i don du gnyer bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: ‚ÄúOne should strive for the accomplishment of the object to be established.‚Äù

original: bsgrub par bya bsgrub par byed pa'i nus pa'i rang gi ngo bor brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya bsgrub par byed pa'i nus pa'i rang gi ngo bor brjod par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚ÄúThe object to be established is the nature of the capacity of the proof‚Äù is that the object to be established is the nature of the capacity of the proof.

original: de dag la don yod pa ma yin no zhes don med pa ste /
analyzed: de dag la don yod pa ma yin no zhes don med pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThey are not meaningful‚Äù means that they are meaningless.

original: bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed par nus pa'i rang gi ngo bo dag mi srid pa dag ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed par nus pa'i rang gi ngo bo dag mi srid pa dag ces pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the object to be established is not possible as the nature of the capacity of the proof.

original: don 'di nyid 'grel bas gsal bar byed de /üîΩsgrub par byed pa nyid srid pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: don 'di nyid 'grel bas gsal bar byed de / sgrub par byed pa nyid srid pa ma yin zhing /
translated: This very meaning is clarified by the commentary:üîΩ‚ÄúThe proof itself is not possible,

original: dpe'i don yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dpe'i don yang ma yin no //
translated: and the meaning of the example is not.‚Äù

original: zhes pa'o // rigs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // rigs pa ni /
translated: The reasoning is:

original: gang sgrub bar byed pa nyid srid pa ma yin te sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gang sgrub bar byed pa nyid srid pa ma yin te sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The proof itself is not possible because it is devoid of the capacity of the proof.

original: dpe'i don ni ci ltar yin te /
analyzed: dpe'i don ni ci ltar yin te /
translated: What is the meaning of the example?

original: gang 'dra ba pha rol pos bsgrub par bya ba rjes su @237b 'dzin pa mngon bar 'dod pa de 'dra ba srid pa ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'dra ba pha rol pos bsgrub par bya ba rjes su @237b 'dzin pa mngon bar 'dod pa de 'dra ba srid pa ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intended meaning is that it is impossible for the other party to establish what is to be accepted in the same way that it is accepted.

original: sngar ji skad bshad ba bzhin zhes pa /
analyzed: sngar ji skad bshad ba bzhin zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúJust as it was previously explained‚Äù means

original: dper brjod pa dang chos mthun nyid //
analyzed: dper brjod pa dang chos mthun nyid //
translated: The example and the property to be proven

original: 'ba' zhig de rnams kyis brjod bya //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig de rnams kyis brjod bya //
translated: Are only mentioned by those.

original: bsgrub bya sgrub byed gnyis brjod min //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub byed gnyis brjod min //
translated: The probandum and the probans are not stated.

original: de ltar de ba nyid tsam yin no //
analyzed: de ltar de ba nyid tsam yin no //
translated: That is just the way it is.

original: zhes pa'o ; / de ltar sgrub par byed pa nyid med par brjod do //
analyzed: zhes pa'o ; / de ltar sgrub par byed pa nyid med par brjod do //
translated: Thus, it is said that there is no proof.

original: dpe med pa yang gtan tshigs bcas pa'i bsgrub bya tsam mam /
analyzed: dpe med pa yang gtan tshigs bcas pa'i bsgrub bya tsam mam /
translated: Also, when there is no example, the probandum is merely stated with a reason.

original: de yi khyad par dpog pa na //
analyzed: de yi khyad par dpog pa na //
translated: When inferring its distinctions,

original: dpe ni thug pa med par 'gyur //
analyzed: dpe ni thug pa med par 'gyur //
translated: The example would be endless.

original: mi mthun phyogs las ldog par yang //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs las ldog par yang //
translated: Also, when there is a reversal from the discordant side,

original: ces pa'o // le'u bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: ces pa'o // le'u bzhi pa'o /
translated: This is the fourth chapter.

original: // / tshad ma gzhan du rtsod pa'i skabs sbyin pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / tshad ma gzhan du rtsod pa'i skabs sbyin pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: The chapter on the occasion of the dispute about valid cognition is stated for the sake of giving.

original: tshad ma gnyis bshad zin to zhes pa ste /
analyzed: tshad ma gnyis bshad zin to zhes pa ste /
translated: The two valid cognitions have been explained.

original: gang sngar dam bcas pa /
analyzed: gang sngar dam bcas pa /
translated: What was previously asserted

original: mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag / tshad ma dag ni gnyis kho na //
analyzed: mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag / tshad ma dag ni gnyis kho na //
translated: Perception and inference are the only two means of valid knowledge.

original: zhes pa'i tshad ma gnyis po de bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshad ma gnyis po de bshad zin to //
translated: These two means of valid knowledge have been explained.

original: rang gi tshad ma'i yon tan brjod pa las dang / gzhan gyi tshad ma dgag pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: rang gi tshad ma'i yon tan brjod pa las dang / gzhan gyi tshad ma dgag pa las kyang ngo //
translated: [They are established] from the statement of the qualities of one's own means of valid knowledge and from the refutation of the means of valid knowledge of others.

original: kha cig ni sgra las byung ba yang zhes pa kha cig ces pa ser skya pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: kha cig ni sgra las byung ba yang zhes pa kha cig ces pa ser skya pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Some say even from verbal testimony, some referring to the followers of Kapila and so on.

original: sgra las nye ba ma yin pa'i don la shes pa nye bar skye ba ni sgra las byung ba'o //
analyzed: sgra las nye ba ma yin pa'i don la shes pa nye bar skye ba ni sgra las byung ba'o //
translated: The arising of knowledge in proximity to an object that is not in proximity to sound is from verbal testimony.

original: don gyi go ba la sogs pa rnams 'ba' zhig tu ma zad do zhes pa yang gi sgra'i don to //
analyzed: don gyi go ba la sogs pa rnams 'ba' zhig tu ma zad do zhes pa yang gi sgra'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the word even is that it is not only understanding of meaning and so on.

original: ci ltar sgra las byung ba tshad ma gzhan ma yin zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar sgra las byung ba tshad ma gzhan ma yin zhen gsungs pa /
translated: How is it that what arises from sound is not another means of valid knowledge? It is stated:

original: de ltar de zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar de zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In that way, that... and so on.

original: de zhes pa shugs kyis thob pa sgra la sbrel lo //
analyzed: de zhes pa shugs kyis thob pa sgra la sbrel lo //
translated: The word that is connected to sound by implication.

original: byas sogs bzhin du zhes pa /
analyzed: byas sogs bzhin du zhes pa /
translated: Like produced and so on.

original: ji ltar byis pa nyid la sogs pa'i rtags ni tshul gsum dang ldan pa las rang gi don gsal bar byed pa de bzhin sgra yang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar byis pa nyid la sogs pa'i rtags ni tshul gsum dang ldan pa las rang gi don gsal bar byed pa de bzhin sgra yang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: make their own objects clear through the possession of the three modes, so also does sound.

original: dpe 'dis ni sgra rtag pa nyid du yongs su gsal bar byed bas sgra las byung ba rjes su dpag pa nyid du mtshon par gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: dpe 'dis ni sgra rtag pa nyid du yongs su gsal bar byed bas sgra las byung ba rjes su dpag pa nyid du mtshon par gsal bar byed do //
translated: This example makes it clear that sound is an inference because it makes known a permanent thing.

original: gzhan sel ba yis zhes ba don gzhan las ldog bas yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba yis zhes ba don gzhan las ldog bas yin gyi /
translated: By means of the exclusion of other, i.e., by the exclusion of other objects.

original: mthong ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i ngo bos ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i ngo bos ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not by the nature of an affirmation, as in perception.

original: sgra ni yul gang la rab tu sbyor ba zhes pa /üîΩdon gang go bar byed ba'i don du brjod ba de de'i yul te /
analyzed: sgra ni yul gang la rab tu sbyor ba zhes pa / don gang go bar byed ba'i don du brjod ba de de'i yul te /
translated: In regard to which object a sound is employed, i.e.,üîΩin regard to which object it is used to convey meaning.

original: go bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: go bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir //
translated: That is its object, because it is what is to be understood.

original: dper na rtags kyi rtags can bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rtags kyi rtags can bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the sign of a sign.

original: de'i yan lag gang gis zhes pa /
analyzed: de'i yan lag gang gis zhes pa /
translated: By which of its parts, i.e.,

original: brjod par bya @238a * //
analyzed: brjod par bya @238a * //
translated: by which of the parts of the object to be expressed.

original: ba'i don gyi yan lag yod pa nyid dang shes bya de nyid la sogs pa rnams ni mang ba ste /
analyzed: ba'i don gyi yan lag yod pa nyid dang shes bya de nyid la sogs pa rnams ni mang ba ste /
translated: The parts of the object to be expressed are many, such as existence and the knowable itself, etc.

original: de rnams thams cad dang shing la sogs pa'i sgra med na mi 'byung ba nyid du 'brel pa yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de rnams thams cad dang shing la sogs pa'i sgra med na mi 'byung ba nyid du 'brel pa yang ma yin gyi /
translated: And it is not that they are related to the sound of wood, etc. in the sense that they do not occur without it.

original: gang dang 'brel pa de byas pa nyid la sogs pa bzhin du don gzhan rnam par gcod pas gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: gang dang 'brel pa de byas pa nyid la sogs pa bzhin du don gzhan rnam par gcod pas gsal bar byed do //
translated: But when they are related to it, they make it clear by excluding other objects, just as they do with such things as being produced.

original: brjod pa ni sgra'i chos nyid du grags pa nyid kyi phyir dpe dang dpe can dag mi mtshungs pa nyid du ma gyur cig ces gsal bar byed do zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: brjod pa ni sgra'i chos nyid du grags pa nyid kyi phyir dpe dang dpe can dag mi mtshungs pa nyid du ma gyur cig ces gsal bar byed do zhes gsungs so //
translated: And since it is well known that expression is the nature of sound, we say that the example and the thing exemplified are not dissimilar.

original: des ji skad brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des ji skad brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: How is it expressed?

original: gang rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni de las tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni de las tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: That which has the nature of inference is not different from that.

original: du ba las me shes pa bzhin //
analyzed: du ba las me shes pa bzhin //
translated: It is like the knowledge of fire from smoke.üîΩAnd so it is with the knowledge of the object from the sound.

original: sgra las byung ba yang de lta bu yin no zhes pa khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba yang de lta bu yin no zhes pa khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: This is a contradiction of the pervasion.

original: ci ste / gzhan sel ba yin rjod par byed //
analyzed: ci ste / gzhan sel ba yin rjod par byed //
translated: But if you say that it is the exclusion of other that is expressed,

original: ces pa 'di ci'i don du yin //
analyzed: ces pa 'di ci'i don du yin //
translated: what is the meaning of this?

original: ji tsam du /
analyzed: ji tsam du /
translated: To the extent that

original: byas nyid sogs bzhin rjod par byed //
analyzed: byas nyid sogs bzhin rjod par byed //
translated: it is expressed like being produced, etc.

original: ces pa 'di kho nas rjes su dpag pa las sgra las byung ba tha mi dad par rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: ces pa 'di kho nas rjes su dpag pa las sgra las byung ba tha mi dad par rtogs so zhe na /
translated: If you say that the inference is not different from the verbal, just because of this alone,

original: dgos pa yod do //
analyzed: dgos pa yod do //
translated: then there is a purpose.

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i rtags ni don gzhan rnam par gcod pas rang gi don rtogs par byed do zhes sngar 'di bsgrubs zin to //
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i rtags ni don gzhan rnam par gcod pas rang gi don rtogs par byed do zhes sngar 'di bsgrubs zin to //
translated: It has already been established earlier that a reason such as being produced causes one to understand its own object by excluding other objects.

original: de'i phyir gal te gzhan sel bas zhes pa 'di ma brjod na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te gzhan sel bas zhes pa 'di ma brjod na /
translated: Therefore, if this phrase ‚Äúby way of the exclusion of other‚Äù is not stated,

original: de'i tshe tshad ma gzhan smra ba rnams kyi rtogs pa 'dir 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe tshad ma gzhan smra ba rnams kyi rtogs pa 'dir 'gyur te /
translated: then at that time, the understanding of the proponents of other valid knowledge would be as follows.

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i rtags ni don gzhan las ldog pas rang gi don rtogs par byed cing /
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i rtags ni don gzhan las ldog pas rang gi don rtogs par byed cing /
translated: A reason such as being produced causes one to understand its own object by excluding other objects.

original: sgra ni sgrub pa'i sgo yis te //
analyzed: sgra ni sgrub pa'i sgo yis te //
translated: And a word is a means of affirmation.

original: de kho na'i khyad par las sgra las byung ba rjes su dpag pa las tha dad do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na'i khyad par las sgra las byung ba rjes su dpag pa las tha dad do zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the verbal is different from the inference because of the difference in the object.

original: de'i phyir / de gsal ba'i don du 'di bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir / de gsal ba'i don du 'di bshad do //
translated: Therefore, this is explained for the sake of clarifying that.

original: slar yang skabs gzhan gyis 'di'i dogs ba bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes re zhig gzhag go //
analyzed: slar yang skabs gzhan gyis 'di'i dogs ba bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes re zhig gzhag go //
translated: We will resolve this point later.

original: ci ltar sgra'i tshul gsum nyid yin /
analyzed: ci ltar sgra'i tshul gsum nyid yin /
translated: How can the three modes of the reason be established?

original: ci ltar mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: ci ltar mi 'gyur na /
translated: How can they not be established?

original: chos can mi rigs pa'i phyir ro//üîΩde ltar ni sgra'i don ni chos can nyid du 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: chos can mi rigs pa'i phyir ro// de ltar ni sgra'i don ni chos can nyid du 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: Because the subject is not tenable.

original: rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa nyid bzhin no //üîΩdon la sgra mthong ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa nyid bzhin no // don la sgra mthong ba yang ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of a word is not tenable as the subject because it is what is to be realized, like impermanence.

original: smra ba po la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: smra ba po la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Nor is the meaning of a word seen in the word because it exists in the speaker.

original: de kho na la nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na la nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it is observed in him alone.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni tshad ma gzhan kho na ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni tshad ma gzhan kho na ste /
translated: Therefore this is a different kind of valid knowledge.

original: @238b brda ji lta ba bzhin du don rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: @238b brda ji lta ba bzhin du don rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
translated: It is the cause of understanding the meaning in accordance with the word.

original: de dang 'di ni sgra las byung ba'i tshad ma nyid kyi yul yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir 'di ltar brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de dang 'di ni sgra las byung ba'i tshad ma nyid kyi yul yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir 'di ltar brjod pa ste /
translated: This is said because the domain of this valid knowledge that arises from words is not understood.

original: de'i phyi rol gyi don la tshad ma nyid ma yin pas te /
analyzed: de'i phyi rol gyi don la tshad ma nyid ma yin pas te /
translated: Because it is not a valid cognition in regard to external objects.

original: de ltar ni de de'i rtogs par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin pas te /
analyzed: de ltar ni de de'i rtogs par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin pas te /
translated: In that case, it is not a means of knowing that.

original: 'o na ci la zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci la zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: brjod par 'dod pa la ste /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa la ste /
translated: It is in regard to what is desired to be expressed.

original: de la ni sgra'i tshul gsum pa nyid yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de la ni sgra'i tshul gsum pa nyid yod pa kho na'o //
translated: In that case, the three modes of the sign do exist.

original: de ltar ni brjod par 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chos can no //
analyzed: de ltar ni brjod par 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chos can no //
translated: In that case, a person who possesses what is desired to be expressed is the subject.

original: brjod par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos so //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos so //
translated: What is desired to be expressed is the property to be proven.

original: brjod par 'dod pa dang ldan pa la nye bar dmigs pa yod pa kho na'i phyir sgra ni phyogs kyi chos so //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa dang ldan pa la nye bar dmigs pa yod pa kho na'i phyir sgra ni phyogs kyi chos so //
translated: Because the mere observation of what possesses what is desired to be expressed exists, the sign is a property of the subject.

original: brjod par 'dod pa dang ldan pa sngar nyams su myong ba ni mthun phyogs so //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa dang ldan pa sngar nyams su myong ba ni mthun phyogs so //
translated: A person who previously experienced what possesses what is desired to be expressed is the similar class.üîΩBeing devoid of that is the dissimilar class.

original: de dang bral ba ni mi mthun phyogs so zhes pas ci ltar tshul gsum srid pa ma yin /
analyzed: de dang bral ba ni mi mthun phyogs so zhes pas ci ltar tshul gsum srid pa ma yin /
translated: In that case, how is it that the three modes are impossible?

original: 'o na brjod par 'dod pa la yang de tshad ma nyid ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'o na brjod par 'dod pa la yang de tshad ma nyid ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Well then, in regard to what is desired to be expressed, that is not a valid cognition at all.

original: de ltar ni brjod par 'dod pa spyi la tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ram /
analyzed: de ltar ni brjod par 'dod pa spyi la tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ram /
translated: In this way, is it a valid cognition with regard to the general object that is intended to be expressed?

original: yang na brjod par 'dod pa'i khyad par la yin /
analyzed: yang na brjod par 'dod pa'i khyad par la yin /
translated: Or is it with regard to the particular object that is intended to be expressed?

original: re zhig spyi la ma yin te de las tha snyad du mi rigs ba'i phyir ro //üîΩgal te brjod par 'dod pa'i spyi sgra'i don du gyur na go zhes brjod pa na dgu bzung ba'i yi ge'i rnam par dbye ba /
analyzed: re zhig spyi la ma yin te de las tha snyad du mi rigs ba'i phyir ro // gal te brjod par 'dod pa'i spyi sgra'i don du gyur na go zhes brjod pa na dgu bzung ba'i yi ge'i rnam par dbye ba /
translated: First, it is not with regard to the general object, because it is not possible to designate it conventionally.

original: 'di ci smra zhes yongs su rjes su sbyor ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ci smra zhes yongs su rjes su sbyor ba ma yin te /
translated: If the general object that is intended to be expressed were the meaning of a word, then when one says ‚Äúgo,‚Äù the analysis of the letters that comprise the word would not be applied to the word ‚Äúwhat are you saying?‚Äù

original: sgra brjod pa tsam kho na las brjod bar 'dod pa'i spyi'i nges bar shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra brjod pa tsam kho na las brjod bar 'dod pa'i spyi'i nges bar shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because the mere utterance of the word itself produces the understanding of the general object that is intended to be expressed.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i spyi'i don dang ldan pa nyid ni sgra rnams 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i spyi'i don dang ldan pa nyid ni sgra rnams 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, the possession of the meaning of the general object that is intended to be expressed is not the cause for the engagement of words.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i spyis ni don du gnyer ba po 'ga' zhig rab tu 'jug pa'i yan lag dang tshad ma yang ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i spyis ni don du gnyer ba po 'ga' zhig rab tu 'jug pa'i yan lag dang tshad ma yang ma yin te /
translated: The general object that is intended to be expressed is not a part of the engagement of someone who is seeking the meaning, nor is it a valid means of knowledge.

original: 'di dag gis don yongs su bcad nas 'jug pa na don bya ba la slu ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di dag gis don yongs su bcad nas 'jug pa na don bya ba la slu ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when one engages in a referent having ascertained its meaning, one is not deceived with respect to the referent object.

original: de 'di ltar brjod bar 'dod pa'i spyi la tshad ma nyid ma yin no ;
analyzed: de 'di ltar brjod bar 'dod pa'i spyi la tshad ma nyid ma yin no ;
translated: But it is not a valid cognition with respect to the universal that one wishes to express.

original: / khyad bar la yang ma yin te 'khrul ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / khyad bar la yang ma yin te 'khrul ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is it with respect to a particular, because it is mistaken.

original: de yang brjod par 'dod pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa las sgra gzhan du dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang brjod par 'dod pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa las sgra gzhan du dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is because the sound is observed elsewhere than in the particular that one wishes to express.

original: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: ji ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa smra ba de ltar 'dod chags dang bral pa yang ngo @239a * //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa smra ba de ltar 'dod chags dang bral pa yang ngo @239a * //
translated: Just as one who is attached speaks, so too does one who is free from attachment.

original: zhes so // sgra'i tha snyad ni blo sngon du btang nas rnam pa gzhan du yang bya bar nus te /
analyzed: zhes so // sgra'i tha snyad ni blo sngon du btang nas rnam pa gzhan du yang bya bar nus te /
translated: Moreover, the convention of sound can be done in another way, having first taken the mind as one‚Äôs object.

original: de'i phyir sgra rnams las khyad par nges pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra rnams las khyad par nges pa ma yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, a particular is not ascertained from the sounds.

original: khyad par kho na yang tha snyad kyi yan lag yin na /
analyzed: khyad par kho na yang tha snyad kyi yan lag yin na /
translated: And if only a particular is a part of the convention,

original: de yang nges par gzung par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ;
analyzed: de yang nges par gzung par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ;
translated: then it cannot be apprehended with certainty.

original: / ci las sgra las byung ba tshad ma nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: / ci las sgra las byung ba tshad ma nyid yin zhe na /
translated: But is it not the case that the word valid cognition is used for that which arises from a word?

original: de la brjod par 'dod pa'i spyi ni mi 'khrul na yang sgra'i don ma yin te des tha snyad la mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes gang brjod pa de rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la brjod par 'dod pa'i spyi ni mi 'khrul na yang sgra'i don ma yin te des tha snyad la mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes gang brjod pa de rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: To this we reply: The universal that is intended to be expressed is not the meaning of the word, because it is not applied to the convention. This is not correct.

original: gang zhig rgyud gzhan tsam bsgrub par bya ba don du gnyer ba po de la ci ltar brjod par 'dod pa'i spyi tha snyad kyi yan lag ma yin /
analyzed: gang zhig rgyud gzhan tsam bsgrub par bya ba don du gnyer ba po de la ci ltar brjod par 'dod pa'i spyi tha snyad kyi yan lag ma yin /
translated: For, what is the universal that is intended to be expressed, which is not a part of the convention, for one who seeks to establish merely another continuum?

original: 'di ni sgra las brjod par 'dod pa'i spyi yongs su bcad nas 'jug pa na rgyud gzhan tsam bsgrub par bya ba'i don bya ba la 'jug pa na slu ba med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgang yang khyad par la yang tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni sgra las brjod par 'dod pa'i spyi yongs su bcad nas 'jug pa na rgyud gzhan tsam bsgrub par bya ba'i don bya ba la 'jug pa na slu ba med pa'i phyir ro // gang yang khyad par la yang tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
translated: Because, when the word engages in the ascertainment of the universal that is intended to be expressed, it engages in the activity of establishing merely another continuum, without deception.üîΩAlso, it is not correct to say, It is not a valid cognition with regard to a particular, because it is deceptive.

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa de yang yang dag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa de yang yang dag pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not correct.

original: khyad par kho na gtan tshigs nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par kho na gtan tshigs nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the particular itself is the reason.

original: gal te khyad par ni rjes su 'gro ba dka' ba nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs nyid du mi rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par ni rjes su 'gro ba dka' ba nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs nyid du mi rigs so zhe na /
translated: If you say that a particular is not suitable as a reason because it is difficult to follow,

original: 'o na du ba yang gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na du ba yang gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: then smoke would not be a reason.

original: 'di yang sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i du ba ltar snang ba'i 'byung ba 'dus pa las ni gzhan las log pa'i ngo bor rtogs pa po thams cad kyis nges par gzung bar nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di yang sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i du ba ltar snang ba'i 'byung ba 'dus pa las ni gzhan las log pa'i ngo bor rtogs pa po thams cad kyis nges par gzung bar nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, like smoke conjured up by a magician, it is not possible for everyone to apprehend it as an entity that is the opposite of other.

original: ci ste gang zhig de nges par gzung bar nus pa de'i ngor de rjes su dpag pa'i yan lag nyid yin na /
analyzed: ci ste gang zhig de nges par gzung bar nus pa de'i ngor de rjes su dpag pa'i yan lag nyid yin na /
translated: But if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.

original: de dang 'di ni cig shos la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de dang 'di ni cig shos la yang mtshungs so //
translated: This is the same for the other.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.

original: yang na nges par rtogs pa pos mi slu ba'i dag 'di ni 'di 'dra bar gang la mngon par zhen pa de'i tshig ni mi slu bar mtshungs pa nyid du sgro btags nas rjes su dpag par byed de /
analyzed: yang na nges par rtogs pa pos mi slu ba'i dag 'di ni 'di 'dra bar gang la mngon par zhen pa de'i tshig ni mi slu bar mtshungs pa nyid du sgro btags nas rjes su dpag par byed de /
translated: Or, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to apprehend it, then it is a part of inference.üîΩOr, if it is possible to

original: de'i phyir rtogs pa po'i bsam pa'i khyad par gyi dbang las /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtogs pa po'i bsam pa'i khyad par gyi dbang las /
translated: Therefore, the word is said to be inferred in accordance with the special intention of the knower,

original: khyad par la sgra rjes su dpag pa nyid du gsungs te don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par la sgra rjes su dpag pa nyid du gsungs te don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: but not ultimately.

original: gzhan sel bas sgra'i don rtogs par byed do zhes bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan sel bas sgra'i don rtogs par byed do zhes bshad pa yin te /
translated: It has been explained that the meaning of a word is understood through the exclusion of other.

original: de rjes su ma bsams pas gang rnams smra ba /
analyzed: de rjes su ma bsams pas gang rnams smra ba /
translated: Those who speak without thinking about that

original: rigs kyi sgra zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: say, ‚ÄúThe word ‚Äògenus‚Äô is not a word for an existent.‚Äù

original: rigs kyi sgra ni yod ba la sogs @239b ba'o ;
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra ni yod ba la sogs @239b ba'o ;
translated: The word ‚Äògenus‚Äô is a word for an existent, etc.

original: / ci ltar rigs brjod par bya ba ma yin par gyur pa tha snyad kyi rgyu yin zhe na /
analyzed: / ci ltar rigs brjod par bya ba ma yin par gyur pa tha snyad kyi rgyu yin zhe na /
translated: How can a genus, which is not to be expressed, be the cause of a convention?

original: tha dad med par nye bar gdags pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir yon tan bzhin no //
analyzed: tha dad med par nye bar gdags pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir yon tan bzhin no //
translated: Because it is the cause of the designation of nondifference, like a quality.

original: dper na bram ze'i khye'u seng ge zhes pa bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na bram ze'i khye'u seng ge zhes pa bzhin te /
translated: For example, it is like the case of the young brahmin Si·πÖgha.

original: dpa' ba nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par ni seng ge dang bram ze'i khye'u dag gi tha dad med par nye bar gdags ba'i rgyur 'gyur zhing tha snyad kyi rgyur 'gyur te /
analyzed: dpa' ba nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par ni seng ge dang bram ze'i khye'u dag gi tha dad med par nye bar gdags ba'i rgyur 'gyur zhing tha snyad kyi rgyur 'gyur te /
translated: The particular qualities of being brave and so on are the cause of designation as nondifferent from the lion and the brahman youth, and they are the cause of conventional expressions.üîΩThe word quality is like that. Even though the words are different, they are the cause of designation as nondifferent.

original: yon tan gyi sgra zhes pa yin pa de ltar rigs kyang ste sgra'i tha dad pa rnams kyis tha mi dad par nye bar gdags pa'i rgyu'o zhes pas rigs kyi sgra zhes de ni tha snyad kyi rgyu yin no //üîΩrang gi khyad par rnams shes pa rang gi ste rigs kyi khyad par rnams te /
analyzed: yon tan gyi sgra zhes pa yin pa de ltar rigs kyang ste sgra'i tha dad pa rnams kyis tha mi dad par nye bar gdags pa'i rgyu'o zhes pas rigs kyi sgra zhes de ni tha snyad kyi rgyu yin no // rang gi khyad par rnams shes pa rang gi ste rigs kyi khyad par rnams te /
translated: The particularities of the class are the cause of the conventional expression.

original: rigs gang gis sgra gang gi tha snyad du ston pa'i rgyu yin pa de ni de'i rang gi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs gang gis sgra gang gi tha snyad du ston pa'i rgyu yin pa de ni de'i rang gi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The particularities of the class are the cause of the conventional expression of the word.

original: phan tshun khyad par du byed cing tha dad du byed do zhes pa khyad par rnams te /
analyzed: phan tshun khyad par du byed cing tha dad du byed do zhes pa khyad par rnams te /
translated: The particularities are those that make distinctions and create differences.

original: dper na rigs yod pa'i rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rigs yod pa'i rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the particularities of the class of substances, qualities, and actions that exist.

original: thams cad rnams kho na smras pa zhes pa /
analyzed: thams cad rnams kho na smras pa zhes pa /
translated: All of them are said to beüîΩ

original: cung zad tsam kho na ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: cung zad tsam kho na ma yin pa'o //
translated: All means not just a few.

original: de ltar ni bram ze gsad par bya ba ma yin no zhes pas brjod pa na /
analyzed: de ltar ni bram ze gsad par bya ba ma yin no zhes pas brjod pa na /
translated: If it were otherwise, then when one says the Brahmin should not be killed,

original: bram ze'i rigs kyi khyad par ma tha ra'i bu la sogs pa thams cad gsad par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs kyi khyad par ma tha ra'i bu la sogs pa thams cad gsad par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: it would follow that the Brahmin's particular attributes, such as being the son of a Brahmin, are not to be killed.

original: gal te rigs kyi sgras rang gi khyad par ma lus pa brjod na /üîΩ'o na bram ze kun di na'i bu shog cig ces khyad par gyi mnyan pa ci'i don du yin /
analyzed: gal te rigs kyi sgras rang gi khyad par ma lus pa brjod na / 'o na bram ze kun di na'i bu shog cig ces khyad par gyi mnyan pa ci'i don du yin /
translated: If the word class expresses all of its particular attributes,üîΩthen what is the point of the particularizing term in the expression the Brahmin, the son of Kundina, should come?

original: bram ze'i sgra ji tsam bas kun di na'i bu mngon bar brjod pas so zhe na /
analyzed: bram ze'i sgra ji tsam bas kun di na'i bu mngon bar brjod pas so zhe na /
translated: If you say that the word Brahmin expresses just the son of Kundina,

original: smras ba brjod pa rnams la ni nges pa'i don du khyad par gyi sgra zhes pa /
analyzed: smras ba brjod pa rnams la ni nges pa'i don du khyad par gyi sgra zhes pa /
translated: we reply that in expressions that have a particularizing term, the word Brahmin

original: kun di na'i bu kho na ste ma tha ra'i bu ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: kun di na'i bu kho na ste ma tha ra'i bu ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: means only the son of Kundina, not the son of Mathara.

original: dper na bya bas ni rdzas 'dren bar byed do zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: dper na bya bas ni rdzas 'dren bar byed do zhes brjod pa na /
translated: For example, when it is said, The substance is brought by the action,üîΩthe word action is particularized as being the action of bringing.

original: slar yang rdzas ma yin pa ni ma yin zhes nges pa'i don du brjod pa bzhin dang / ji ltar rdzas kho na rtogs pa bzhin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang rdzas ma yin pa ni ma yin zhes nges pa'i don du brjod pa bzhin dang / ji ltar rdzas kho na rtogs pa bzhin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Again, it is not that it is not a substance, as it is said in the definitive meaning, and as it is said, ‚Äújust as it is understood as a substance.‚Äù

original: rjod par byed ba zhes brjod par bya ste zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rjod par byed ba zhes brjod par bya ste zhes pa ste /
translated: It should be said that it is the expression.

original: dogs pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i dag ces pas na 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshig gis dogs pa rnam par gcod par ston to //
analyzed: dogs pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i dag ces pas na 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshig gis dogs pa rnam par gcod par ston to //
translated: Since it is doubtful, it is said to be incomplete, and therefore the words that will be explained show the elimination of doubt.

original: mtha' yas nyid phyir zhes pa 'thad pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas nyid phyir zhes pa 'thad pa'o //
translated: The reason is ‚Äúbecause of infinity.‚Äù

original: ci zhig mtha' yas pa'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig mtha' yas pa'i phyir zhe na /
translated: What is infinite?

original: skabs nyid kyi phyir khyad par rnams kho na @240a * //
analyzed: skabs nyid kyi phyir khyad par rnams kho na @240a * //
translated: Because of the context, it is the distinctions themselves.

original: ste ; gang gsungs pa khyad par rnams ni mtha' yas pa yin na ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //üîΩ'brel ba bya bar mi nus zhes pa /
analyzed: ste ; gang gsungs pa khyad par rnams ni mtha' yas pa yin na ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o // 'brel ba bya bar mi nus zhes pa /
translated: As it is said, ‚ÄúIf the distinctions are infinite‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on.

original: brjod pa ste /
analyzed: brjod pa ste /
translated: It is said that it is not possible to connect them.

original: bya ba'i byings ni don du ma can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba'i byings ni don du ma can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The verbal root is used for multiple meanings.

original: de 'di gtan tshigs gnyis bshad de //
analyzed: de 'di gtan tshigs gnyis bshad de //
translated: That is explained with two reasons.

original: mtha' yas pa nyid ni 'brel pa mi nus pa nyid la gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa nyid ni 'brel pa mi nus pa nyid la gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason for the infinite is the impossibility of connection.

original: 'brel ba ma brjod pa nyid ni yang rjod par byed pa ma yin pa nyid la ste /
analyzed: 'brel ba ma brjod pa nyid ni yang rjod par byed pa ma yin pa nyid la ste /
translated: The non-mention of connection is the non-mention of the reason.

original: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: 'brel ba ma byas pa'i sgra la ni don rjod par byed pa'i rigs pa ma yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel ba ma byas pa'i sgra la ni don rjod par byed pa'i rigs pa ma yin zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe word that is not connected does not express the meaning.‚Äù

original: mtha' yas pa nyid kyang yul gyis bskal pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' yas pa nyid kyang yul gyis bskal pa ste /
translated: The infinite is also separated by the object.

original: nye bar rjod par byed pa'i mtha'i sgra'i dgag pa dang mngon par 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar rjod par byed pa'i mtha'i sgra'i dgag pa dang mngon par 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is connected with the negation and the final word of the expression.

original: de dang 'dis 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: de dang 'dis 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is shown by that and this.

original: gang rnams bskal pa'i yul du 'jug pa de rnams 'dir gnas pa rnams kyis rang nyid kyi sbyor zla'i 'brel pa nyid du brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang rnams bskal pa'i yul du 'jug pa de rnams 'dir gnas pa rnams kyis rang nyid kyi sbyor zla'i 'brel pa nyid du brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Those that enter the separated object here, those that are present here, are not able to express the connection of their own conjunction.

original: dper na mtho ris su song ba'i nag pa la sogs pa rnams bzhin /
analyzed: dper na mtho ris su song ba'i nag pa la sogs pa rnams bzhin /
translated: For example, like those that have gone to heaven, like NƒÅgƒÅrjuna and so on.

original: khyad par kha cig rnams kyang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par kha cig rnams kyang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: Some particular ones are also like that. This is the contradiction with the pervader.

original: yang na mu med pa nyid mtha' yas pa nyid de /
analyzed: yang na mu med pa nyid mtha' yas pa nyid de /
translated: Or else, the infinite is the endless.

original: phyogs kyi mtha' bzhin te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi mtha' bzhin te /
translated: Like the end of space,

original: yongs su bcad brjod par byed pa'i mtha' sgra dgag sgra dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su bcad brjod par byed pa'i mtha' sgra dgag sgra dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the end of the expression of the delimitation, since it is connected with the negative particle.

original: sbyor ba ni gang rnams mu med ba de rnams rang dang 'brel pa can gyi 'brel pa can nyid du bshad par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang rnams mu med ba de rnams rang dang 'brel pa can gyi 'brel pa can nyid du bshad par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The application is this: those which are endless are not to be explained as connected with their own delimiters.üîΩThe particularities are like that, like the atoms of the earth.

original: sa gzhi'i rdul bzhin khyad par rnams kyang de lta bu'o zhes pa 'gal ba de kho na'o //
analyzed: sa gzhi'i rdul bzhin khyad par rnams kyang de lta bu'o zhes pa 'gal ba de kho na'o //
translated: The contradiction is just that.

original: 'brel pa ma byas pa zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: 'brel pa ma byas pa zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: By ‚Äúnot connected‚Äù and so on,üîΩhe states the non-observation of the pervaded.

original: gang khyad par rnams dang 'brel pa ma bshad pa de ni /
analyzed: gang khyad par rnams dang 'brel pa ma bshad pa de ni /
translated: That which is not explained as connected with the particularities

original: de rnams kyi rjod par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rjod par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: is not their expresser,

original: 'phags pa pa'i ngor kla klo'i sgra bzhin /
analyzed: 'phags pa pa'i ngor kla klo'i sgra bzhin /
translated: like the sound of a barbarian to an ƒÅrya.

original: rigs kyi sgra yang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab byed mi dmigs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra yang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab byed mi dmigs pa gsungs so //
translated: The word ‚Äútype‚Äù is like that.

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa dpe gsal bar byed ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa dpe gsal bar byed ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is understood as just its own nature‚Äù clarifies the example.

original: kla klo'i sgra la ni sgra'i rang gi ngo bo tsam kho na rtogs kyi don ni ma yin pas so //
analyzed: kla klo'i sgra la ni sgra'i rang gi ngo bo tsam kho na rtogs kyi don ni ma yin pas so //
translated: The word ‚Äúbarbarian‚Äù means that one understands only the nature of the sound, not the meaning.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa gtan tshigs sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa gtan tshigs sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Moreover‚Äù is a reason.

original: ci ltar na yang 'khrul pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar na yang 'khrul pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it mistaken? It is said:

original: ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúHow?‚Äù and so on.

original: rdzas med na yang @240b yon tan mthong ba'i phyir dang / de med na yang rdzas dang las dag la yang zhes pa thams cad du 'khrul bar the tshom du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzas med na yang @240b yon tan mthong ba'i phyir dang / de med na yang rdzas dang las dag la yang zhes pa thams cad du 'khrul bar the tshom du 'gyur ro //
translated: Because qualities are seen even when substances do not exist, and because even when they do not exist, there is doubt that substances and actions are mistaken everywhere.

original: rjod par byed pa ma yin zhes ba gang zhig gang la the tshom gyi rgyu yin pa de de'i rtogs par byed ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa ma yin zhes ba gang zhig gang la the tshom gyi rgyu yin pa de de'i rtogs par byed ba ma yin te /
translated: That which is not an expression is not an understanding of that, of which it is the cause of doubt.

original: 'di lta ste gzhal bya nyid rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag gi bzhin rigs kyi sgra yang khyad par rnams la de lta bu'o zhes rang bzhin 'gal ba gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di lta ste gzhal bya nyid rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag gi bzhin rigs kyi sgra yang khyad par rnams la de lta bu'o zhes rang bzhin 'gal ba gsungs so //
translated: For example, like the object of knowledge itself, which is permanent and impermanent, the word ‚Äúgenus‚Äù is like that with regard to the distinctions. Thus, a contradictory nature is stated.

original: the tshom gyi rgyu nyid dang 'khrul pa'i phyir zhes ba 'dis gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyu nyid dang 'khrul pa'i phyir zhes ba 'dis gsal bar byas so //
translated: This is made clear by the words ‚Äúbecause of being the cause of doubt and because of error.‚Äù

original: gang zhig gang la 'khrul pa de ni de la the tshom gyi rgyu ste /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la 'khrul pa de ni de la the tshom gyi rgyu ste /
translated: Whatever is the cause of error with regard to something is the cause of doubt with regard to that.

original: dpe de kho na'o //
analyzed: dpe de kho na'o //
translated: This is just like the example.

original: rigs kyi sgra yang khyad par la 'khrul pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra yang khyad par la 'khrul pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äútype‚Äù is also in error with regard to the particular.

original: rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature.

original: 'o na rigs kyi sgra las rang gi khyad par thams cad rtogs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na rigs kyi sgra las rang gi khyad par thams cad rtogs pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the particular understood from the word ‚Äútype‚Äù?

original: thams cad la the tshom nye bar skye ba ni ma yin zhing /
analyzed: thams cad la the tshom nye bar skye ba ni ma yin zhing /
translated: It is not that doubt arises with regard to everything.

original: rang gi khyad par thams cad med pa na nam yang /
analyzed: rang gi khyad par thams cad med pa na nam yang /
translated: And when the particular is absent,

original: rigs kyi sgra ni 'ga' zhig tu yang don gzhan la 'jug pa nye bar dmigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra ni 'ga' zhig tu yang don gzhan la 'jug pa nye bar dmigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: the word ‚Äútype‚Äù is never observed to refer to something else.

original: des na ci'i phyir 'khrul zhe na skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: des na ci'i phyir 'khrul zhe na skyon 'di med de /
translated: So why is there error? This fault does not arise.

original: rigs kyi sgras khyad par dang khyad par med pa'i ngo bo la reg pas rtogs par bya ba ni ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rigs kyi sgras khyad par dang khyad par med pa'i ngo bo la reg pas rtogs par bya ba ni ma yin zhing /
translated: The word ‚Äútype‚Äù does not make one understand by touching the nature of the particular and the universal.

original: gang sgras brjod par bya ba khyad par mtha' dag gi ngo bo zhes bya ba de rnams kyi spyi yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang sgras brjod par bya ba khyad par mtha' dag gi ngo bo zhes bya ba de rnams kyi spyi yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The entity that is the referent of the term ‚Äúthat which is expressed‚Äù does not exist as a universal of all the particular instances.üîΩ

original: khyad par gyi ngo bo yongs su gtong ba na /
analyzed: khyad par gyi ngo bo yongs su gtong ba na /
translated: The universal of those things that are called ‚Äúparticulars‚Äù does not exist, because when the nature of the particulars is abandoned,

original: de rnams kho na'i rigs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kho na'i rigs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it follows that they are just the same type.

original: khyad bar gyi ngo bos khyab ba yod ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad bar gyi ngo bos khyab ba yod ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there a universal that pervades the nature of the particulars,

original: khyad par gyi ngo bo ni phan tshun log pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bsam grub pa med do //
analyzed: khyad par gyi ngo bo ni phan tshun log pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bsam grub pa med do //
translated: because the nature of the particulars is mutually exclusive.üîΩThis is the thought of the master BuddhapƒÅlita.

original: gang yang sems pa zhes pa skyon snga ma med pa las phyogs gzhan nye bar dgod pa'o //üîΩ'brel pa sla ba nyid kyi phyir dang mi 'khrul ba'i phyir zhes pa sla ba ni rigs gcig nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: gang yang sems pa zhes pa skyon snga ma med pa las phyogs gzhan nye bar dgod pa'o // 'brel pa sla ba nyid kyi phyir dang mi 'khrul ba'i phyir zhes pa sla ba ni rigs gcig nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: The master BhƒÅviveka, on the other hand, states the following:

original: yul mang po nyid yod na'ang so sor bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yul mang po nyid yod na'ang so sor bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the relation is easy and because there is no error. Easy means that they are of the same type, because even though there are many objects, each is complete in itself.

original: nye ba nyid kyi phyir yang rten nye ba nyid kyis 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: nye ba nyid kyi phyir yang rten nye ba nyid kyis 'brel pa'o //
translated: Because of proximity, there is a connection by the proximity of the basis.

original: 'brel ba rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du ba yang 'khrul pa yang med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'brel ba rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du ba yang 'khrul pa yang med pa kho na'o //
translated: The connection is the meeting of the basis with the object, and there is no error at all.

original: khyad bar rnams ni du ma nyid kyi phyir phan tshun med pa la yang yod pa'i 'khrul bar rigs kyi rigs sam sbyor ba la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad bar rnams ni du ma nyid kyi phyir phan tshun med pa la yang yod pa'i 'khrul bar rigs kyi rigs sam sbyor ba la ni ma yin te /
translated: Since the distinctions are many, there is the possibility of error in the presence of mutual absence, but not in the case of a class or application.

original: de dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir dang / @241a * //
analyzed: de dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir dang / @241a * //
translated: Because they are not different,

original: de med na yang sgra mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na yang sgra mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because the word does not apply in the absence of that.

original: de mi rigs zhes pa rigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de mi rigs zhes pa rigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes pa'i don to //
translated: That is not reasonable means that it is not connected with reason.

original: yang 'dir rigs ba ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: yang 'dir rigs ba ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is the reason here?

original: lung zhes bya ba'i tshad ma'o //
analyzed: lung zhes bya ba'i tshad ma'o //
translated: The authority called scripture.

original: ci ltar de dang 'brel pa ma yin zhe na /üîΩtha dad pa'i /
analyzed: ci ltar de dang 'brel pa ma yin zhe na / tha dad pa'i /
translated: How is it not connected with that?

original: don dang tha dad med thos phyir //üîΩgang rnams kyi don tha dad yin pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: don dang tha dad med thos phyir // gang rnams kyi don tha dad yin pa zhes pa ste /
translated: Because of the difference of meaning and the non-difference of hearing.üîΩThose whose meaning is different means

original: tha dad pa'i don can gyi bye brag gi sgra rnams so //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i don can gyi bye brag gi sgra rnams so //
translated: the words that have a different meaning.

original: de rnams dang tha dad med par thos pa ni gzhi mthun pa nyid de /
analyzed: de rnams dang tha dad med par thos pa ni gzhi mthun pa nyid de /
translated: Hearing that they are not different is the common locus.

original: tha dad med pa ste gzhi gcig la thos pa zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: tha dad med pa ste gzhi gcig la thos pa zhes byas nas so //
translated: They are not different, that is, they are in one locus, and they are heard.

original: yid ches pa rnams las tha dad med par thos pa yod pa'i rdzas zhes pa la sogs pa mthong ba der mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: yid ches pa rnams las tha dad med par thos pa yod pa'i rdzas zhes pa la sogs pa mthong ba der mi 'gyur na /
translated: If the substance of hearing that exists without being different from the reliable sources were not seen there,

original: de yang mthong ngo zhes pa rigs dang 'brel pa rjod par byed pa dam bca' ba bstan bcos su mthong bas gzhi mthun pa nyid kyis gnod do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang mthong ngo zhes pa rigs dang 'brel pa rjod par byed pa dam bca' ba bstan bcos su mthong bas gzhi mthun pa nyid kyis gnod do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: then it would be seen, and the thesis that expresses the connection with the reason would be undermined by the common locus, as it is seen in the treatise. This is the meaning.

original: yang na gang gis tha dad pa'i don can rnams dang gzhi mthun pa nyid yin pa de ni rigs dang sbyor ba brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na gang gis tha dad pa'i don can rnams dang gzhi mthun pa nyid yin pa de ni rigs dang sbyor ba brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: Or, that which is the common locus of those that have different meanings is not an expression of the connection with the reason.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: 'di bum ba'o 'di sgra'o zhes pa bzhin /
analyzed: 'di bum ba'o 'di sgra'o zhes pa bzhin /
translated: this is a pot, this is a sound.

original: yod pa'i sgra'i yang tha dad pa'i don can rnams dang gzhi mthun pa nyid yin no zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
analyzed: yod pa'i sgra'i yang tha dad pa'i don can rnams dang gzhi mthun pa nyid yin no zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
translated: The common locus of those that have different meanings is the object of the word existent. This is said to be a contradiction with the pervasion.

original: yang ci'i phyir bstan ba 'di la gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /üîΩyod pa nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir bstan ba 'di la gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa / yod pa nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said:

original: gang gi phyir rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams la don gzhan pa yod pa nyid bshad la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams la don gzhan pa yod pa nyid bshad la /
translated: Because of the existence of substance, quality, and action,

original: 'brel ba yang rdzas la sogs pa dgag pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel ba yang rdzas la sogs pa dgag pa ste /
translated: and because of the connection of substance and so on,

original: dngos po la ni bshad pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po la ni bshad pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: the word ‚Äúexistence‚Äù is explained in relation to things.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúWhat is it?‚Äù

original: rdzas kyi'am yon tan gyi'o zhes pa /
analyzed: rdzas kyi'am yon tan gyi'o zhes pa /
translated: It is the substance or quality.

original: 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid kyi drug pas 'dir 'byung bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid kyi drug pas 'dir 'byung bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The sixth case, which is the characteristic of connection, is to be used here. This is the meaning.

original: 'o na rdzas la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis kyang rigs tsam po rdzas nyid las brjod par bya'o zhes pas /
analyzed: 'o na rdzas la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis kyang rigs tsam po rdzas nyid las brjod par bya'o zhes pas /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúThen the words substance and so on also express just the class of substance and so on,‚Äù

original: de las gang la drug pa'i brjod par bya bar rigs ni rigs gzhan dang 'brel pa ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de las gang la drug pa'i brjod par bya bar rigs ni rigs gzhan dang 'brel pa ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: then what is the class that is the object of the sixth case, which is the connection with another class?

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: rdzas nyid dang ldan pa ni rdzas su 'dir ldan pa'i don can gyi rkyen dbyi bar byas nas bstan te /
analyzed: rdzas nyid dang ldan pa ni rdzas su 'dir ldan pa'i don can gyi rkyen dbyi bar byas nas bstan te /
translated: The word ‚Äúsubstance‚Äù is taught here with the meaning of ‚Äúendowed with substance,‚Äù with the suffix ya dropped.

original: gzhi mi mthun pa nyid rab tu bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: gzhi mi mthun pa nyid rab tu bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: This is in order to demonstrate the difference in basis.

original: gal te 'di ltar byas na yod pa'i sgra la yang ldan pa'i don can @241b dbyi bar byas pa las gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar byas na yod pa'i sgra la yang ldan pa'i don can @241b dbyi bar byas pa las gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If this is done, then the word ‚Äúexistent‚Äù will also have the meaning of ‚Äúendowed with,‚Äù with the suffix ya dropped, and so there will be a common locus.

original: 'o na gang gi tshe yod pa nyid tsam brjod par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ldan pa'i don can mi 'thad ba de'i tshe 'thob ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tshe yod pa nyid tsam brjod par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ldan pa'i don can mi 'thad ba de'i tshe 'thob ba ma yin no //
translated: If this is done, then when the meaning of ‚Äúendowed with‚Äù is not tenable because one only wishes to say ‚Äúexistence,‚Äù then it is not obtained.

original: de'i tshe yod pa ni rdzas kyis zhes 'dod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe yod pa ni rdzas kyis zhes 'dod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: At that time, ‚Äúexistence‚Äù is not asserted to be by substance.

original: 'o na rkyen thams cad bdag nyid rang nyid yang dag par zhugs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir /üîΩ'brel pa'i sgras kyang re zhig 'brel ba yod pa brjod par bya ba ma yin na /
analyzed: 'o na rkyen thams cad bdag nyid rang nyid yang dag par zhugs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir / 'brel pa'i sgras kyang re zhig 'brel ba yod pa brjod par bya ba ma yin na /
translated: Well, since all conditions are by their very nature already engaged,üîΩthe word ‚Äúrelated‚Äù does not express the existence of a relation.

original: rigs kyi sgra yis ga las yin //
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra yis ga las yin //
translated: How much less so does the word ‚Äútype‚Äù ?

original: de ci ltar brjod par bya ba dang bcas pa nyid du dogs pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci ltar brjod par bya ba dang bcas pa nyid du dogs pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúHow is it that it is suspected to be something that is to be expressed?‚ÄùüîΩIt is said, ‚ÄúThe connection is also here.‚Äù

original: 'brel pa'ang 'dir zhes pa rang gi chos kyis brjod par bya ba nyid kyi phyir 'brel ba brjod par bya bar bshad pa ni ma yin pa kho na ste /üîΩ'o na ci zhe na /üîΩ'brel pa can gyi chos kyis so //
analyzed: 'brel pa'ang 'dir zhes pa rang gi chos kyis brjod par bya ba nyid kyi phyir 'brel ba brjod par bya bar bshad pa ni ma yin pa kho na ste / 'o na ci zhe na / 'brel pa can gyi chos kyis so //
translated: It is not explained that the connection is to be expressed because of the expression of one‚Äôs own phenomena.

original: yang ci ltar 'brel pa can gyi chos kyis bshad par bya ba yin zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci ltar 'brel pa can gyi chos kyis bshad par bya ba yin zhen gsungs pa /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúHow is it that the phenomena of the connection are to be explained?‚ÄùüîΩIt is said, ‚ÄúIn that way,‚Äù and so on.üîΩHere, some meaning of a word is expressed by some word.

original: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa 'dir sgra'i don 'ga' zhig sgra 'ga' zhig gis brjod bar bya bzhin pa ni 'brel pa can gzhan la dogs pa nye bar skye ba'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa 'dir sgra'i don 'ga' zhig sgra 'ga' zhig gis brjod bar bya bzhin pa ni 'brel pa can gzhan la dogs pa nye bar skye ba'i rgyu ste /
translated: That is the cause of the arising of suspicion of another connection.üîΩIn that way, it is a collection.

original: de ltar ni sdud pa yin zhing sdud pa'i sgra brjod pa na /
analyzed: de ltar ni sdud pa yin zhing sdud pa'i sgra brjod pa na /
translated: When the word collection is expressed,

original: pha rol dogs pa nye bar skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur te /
analyzed: pha rol dogs pa nye bar skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur te /
translated: it becomes the cause of the arising of suspicion of the opponent.

original: de kho na rgol bas nye bar len pa ni ci'i zhes dogs ba skyed par byed pa yin pas so //
analyzed: de kho na rgol bas nye bar len pa ni ci'i zhes dogs ba skyed par byed pa yin pas so //
translated: That is the cause of the arising of the suspicion, ‚ÄúWhy is the opponent appropriating that?‚Äù

original: dngos po yang dngos po bsgrub pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba ni nges par yul gzhan la dogs pa skyed par byed do zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: dngos po yang dngos po bsgrub pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba ni nges par yul gzhan la dogs pa skyed par byed do zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Also, the word ‚Äúthing‚Äù is to be expressed as the establishment of a thing, and it definitely generates doubt about another object.

original: dngos po gzhan gyis sbyor bar bya //
analyzed: dngos po gzhan gyis sbyor bar bya //
translated: It is connected by another thing.

original: zhes pa'o // 'o na rigs la yang 'di skad brjod bar 'thad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // 'o na rigs la yang 'di skad brjod bar 'thad pa ma yin nam /
translated: Well then, is it not tenable to say this about a type?

original: rigs kyi sgras brjod par bya ba'i rigs kyang 'brel ba can gyi ngo bor brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: rigs kyi sgras brjod par bya ba'i rigs kyang 'brel ba can gyi ngo bor brjod par bya ste /
translated: A type that is to be expressed by the word ‚Äútype‚Äù is to be expressed as the nature of that which is related.

original: rta'i 'am ba lang gi rigs so zhes ba'o zhen ;
analyzed: rta'i 'am ba lang gi rigs so zhes ba'o zhen ;
translated: It is said that it is the type of a horse or the type of a cow.

original: 'di yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: 'brel pa can yin na'ang rigs ni rigs kyi ngo bor gtong ba ma yin zhing /üîΩ'brel pa ni 'brel pa can nyid yin na rang gi ngo bo nyams pa kho na'o 'brel pa gzhan med na /
analyzed: 'brel pa can yin na'ang rigs ni rigs kyi ngo bor gtong ba ma yin zhing / 'brel pa ni 'brel pa can nyid yin na rang gi ngo bo nyams pa kho na'o 'brel pa gzhan med na /
translated: Even if it is related, a type does not give up its own nature as a type.

original: 'brel ba can nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel ba can nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If a relation is related to that which is related, then its own nature is completely lost, because if there is no other relation, it is not tenable that it is related to that which is related.

original: de lta na yang thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even so, it follows that there is an infinite regress.

original: 'brel ba nyid ni 'brel pa'o zhes ba dngos po nyid du 'di ston par mdzad de /üîΩdngos po byas nas brjod ces pa'i @242a * //
analyzed: 'brel ba nyid ni 'brel pa'o zhes ba dngos po nyid du 'di ston par mdzad de / dngos po byas nas brjod ces pa'i @242a * //
translated: ‚ÄúRelation‚Äù is the relation. He teaches this as an entity.üîΩ‚ÄúHaving made an entity, it is expressed.‚Äù

original: dngos po zhes pa'i dgongs pas gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po zhes pa'i dgongs pas gsungs pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúentity‚Äù is stated with that intention.

original: dngos po'ang gzhan gyis sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: dngos po'ang gzhan gyis sbyar bar bya //
translated: ‚ÄúAn entity is to be applied by another.‚Äù

original: zhes pa / gang dngos po yin pa de ni gzhan gyis sbyar bar bya bas te chos bzhin 'brel ba yang de lta bu'o zhes pa'i rang bzhin gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa / gang dngos po yin pa de ni gzhan gyis sbyar bar bya bas te chos bzhin 'brel ba yang de lta bu'o zhes pa'i rang bzhin gsungs so //
translated: Whatever is an entity is to be applied by another. The relation of a property to its possessor is also like that. He states the nature of that.

original: de'i phyir 'brel pa can gyi chos kyi 'brel pa brjod par bya'o zhes byas nas dogs pa'o zhes bas 'brel pa'i sgras ni 'di ngo bo gzhan gyis brjod par bya bar mthong ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'brel pa can gyi chos kyi 'brel pa brjod par bya'o zhes byas nas dogs pa'o zhes bas 'brel pa'i sgras ni 'di ngo bo gzhan gyis brjod par bya bar mthong ste /
translated: Therefore, having said that the relation of a property to its possessor should be stated, he says, ‚ÄúThe word ‚Äòrelation‚Äô is seen to express another nature.‚Äù

original: de yang yod ba'i sgra dang yod ba'i 'brel ba'o zhes gzhi mthun ba'o //
analyzed: de yang yod ba'i sgra dang yod ba'i 'brel ba'o zhes gzhi mthun ba'o //
translated: And that is the common locus of the words ‚Äúexists‚Äù and ‚Äúthe relation of existence.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir yod ba'i sgras kyang 'brel pa can nyid du brjod par bya'o zhes res 'ga' pha rol pos khas len pa na byed pas na dogs par byas nas dgag par brjod do zhes ston to /
analyzed: de'i phyir yod ba'i sgras kyang 'brel pa can nyid du brjod par bya'o zhes res 'ga' pha rol pos khas len pa na byed pas na dogs par byas nas dgag par brjod do zhes ston to /
translated: Sometimes the opponent accepts this, and so, fearing that the word ‚Äúexists‚Äù would be taken to express relatedness, the opponent says that the word ‚Äúexists‚Äù is used to express negation.

original: rang gi chos kyis ni zhes pa /
analyzed: rang gi chos kyis ni zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBy its own property‚Äù means

original: rang gi ngo bos ni 'brel ba rjod par byed pa'i sgra med do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ni 'brel ba rjod par byed pa'i sgra med do zhes pa'o //
translated: that there is no word that expresses relatedness by virtue of its own nature.

original: 'di ste zhes pa bsnyegs par rung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi ngo bo brjod pa'i ngor dogs ba med pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'di ste zhes pa bsnyegs par rung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi ngo bo brjod pa'i ngor dogs ba med pa kho na ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù is not a suitable referent because it does not exist by virtue of its own nature. Therefore, there is no fear of the word ‚Äúexists‚Äù expressing its own nature.

original: de'i phyir 'di rigs kyi sgras brjod par bya ba nyid du 'thad pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di rigs kyi sgras brjod par bya ba nyid du 'thad pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable that it is to be expressed by the word ‚Äúgenus.‚Äù

original: bye brag gi sgra rnams kyis zhes pa la sogs pas skyon snga ma med pa las phyogs gzhan dgod pa'o //
analyzed: bye brag gi sgra rnams kyis zhes pa la sogs pas skyon snga ma med pa las phyogs gzhan dgod pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe words that express the particulars‚Äù and so on sets forth another alternative, which avoids the previous error.

original: rdzas la sogs pa rnams ni bye brag gi sgra rnams so //
analyzed: rdzas la sogs pa rnams ni bye brag gi sgra rnams so //
translated: The words ‚Äúparticulars‚Äù refer to substance and so on.

original: de rnams dang gzhi mthun pa nyid ni don gcig la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩrdzas gang kho na la yod pa nyid 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan nye bar blangs nas yod pa'i sgra 'jug pa de kho na rdzas kyi sgra rdzas nyid kyi rgyu mtshan can te de'i phyir gzhi mthun pa nyid 'thad de /
analyzed: de rnams dang gzhi mthun pa nyid ni don gcig la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir ro // rdzas gang kho na la yod pa nyid 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan nye bar blangs nas yod pa'i sgra 'jug pa de kho na rdzas kyi sgra rdzas nyid kyi rgyu mtshan can te de'i phyir gzhi mthun pa nyid 'thad de /
translated: The reason for this is that the term ‚Äúexistence‚Äù is applied by taking up the reason for the application of the term ‚Äúexistence‚Äù to a certain substance. Therefore, the application of the term ‚Äúsubstance‚Äù to that is based on the reason of ‚Äúsubstantiality.‚Äù

original: de dang ldan pa brjod pa na yod pa'i rdzas zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa brjod pa na yod pa'i rdzas zhes pa'o //
translated: Thus, when one speaks of the possession of that, one says ‚Äúexisting substance.‚Äù

original: 'brel ba mi nus pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel ba mi nus pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it impossible to relate it to the universal,

original: de tsam ni tha mi dad ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de tsam ni tha mi dad ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the universal is not different from that.

original: 'dir khyad par rnams brjod pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir khyad par rnams brjod pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, the particulars are not expressed,

original: 'on kyang de rnams kyi rigs dang ldan ba tsam gang spyi'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang de rnams kyi rigs dang ldan ba tsam gang spyi'i ngo bo'o //
translated: but rather the mere possession of the universal of those particulars is the universal.

original: de yang gcig nyid kyi phyir 'brel pa sla ba'o //
analyzed: de yang gcig nyid kyi phyir 'brel pa sla ba'o //
translated: And because that is one, it is easy to relate it to the universal.

original: 'khrul pa med pa yang ste /
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa yang ste /
translated: It is also nonerroneous,

original: de med na sgra mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na sgra mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the term is not applied when that is absent.

original: de zhes bdag nye bar dgong pa'i don to //
analyzed: de zhes bdag nye bar dgong pa'i don to //
translated: The term ‚Äúthat‚Äù has the sense of ‚ÄúI‚Äù and ‚Äúmine.‚Äù

original: de ldan zhes pa rigs ldan zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de ldan zhes pa rigs ldan zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of endowed with that is endowed with a class.

original: rang dbang med phyir zhes pa pha rol la ltos pa'i phyir @242b zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang dbang med phyir zhes pa pha rol la ltos pa'i phyir @242b zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of because of not being independent is because of depending on another.

original: rang dbang med pa nyid de ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rang dbang med pa nyid de ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: To show that very lack of independence, he says

original: de lta na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Even though that is so, etc.

original: rigs dang rang gi ngo bo yang zhes zlas dbye ba'o //
analyzed: rigs dang rang gi ngo bo yang zhes zlas dbye ba'o //
translated: The word also is a disjunction.

original: rang gi ngo bo'i sgras sgra'i rang gi ngo bo gsungs so //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo'i sgras sgra'i rang gi ngo bo gsungs so //
translated: The word own nature is a sound's own nature.
