original: de dag nye bar sgyur bar byed ba ni gtso bo ma yin pa gang gi yin pa de de skad bshad do //
analyzed: de dag nye bar sgyur bar byed ba ni gtso bo ma yin pa gang gi yin pa de de skad bshad do //
translated: That which is modified by those is said to be that which is not primary.

original: tsam smon pa ni rdzas la rtogs pa'i chos gzhan gyi bye brag dgag pa'i don to //
analyzed: tsam smon pa ni rdzas la rtogs pa'i chos gzhan gyi bye brag dgag pa'i don to //
translated: The word only is for the purpose of negating other attributes of substance that are imagined by the logicians.

original: yang ci ltar na rang gi ngo bo rdzas kyi zhar la byung ba yin /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na rang gi ngo bo rdzas kyi zhar la byung ba yin /
translated: How is it that the own nature is a secondary attribute of substance?

original: ji tsam du rigs kho na de'i zhar la byung ba ste /
analyzed: ji tsam du rigs kho na de'i zhar la byung ba ste /
translated: To the extent that the class is the only secondary attribute of that,

original: sgra ni rang gi ngo bos khyad par du byas pa'i rigs brjod cing /
analyzed: sgra ni rang gi ngo bos khyad par du byas pa'i rigs brjod cing /
translated: sound is said to be the class that is distinguished by its own nature.

original: de la phyis kyi dus su sgra'i rang gi ngo bos khyad par du byas pa'i rdzas so zhe na /
analyzed: de la phyis kyi dus su sgra'i rang gi ngo bos khyad par du byas pa'i rdzas so zhe na /
translated: Later, the substance that is distinguished by the nature of the word is the object of the word.

original: 'di skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di skyon ma yin te /
translated: This is not a fault.

original: phan 'dogs pa dang phan 'dogs pa can rnams ni phan 'dogs pa can rang gi khyad par du byed pa la ltos pa can gyir 'gyur te /
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa dang phan 'dogs pa can rnams ni phan 'dogs pa can rang gi khyad par du byed pa la ltos pa can gyir 'gyur te /
translated: Those who are benefited and those who benefit are dependent on the one who benefits distinguishing them.

original: khyad par du byed pa ni gtso bo'i phan 'dogs byed chen po la 'jug bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
analyzed: khyad par du byed pa ni gtso bo'i phan 'dogs byed chen po la 'jug bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
translated: This is because the one who distinguishes them is engaged in the great benefit of the chief one.

original: dper na rab tu myos ma ni rang gi 'gram pa byug pa la sogs pa'i 'du bya ba sngon du sgrub cing /
analyzed: dper na rab tu myos ma ni rang gi 'gram pa byug pa la sogs pa'i 'du bya ba sngon du sgrub cing /
translated: For example, a woman who is very intoxicated first performs actions such as anointing her cheeks.

original: de nas 'dus byas ba'i dbang gis mngon par 'brel pa ni /
analyzed: de nas 'dus byas ba'i dbang gis mngon par 'brel pa ni /
translated: Then, by the power of being anointed, she is connected to that.

original: ches mchog tu gyur pa'i phan 'dogs pa de la byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ches mchog tu gyur pa'i phan 'dogs pa de la byed pa bzhin no //
translated: This is like the one who is the supreme benefactor performing her function.

original: dngos su ni ma yin no zhes pa bar du ma chod pas ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos su ni ma yin no zhes pa bar du ma chod pas ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not directly, but it is not obstructed.

original: der gtogs pa'i bum ba la sogs pa'i khyad par ma 'phangs pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: der gtogs pa'i bum ba la sogs pa'i khyad par ma 'phangs pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: Because the distinctions of the vase and so on that belong to it are not projected.

original: gang de rigs dang ldan pa der gtogs pa gang khyad par bum pa la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: gang de rigs dang ldan pa der gtogs pa gang khyad par bum pa la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: The class and the nature of that which is projected are the particularities of vase, etc.

original: de rnams ma 'phangs pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de rnams ma 'phangs pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúbecause they are not projected‚Äù is that they are not projected by that.

original: rigs dang rang gi ngo bo smos pa ni gnyis gas bar du chod pas na lhag par gzhan gyi dbang nyid rab tu bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: rigs dang rang gi ngo bo smos pa ni gnyis gas bar du chod pas na lhag par gzhan gyi dbang nyid rab tu bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: The mention of the class and the nature of that which is projected is for the purpose of clearly teaching the nature of the other-dependent, since both are obstructed by that.

original: ci ste 'phen pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: ci ste 'phen pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig mi gtong ba'o //
translated: But what is this so-called projection? It is not letting go.

original: 'o na bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ma btang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ma btang ba ma yin nam /
translated: But aren‚Äôt vases, etc., also not let go?

original: yong pa nyid kyi rten nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: yong pa nyid kyi rten nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because they are the very support of existence.

original: de'i rten yang brjod ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rten yang brjod ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because their support is also expressed.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: bum ba nyid la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum ba nyid la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because vases, etc., are not projected.

original: yod pa'i sgra ni yod pa nyid kyi gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyi phyir de las tha dad pa'i ngo bo bum pa nyid la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen no //
analyzed: yod pa'i sgra ni yod pa nyid kyi gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyi phyir de las tha dad pa'i ngo bo bum pa nyid la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen no //
translated: The word ‚Äúexistence‚Äù is the other-dependence of existence itself, so it does not project the natures of vases, etc., which are different from it.

original: bum ba nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bo yang dag par gnas ba las dngos bo de bum ba'am snam bur 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: bum ba nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bo yang dag par gnas ba las dngos bo de bum ba'am snam bur 'gyur gyi /
translated: The entity of the pot, etc. is truly existent, and from that entity, that thing becomes a pot or a cloth.

original: rang las ni ma @243a * //
analyzed: rang las ni ma @243a * //
translated: It is not from itself,

original: yin te / dngos po tsam la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde'i phyir ji ltar bum pa'i sgras bum pa nyid la sogs pa dang ma 'dres pa las /
analyzed: yin te / dngos po tsam la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyir ji ltar bum pa'i sgras bum pa nyid la sogs pa dang ma 'dres pa las /
translated: because there is no difference in mere entity.üîΩTherefore, just as the word pot does not indicate pots, etc. without mixing them with potness,

original: bum pa la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen pa de ltar yod pa'i sgras kyang ngo //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen pa de ltar yod pa'i sgras kyang ngo //
translated: in the same way, the word existent does not indicate them.

original: de las ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: de las ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the problem with that?

original: de'i phyir de kho na de'i khyad par ma yin pa nyid na gzhi mthun pa nyid med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na de'i khyad par ma yin pa nyid na gzhi mthun pa nyid med do //
translated: Therefore, if that is not its difference, there is no common locus.

original: ci ltar byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci ltar byas nas she na /
translated: How is that done?

original: gal te yod pa'i sgras bum pa la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen na /
analyzed: gal te yod pa'i sgras bum pa la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen na /
translated: If the word existent does not indicate pots, etc.,

original: de bas na de rnams de'i bye brag ma yin te /
analyzed: de bas na de rnams de'i bye brag ma yin te /
translated: then they are not its particulars.

original: ma 'phangs pa'i bye brag rnams ni mthong ba ma yin pas so //
analyzed: ma 'phangs pa'i bye brag rnams ni mthong ba ma yin pas so //
translated: Particulars that are not indicated are not seen.

original: de'i khyad par ma yin pa'i phyir yang de'i sgra dang gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i khyad par ma yin pa'i phyir yang de'i sgra dang gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is not a particular of that, the word ‚Äúthat‚Äù does not have a common locus with the word ‚Äútaste.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: khyab pa yod pa min pa la //
analyzed: khyab pa yod pa min pa la //
translated: Because there is no pervasion.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: khyab pa ni 'phen pa ste ji ltar gzugs kyi sgras mngar ba la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen na /
analyzed: khyab pa ni 'phen pa ste ji ltar gzugs kyi sgras mngar ba la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen na /
translated: Pervasion is implicative; just as the word ‚Äúform‚Äù does not implicate sweet and so on,

original: de'i khyad par ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de'i khyad par ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because they are not its particulars,

original: de'i sgra rnams dang gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur te gzugs skyur ba'o zhes pa mi 'gyur ba ltar ro //
analyzed: de'i sgra rnams dang gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur te gzugs skyur ba'o zhes pa mi 'gyur ba ltar ro //
translated: the words ‚Äúthat‚Äù do not have a common locus with the words ‚Äútaste,‚Äù just as ‚Äúform is sour‚Äù is not possible.

original: khyab pa na ni 'gyur te gzugs sngon po'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: khyab pa na ni 'gyur te gzugs sngon po'o zhes pa'o //
translated: If there is pervasion, it is possible, as in ‚Äúform is blue.‚Äù

original: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa dpe nye bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa dpe nye bar ston pa'o //
translated: For example, and so on, teaches the example.

original: dkar ba'i sgra'i rang gi brjod par bya ba'i yon tan ni rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyi phyir dkar po nyid do //
analyzed: dkar ba'i sgra'i rang gi brjod par bya ba'i yon tan ni rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyi phyir dkar po nyid do //
translated: The quality that is the referent of the word ‚Äúwhite‚Äù is whiteness, because it is the reason for the engagement of white.

original: de ni de tsam gyis khyad par du byas pa'i rdzas brjod pa'i phyir yod kyang rdzas kyi bdag nyid de la mngar po la sogs pa rnams 'phen pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de tsam gyis khyad par du byas pa'i rdzas brjod pa'i phyir yod kyang rdzas kyi bdag nyid de la mngar po la sogs pa rnams 'phen pa ma yin te /
translated: Because it is a substance that is qualified by that, it exists. But sweet and so on are not projected onto that substance itself.

original: de ni dkar po nyid bzhin du mngar po nyid la sogs pa rnams 'jug pa'i rgyu ma yin pas so //
analyzed: de ni dkar po nyid bzhin du mngar po nyid la sogs pa rnams 'jug pa'i rgyu ma yin pas so //
translated: Because that is not the cause of the engagement of sweet and so on, like whiteness.

original: de'i phyir de'i khyad par min pa nyid do zhes pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i khyad par min pa nyid do zhes pa /
translated: Therefore, it is not a qualifier of that.

original: mi 'phen pa'i phyir mngar po nyid la sogs pa rnams dkar po'i khyad par ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mi 'phen pa'i phyir mngar po nyid la sogs pa rnams dkar po'i khyad par ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Because it is not projected, sweet and so on are not qualifiers of whiteness. This is the meaning.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba la dpe la bsgrub pa'i don nye bar sbyor bar byed de /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba la dpe la bsgrub pa'i don nye bar sbyor bar byed de /
translated: In the same way, here too, the meaning of the example is applied to the probandum, saying ‚Äúit follows in the same way.‚Äù

original: yod pa'i sgras bum pa la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen cing /
analyzed: yod pa'i sgras bum pa la sogs pa rnams mi 'phen cing /
translated: The word ‚Äúexists‚Äù does not project pots and so on.

original: mi 'phen pa'i phyir yang de'i khyad par nyid ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mi 'phen pa'i phyir yang de'i khyad par nyid ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Because it is not projected, it is not a qualifier of that. This is the meaning.

original: de 'dis pha rol po la mi 'dod pa 'byung ba'i ched du /
analyzed: de 'dis pha rol po la mi 'dod pa 'byung ba'i ched du /
translated: This is stated to the opponent in order to generate an undesirable consequence.

original: gang zhig khyad par du byas pa'i yon tan rnam par bcad pas rdzas gang yin pa brjod pa de ni der gtogs pa'i khyad par gzhan mi 'phen pa @243b yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig khyad par du byas pa'i yon tan rnam par bcad pas rdzas gang yin pa brjod pa de ni der gtogs pa'i khyad par gzhan mi 'phen pa @243b yin te /
translated: The substance that is described by the elimination of the qualities that are distinguished by it does not imply other features that belong to it,üîΩjust as the word white does not imply the word existent.

original: dkar po'i sgra bzhin yod pa'i sgra yang de lta bu'o zhes khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dang / de bzhin du gang rnams gang rjod par byed pa'i sgras ma 'phangs pa de rnams ni de'i khyad par rnams ma yin te /
analyzed: dkar po'i sgra bzhin yod pa'i sgra yang de lta bu'o zhes khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dang / de bzhin du gang rnams gang rjod par byed pa'i sgras ma 'phangs pa de rnams ni de'i khyad par rnams ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, whatever is not implied by the word that expresses it is not a feature of it,

original: dper na mngar bo la sogs pa rnams dkar po bzhin /
analyzed: dper na mngar bo la sogs pa rnams dkar po bzhin /
translated: just as sweetness and so on are not features of white.üîΩAlso, a pot and so on are not implied by the word that expresses existence.

original: bum pa la sogs ba rnams kyang yod pa nyid rjod par byed pa'i sgras ma 'phangs pa rnams so zhes pa khyab byed med pa dang / de bzhin du gang rnams gang gis brjod par bya ba'i khyad par rjod par byed pa rnams su mi 'gyur ba de rnams dang de gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs ba rnams kyang yod pa nyid rjod par byed pa'i sgras ma 'phangs pa rnams so zhes pa khyab byed med pa dang / de bzhin du gang rnams gang gis brjod par bya ba'i khyad par rjod par byed pa rnams su mi 'gyur ba de rnams dang de gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, whatever is not a feature of that which expresses it is not a common locus of that which expresses it,

original: 'di lta ste skyur po la sogs pa'i sgra rnams dang gzugs kyi sgra bzhin bum pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyang yod pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba'i khyad par rjod par byed pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro zhes pa khyab par byed pa med pa kho na
analyzed: 'di lta ste skyur po la sogs pa'i sgra rnams dang gzugs kyi sgra bzhin bum pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyang yod pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba'i khyad par rjod par byed pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro zhes pa khyab par byed pa med pa kho na
translated: Thus, the pervasion is not established.

original: ston te / 'dir rigs kyi sgras de dang ldan pa brjod do zhes pa 'di bshad do //
analyzed: ston te / 'dir rigs kyi sgras de dang ldan pa brjod do zhes pa 'di bshad do //
translated: Here, it is explained that the word type expresses that which possesses it.

original: de ldan la yang sgra ldan pa'i rkyen phyis pa las sam /
analyzed: de ldan la yang sgra ldan pa'i rkyen phyis pa las sam /
translated: And it is applied to that which possesses it either from the later condition of possessing sound

original: tha dad med par nye bar btags pa las 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: tha dad med par nye bar btags pa las 'jug pa yin /
translated: or from being designated as nondifferent.üîΩIn that regard, in the case of the condition of possession, it is possible that it expresses it like white and so on.

original: de la ldan pa'i rkyen gyi phyogs la dkar po la sogs pa bzhin du rjod par byed pa srid do zhes brjod par bya ba nyid yod pa la skyon gsungs so //
analyzed: de la ldan pa'i rkyen gyi phyogs la dkar po la sogs pa bzhin du rjod par byed pa srid do zhes brjod par bya ba nyid yod pa la skyon gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the fault is stated in the case of mere existence.

original: tha dad med par nye bar gdags pa la ni sgro btags pa'i yod pa nyid kyi ngo bo de kho na rjod par byed pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba nyid du de ldan srid pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: tha dad med par nye bar gdags pa la ni sgro btags pa'i yod pa nyid kyi ngo bo de kho na rjod par byed pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba nyid du de ldan srid pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: In the case of designation as non-different, since it is the very nature of the existence of superimposition that is expressed, it is not possible for it to be the object of expression. In order to demonstrate this, he says:

original: nye bar btags phyir zhes pa'o //üîΩrang gi ngo bo zhes pa gang rnams sgra'i rang gi ngo bo brjod par bya bar 'dod pa de'i lugs kyis so //
analyzed: nye bar btags phyir zhes pa'o // rang gi ngo bo zhes pa gang rnams sgra'i rang gi ngo bo brjod par bya bar 'dod pa de'i lugs kyis so //
translated: Because of designation.üîΩIn the system of those who assert that the nature of sound is the object of expression,

original: yang na rigs zhes pa gang rnams rigs te /
analyzed: yang na rigs zhes pa gang rnams rigs te /
translated: or in the system of those who assert that the universal is the object of expression,

original: rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
translated: the universal is not the nature of sound.

original: de dang ldan pa la nye bar btags pa zhes pa rigs dang ldan pa la'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa la nye bar btags pa zhes pa rigs dang ldan pa la'o //
translated: The possession of that is called designation, i.e., possession of the universal.

original: rang gi ngo bo brjod par bya bar smra ba rnams kyi ni rigs la yang nye bar btags pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo brjod par bya bar smra ba rnams kyi ni rigs la yang nye bar btags pa'o //
translated: For those who assert that the nature of sound is the object of expression, the universal is also designated.

original: 'di ni gtan tshigs nye bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gtan tshigs nye bar ston pa'o //
translated: This shows the reason.

original: gang zhig gang la zhes pas rjes 'gro'o //
analyzed: gang zhig gang la zhes pas rjes 'gro'o //
translated: The pervasion is shown by ‚Äúwhatever is designated as that.‚Äù

original: yang dag pa'i don smos ba ni nye bar btags pa las /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i don smos ba ni nye bar btags pa las /
translated: The correct meaning is stated in ‚Äúbecause of designation.‚Äù

original: de ltar rtogs par kun nas bstan pa'i don du nges par ston pa brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs par kun nas bstan pa'i don du nges par ston pa brtag par bya'o //
translated: In order to teach this, the following verse is stated.

original: gang zhig gang la nye bar btags ba de ni don de yang dag par brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la nye bar btags ba de ni don de yang dag par brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is designated in relation to something is not a correct expression of that thing.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: @244a * // skyes bu la rgyal po'i sgra bzhin /
analyzed: @244a * // skyes bu la rgyal po'i sgra bzhin /
translated: the word ‚Äúking‚Äù in relation to a man.üîΩThe word ‚Äúgenus‚Äù is also designated in relation to that which possesses it.

original: rigs kyi sgra yang de dang ldan pa la nye bar btags pa'o zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra yang de dang ldan pa la nye bar btags pa'o zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: This is a contradiction of the pervader.

original: dpe la bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba nyid du dogs par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe la bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba nyid du dogs par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: In the example, the probandum is not incomplete.

original: 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is accepted.

original: ji skad du bshad pa /üîΩkhri yi sgra ni rten ji bzhin //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa / khri yi sgra ni rten ji bzhin //
translated: As it is said:üîΩThe word ‚Äúthrone‚Äù is like its basis.

original: khri rnams kho nar rnam gnas pa //
analyzed: khri rnams kho nar rnam gnas pa //
translated: The word ‚Äúthrone‚Äù is only in relation to thrones.

original: de nyid du brjod de ltar ni //
analyzed: de nyid du brjod de ltar ni //
translated: It is expressed in that way.

original: rigs sgra rdzas rnams la 'jug go //
analyzed: rigs sgra rdzas rnams la 'jug go //
translated: In that way, the word ‚Äúgenus‚Äù applies to substances.

original: zhes so // 'di ni rgyal bo'i zhes nye bar btags bzhin ba'i rgyal po'i sgra ni yang /
analyzed: zhes so // 'di ni rgyal bo'i zhes nye bar btags bzhin ba'i rgyal po'i sgra ni yang /
translated: This is like the designation ‚Äúking‚Äù in ‚Äúthe king‚Äôs throne.‚Äù

original: yang dag pa'i don du 'bangs rjod par byed pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i don du 'bangs rjod par byed pa ma yin pas so //
translated: because it does not express the real meaning.

original: nye bar btags pa kho na ni de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin pas te /
analyzed: nye bar btags pa kho na ni de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin pas te /
translated: It is not so in the case of mere designation,

original: 'bangs kyi sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: 'bangs kyi sgra bzhin no //
translated: like the word ‚Äúservant.‚Äù

original: rgyal po'i don de kho na ni gzhi tha dad par brjod par bya'o zhes pas nye bar btags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal po'i don de kho na ni gzhi tha dad par brjod par bya'o zhes pas nye bar btags par 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning of the king is to be expressed as a different basis, and thus there is designation.

original: nye bar btags pa ni 'dra ba'i rgyu can nyid kyi phyir 'dra ba brtag pa'i ched du de dang ldan pa la yang zhes pa la sogs pas rnam par dpyod pa rtsom mo //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa ni 'dra ba'i rgyu can nyid kyi phyir 'dra ba brtag pa'i ched du de dang ldan pa la yang zhes pa la sogs pas rnam par dpyod pa rtsom mo //
translated: Since designation is due to similarity, in order to investigate similarity, he begins the analysis with ‚Äúin the case of one who possesses that, etc.‚Äù

original: 'o na pha rol la yang de'i khyad par du byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo don dam bar med pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na pha rol la yang de'i khyad par du byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo don dam bar med pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: But in the case of the other, is not the specific nature of the king‚Äôs own nature ultimately nonexistent?

original: nye bar btags pa'i tshig las so //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa'i tshig las so //
translated: It is from the words of designation.

original: de ltar na 'dra ba med pa nyid la yang nye bar btags pa dmigs te bdag po dang 'bangs dag la'o //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dra ba med pa nyid la yang nye bar btags pa dmigs te bdag po dang 'bangs dag la'o //
translated: Thus, even in the absence of similarity, designation is observed, as in the case of master and servant.

original: de'i phyir yon tan 'dra ba dgag pa'i 'bad pa ni don med pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir yon tan 'dra ba dgag pa'i 'bad pa ni don med pa'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the effort to refute similarity of qualities is pointless.

original: skyon 'di med de yon tan dang yang dag par sbyar bas byas pa'i ngo bo ldog pas na /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de yon tan dang yang dag par sbyar bas byas pa'i ngo bo ldog pas na /
translated: This fault does not exist, because the nature of the object of expression is refuted by the application of the quality of being truly existent.

original: brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo gzhan med pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba med par thal ba la /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo gzhan med pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba med par thal ba la /
translated: Since there is no other nature of the object of expression, the consequence is that the object of expression does not exist.

original: pha rol po res 'gal 'dra ba la brten pas so sor gnas par 'dod de /
analyzed: pha rol po res 'gal 'dra ba la brten pas so sor gnas par 'dod de /
translated: The opponent sometimes relies on similarity of contradiction, and sometimes on similarity of quality, and thus he wishes to remain neutral.

original: de'i phyir yon tan 'dra ba dgag pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: de'i phyir yon tan 'dra ba dgag pa'i tshig go //
translated: Therefore, the words ‚Äúsimilarity of quality‚Äù are stated.

original: de la 'dra ba nyid ni 'dre bar byed pa las grub par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: de la 'dra ba nyid ni 'dre bar byed pa las grub par 'gyur ram /
translated: In that regard, is similarity established from mixing?

original: rang nyid kho na las sam /
analyzed: rang nyid kho na las sam /
translated: Or from itself alone?

original: rten gzhan las te rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten gzhan las te rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or from another basis? There is no other possibility.

original: de la rtogs pa 'pho ba las ma yin zhes pa 'dis ni 'dre bar grub pa'i 'dra ba nyid med do zhes dam bca' ba gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: de la rtogs pa 'pho ba las ma yin zhes pa 'dis ni 'dre bar grub pa'i 'dra ba nyid med do zhes dam bca' ba gsal bar byed do //
translated: In that regard, the statement ‚ÄúIt is not from the transference of the cognition‚Äù clarifies the thesis that similarity established from mixing does not exist.

original: rtogs pa 'pho bas ni 'dra ba nyid yod pa kho na nges par byed pa 'ba' zhig ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa 'pho bas ni 'dra ba nyid yod pa kho na nges par byed pa 'ba' zhig ste /
translated: Only the transference of the cognition ascertains that similarity exists.

original: byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the agent.

original: yon tan gyi phan 'dogs pa las kyang ma yin zhes @244b pa 'dis na gzhan gyis byas pa'i 'dra ba nyid med pa nyid du dam bca'o //
analyzed: yon tan gyi phan 'dogs pa las kyang ma yin zhes @244b pa 'dis na gzhan gyis byas pa'i 'dra ba nyid med pa nyid du dam bca'o //
translated: And it is not from the benefit of the qualities. By this he concludes that there is no transference of what is done by another.

original: yang ci ltar don so so la nges pa skad cig gis 'jig pa'i rtogs pa rnams don gzhan la 'pho ba srid ce na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar don so so la nges pa skad cig gis 'jig pa'i rtogs pa rnams don gzhan la 'pho ba srid ce na /
translated: Now, how is it possible that the cognitions of the ascertainment of each object, which are momentary, are transferred to another object?

original: 'di bden te mi srid pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di bden te mi srid pa kho na'o //
translated: This is true, but it is not possible.

original: de lta na yang rnam par shes pa 'dra ba gzhan skye ba la tha dad med par btags pa'i phyir 'phangs pa'o zhes brjod pa'o zhes pas skyon med do //
analyzed: de lta na yang rnam par shes pa 'dra ba gzhan skye ba la tha dad med par btags pa'i phyir 'phangs pa'o zhes brjod pa'o zhes pas skyon med do //
translated: Nevertheless, since the arising of similar consciousnesses is designated as non-different, it is said to be transferred. Thus there is no fault.

original: rigs dang de dang ldan pa gnyis ka dag rang nyid kho na las 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: rigs dang de dang ldan pa gnyis ka dag rang nyid kho na las 'dra ba ste /
translated: Both the type and that which possesses it are similar to themselves alone.

original: rigs la sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo rang gi rten dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa cung zad kyang nye bar dmigs pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo rang gi rten dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa cung zad kyang nye bar dmigs pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: The nature of types, etc. is not observed to be even slightly different from their own basis.

original: de'i phyir de dag gi 'dre ba grub pa kho na 'dre ba nyid do zhes sems par 'gyur bas 'dri ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag gi 'dre ba grub pa kho na 'dre ba nyid do zhes sems par 'gyur bas 'dri ste /
translated: Therefore, it is asked: ‚ÄúIs the mere mixing of those just the mixing?‚Äù

original: ci ltar rtogs pa 'pho ba las ma yin zhe na'o //
analyzed: ci ltar rtogs pa 'pho ba las ma yin zhe na'o //
translated: How is it not the transference of realization?

original: nye bar btags pa yin na /
analyzed: nye bar btags pa yin na /
translated: If it is a designation,

original: blo yi ngo bo tha dad phyir //
analyzed: blo yi ngo bo tha dad phyir //
translated: because the natures of the awarenesses are different,

original: zhes pa rigs la 'jug pa'i sgra de dang ldan pa la nye bar gdags par bya ba yin na ni /
analyzed: zhes pa rigs la 'jug pa'i sgra de dang ldan pa la nye bar gdags par bya ba yin na ni /
translated: if the term that is applied to the class is designated in dependence on that which possesses it,

original: nye bar btags pa yin pa la rnam pa mtshungs pa can gyi blor 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa yin pa la rnam pa mtshungs pa can gyi blor 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: then it is not the case that the designation is an awareness that has a similar aspect.

original: 'di dpes rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: 'di dpes rtogs par byed de /
translated: This is understood through an example.

original: bran la rgyal por btags pa bzhin //
analyzed: bran la rgyal por btags pa bzhin //
translated: Like a servant designated as a king.

original: zhes pa'o // dper na zhes pa la sogs pas ni 'di kho na 'chad do //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // dper na zhes pa la sogs pas ni 'di kho na 'chad do //
translated: This is explained by ‚ÄúFor example,‚Äù and so on.

original: nye bar btags pa yang zhes pa la sogs pas phyogs chos nye bar ston to //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa yang zhes pa la sogs pas phyogs chos nye bar ston to //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is a designation,‚Äù and so on, presents the property of the subject.

original: de ltar de dang ldan pa la nye bar btags par brjod pa'i phyir rigs la dngos so zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar de dang ldan pa la nye bar btags par brjod pa'i phyir rigs la dngos so zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, because it is said that the designation is in dependence on that which possesses it, it is said that it is in the class, not in the entity.

original: de 'dis gang dag dngos dang nye bar btags pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba de dag ni 'dra ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de 'dis gang dag dngos dang nye bar btags pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba de dag ni 'dra ba ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is that the referents of the words ‚Äúreal‚Äù and ‚Äúfigurative‚Äù are not similar.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: rgyal po dang khol po dag bzhin /
analyzed: rgyal po dang khol po dag bzhin /
translated: a king and a slave.

original: rigs dang de dang ldan pa dag kyang dngos dang nye bar btags pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba dag go zhes khyab byed dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
analyzed: rigs dang de dang ldan pa dag kyang dngos dang nye bar btags pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba dag go zhes khyab byed dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
translated: The referents of the words ‚Äúgenus‚Äù and ‚Äúpossessor of a genus‚Äù are real and figurative.

original: 'o na nye bar btags pa seng ge'i sgra dang / dngos bram ze'i khye'u'i sgras kyang bram ze'i khye'u rjod par byed pa'i phyir ma nges so zhe na /üîΩde spang ba'i ched du gcig smos par bya ste /
analyzed: 'o na nye bar btags pa seng ge'i sgra dang / dngos bram ze'i khye'u'i sgras kyang bram ze'i khye'u rjod par byed pa'i phyir ma nges so zhe na / de spang ba'i ched du gcig smos par bya ste /
translated: But since the words ‚Äúlion‚Äù and ‚ÄúBrahmin boy‚Äù are figurative, and the words ‚ÄúBrahmin boy‚Äù are real, this is not a correct example.

original: dngos dang nye par btags pa'i sgra gcig gi brjod par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dngos dang nye par btags pa'i sgra gcig gi brjod par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya'o //
translated: To eliminate that objection, it should be said that the words ‚Äúreal‚Äù and ‚Äúfigurative‚Äù are used for the same referent.

original: yang ci ltar rje bo dang 'bangs dag dngos dang btags pa'i sgra gcig gi brjod par bya ba nyid yin /
analyzed: yang ci ltar rje bo dang 'bangs dag dngos dang btags pa'i sgra gcig gi brjod par bya ba nyid yin /
translated: But how can a master and a slave be the referents of the same word, whether real or figurative?

original: ji cam du @245a * //
analyzed: ji cam du @245a * //
translated: To what extent?

original: gang kho na nga yin pa de kho na 'di'o zhes sgra tha dad kyi brjod par bya ba nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: gang kho na nga yin pa de kho na 'di'o zhes sgra tha dad kyi brjod par bya ba nyid kho na'o //
translated: It is only the expression of the same thing by different words, ‚ÄúThat which is I is this.‚Äù

original: ci ste rgyal po'i sgra gcig kho nas jo bo dang bran dag gnyis ka brjod na ni /
analyzed: ci ste rgyal po'i sgra gcig kho nas jo bo dang bran dag gnyis ka brjod na ni /
translated: But if the single word ‚Äúking‚Äù expresses both the master and the servant,

original: seng ge'i sgra kho nas gnyis ka dag rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: seng ge'i sgra kho nas gnyis ka dag rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then the word ‚Äúlion‚Äù would express both the master and the servant, because it expresses the master and the servant.

original: khyad par du byed pa yod na yang ma nges pa de kho na'o ;üîΩ/ ci ste bram ze'i khye'u la sogs pa gang nye ba ma yin pa rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: khyad par du byed pa yod na yang ma nges pa de kho na'o ; / ci ste bram ze'i khye'u la sogs pa gang nye ba ma yin pa rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: And if there is a distinction, then the fallacy of inconclusiveness is just as before.üîΩBut if the word ‚Äúboy‚Äù is not understood to refer to the boy who is near,

original: bram ze'i khye'u gcig ma yin pa'i tshig gi rtogs par bya ba nyid na ni /
analyzed: bram ze'i khye'u gcig ma yin pa'i tshig gi rtogs par bya ba nyid na ni /
translated: then the word ‚Äúboy‚Äù would not refer to the boy who is not a single boy.

original: rgyal bo dang bran dag kyang tshig gzhan ma gtogs par rgyal po'i sgra 'ba' zhig pas rjod par byed pa rtag par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rgyal bo dang bran dag kyang tshig gzhan ma gtogs par rgyal po'i sgra 'ba' zhig pas rjod par byed pa rtag par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: And the king and the servant would not be expressed by the word ‚Äúking‚Äù alone, without the addition of another word.

original: de'i phyir gcig smos pa byas pa na yang dpe sgrub par byed pa ma tshang ba'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gcig smos pa byas pa na yang dpe sgrub par byed pa ma tshang ba'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore, even if one of the examples is mentioned, the proof is incomplete.

original: gzhan yang 'dir 'dra ba nyid ni khyad par can kho na pha rol pos mngon par 'dod de /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dir 'dra ba nyid ni khyad par can kho na pha rol pos mngon par 'dod de /
translated: Moreover, here the opponent clearly asserts that similarity is only in the qualified.

original: gang yod na gnyis ka la yang dbang po'i shes pa rnam pa mtshungs par 'gyur ba'o rnam pa gzhan du na /
analyzed: gang yod na gnyis ka la yang dbang po'i shes pa rnam pa mtshungs par 'gyur ba'o rnam pa gzhan du na /
translated: When it exists, the sense consciousnesses of both are similar in aspect.

original: dngos po thams cad shes bya nyid la sogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig gi yod pa nyid dang 'dra ba yod do zhes pas dngos po thams cad yod pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad shes bya nyid la sogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig gi yod pa nyid dang 'dra ba yod do zhes pas dngos po thams cad yod pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, since all things would exist in the way that some things such as knowable objects exist, all things would be the referent of the term existence.

original: de 'gog na yang khas blangs pas gnod pa'o //
analyzed: de 'gog na yang khas blangs pas gnod pa'o //
translated: If that is refuted, it is undermined by what is commonly accepted.

original: de'i phyir khyad par can kho nar 'dra pa pha rol pos 'dod cing /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par can kho nar 'dra pa pha rol pos 'dod cing /
translated: Therefore the opponent asserts that similarity is only in the qualified.

original: des na dgag pa yang de kho na la bya ste /
analyzed: des na dgag pa yang de kho na la bya ste /
translated: Therefore the refutation also applies to that alone.

original: seng ge dang bram ze'i khye'u dag la rnam pa de lta bu'i 'dra ba yod pa yang ma yin zhing /
analyzed: seng ge dang bram ze'i khye'u dag la rnam pa de lta bu'i 'dra ba yod pa yang ma yin zhing /
translated: The lion and the brahmin boy do not have such a similar aspect,

original: 'jig rten du grags pa yang ma yin na de ma nges pa ga la yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten du grags pa yang ma yin na de ma nges pa ga la yin /
translated: and it is not renowned in the world. How could that be uncertain?

original: de'i phyir khyad par byed pas don ma yin no ;
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par byed pas don ma yin no ;
translated: Therefore, the distinction is not meaningful.

original: / yang 'dir ci ltar khyab pa yin //
analyzed: / yang 'dir ci ltar khyab pa yin //
translated: Moreover, how is there pervasion here?

original: 'di la 'gal ba 'ga' zhig kyang mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'di la 'gal ba 'ga' zhig kyang mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because no contradiction is seen here.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: gal te 'dres pas grub pa'i rigs dang de dang ldan pa dag 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te 'dres pas grub pa'i rigs dang de dang ldan pa dag 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur na /
translated: If the class that is established by mixing and that which possesses it were the same,

original: des na rigs la yod pa'i sgra dngos dang / de dang ldan pa la nye bar btags pa'o zhes ba'i tha dad 'dir 'gyur ba ma yin te khyad par med ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na rigs la yod pa'i sgra dngos dang / de dang ldan pa la nye bar btags pa'o zhes ba'i tha dad 'dir 'gyur ba ma yin te khyad par med ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then the difference between the word existent that applies to the class and the word existent that is applied to that which possesses it would not exist here, because there would be no distinction.

original: de ltar ni ji ltar rigs rang bzhin gyis yod pa'i ngo bo yin pa de ltar de dang ldan pa yang yin zhing /
analyzed: de ltar ni ji ltar rigs rang bzhin gyis yod pa'i ngo bo yin pa de ltar de dang ldan pa yang yin zhing /
translated: Just as the class is an existent entity by nature, so too is that which possesses it.

original: yod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang yod pa'i sgra'i 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan no zhes ba gnyis @245b ka la dngos nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang yod pa'i sgra'i 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan no zhes ba gnyis @245b ka la dngos nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: And the very nature of existence is the reason for the application of the word existent. Thus, both would be entities.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi yod pa nyid ni tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir de kho na la tha mi dad pa'i yod pa'i sgra rigs kyi /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi yod pa nyid ni tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir de kho na la tha mi dad pa'i yod pa'i sgra rigs kyi /
translated: Reply: That is so, but the word existence is appropriate for that alone, because the nature of existence is not different.

original: de dang ldan pa rnams la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa rnams la ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not for those that possess it,

original: de rnams tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir zhe na /
translated: because they are different.

original: gal te de lta na yod pa'i ngo bo nyid ni yod pa'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na yod pa'i ngo bo nyid ni yod pa'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then the nature of existence is not the reason for the application of the word existence. What is it then?

original: rjes su 'gro pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: It is the nature that is concomitant.

original: de las kyang rigs gzhan la yang de rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las kyang rigs gzhan la yang de rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: And from that, it would follow that the word existence would also apply to other classes,

original: de la yang de'i ngo bo yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang de'i ngo bo yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of existence would exist in them.

original: gal te tha dad ba rnams la tha mi dad pa'i sgra 'jug pa ma yin zhe na tha dad pa'i rigs rnams la rigs kyi sgra tha ma dad pa ci ltar 'jug de la rigs thams cad la khyab pa'i rigs gzhan gang sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du
analyzed: gal te tha dad ba rnams la tha mi dad pa'i sgra 'jug pa ma yin zhe na tha dad pa'i rigs rnams la rigs kyi sgra tha ma dad pa ci ltar 'jug de la rigs thams cad la khyab pa'i rigs gzhan gang sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du
translated: If you say that the word existence does not apply to different things, then why does the word class apply to different classes?

original: 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not change.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi rigs rnams la sgra'i rang gi ngo bo kho na tha mi dad ba'i rgyu mtshan rgyur byas nas 'jug go zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi rigs rnams la sgra'i rang gi ngo bo kho na tha mi dad ba'i rgyu mtshan rgyur byas nas 'jug go zhe na /
translated: If you say that the sound‚Äôs own nature is applied to the universals, taking as the cause the mere nondifference of the sound,

original: gal te de lta na rigs dang ldan pa dag la'ang de nyid la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te de lta na rigs dang ldan pa dag la'ang de nyid la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: then even those who possess the universals would be engaged on the basis of that,

original: de las kyang dngos dang nye bar btags pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: de las kyang dngos dang nye bar btags pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur na /
translated: and the universals would not be the referents of the terms that are directly or indirectly applied to them.

original: de yang 'dod de /
analyzed: de yang 'dod de /
translated: But that is accepted.

original: de'i phyir 'dres pas grub pa'i 'dra ba nyid med do zhes pas khyab pa grub po //üîΩ'o na nye bar btags pa la rjod par byed pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dres pas grub pa'i 'dra ba nyid med do zhes pas khyab pa grub po // 'o na nye bar btags pa la rjod par byed pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since there is no similarity that is established by mixing, the pervasion is established.üîΩBut if the universals are not the referents of terms that are directly applied to them,

original: spyi las nye bar btags pa sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid yin /
analyzed: spyi las nye bar btags pa sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid yin /
translated: then the universals are the referents of terms that are indirectly applied to them, because they are the referents of terms that are directly applied to them.

original: gal te yang gnyis ka dag sgra'i don nyid na /
analyzed: gal te yang gnyis ka dag sgra'i don nyid na /
translated: If both the universals and the particulars are the referents of terms,

original: gnyis ka la 'bras bur thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyis ka la 'bras bur thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: then it follows that both are the effects of the terms.

original: ba lang khyer la shog ces brjod pa na mi blun po yang khyer 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ba lang khyer la shog ces brjod pa na mi blun po yang khyer 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say, Bring the cow, a fool would bring a man.

original: pha rol bos dngos dang nye bar btags pa sgra'i brjod bya nyid du rtogs te /
analyzed: pha rol bos dngos dang nye bar btags pa sgra'i brjod bya nyid du rtogs te /
translated: The opponent understands that the actual thing and the secondary designation are the objects of expression of the word.

original: de'i phyir de la brten nas de ltar bshad do zhes pas mi skyon no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de la brten nas de ltar bshad do zhes pas mi skyon no //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault in saying, We explain it that way based on that.

original: 'dra ba nyid ni dbang po'i rtogs pa 'phos pas yongs su gcad par bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid ni dbang po'i rtogs pa 'phos pas yongs su gcad par bya ba'am /
translated: Similarity is either determined by the transfer of cognition of a sense faculty,

original: sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pa 'phos pas yin /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pa 'phos pas yin /
translated: or by the transfer of cognition arising from a word.

original: de la dbang po'i rtogs pa 'phos pas rigs dang de dang ldan ba dag gi 'dra ba nyid nges par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa 'di phal cher bsgrubs zin te /
analyzed: de la dbang po'i rtogs pa 'phos pas rigs dang de dang ldan ba dag gi 'dra ba nyid nges par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa 'di phal cher bsgrubs zin te /
translated: Regarding that, it is mostly established that similarity of a type and its possessor is not ascertained by the transfer of cognition of a sense faculty,

original: spyi mi mthong bar sgrub par byed pas so /
analyzed: spyi mi mthong bar sgrub par byed pas so /
translated: because it is established that a universal is not seen.

original: gal te yang @246a * //
analyzed: gal te yang @246a * //
translated: Even if a universal were admitted,

original: spyi 'gyur du chug / der de'i gzhan mthong ste /
analyzed: spyi 'gyur du chug / der de'i gzhan mthong ste /
translated: it is seen there as different from that,

original: rten mi mthong ba'i phyir mi 'gyur ro zhes pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: rten mi mthong ba'i phyir mi 'gyur ro zhes pa la sogs pas so //
translated: because its basis is not seen.

original: snang rung ma yin pa dang lhan cig 'ga' zhig gi yang 'dra ba nyid rtogs par nus ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: snang rung ma yin pa dang lhan cig 'ga' zhig gi yang 'dra ba nyid rtogs par nus ba ma yin zhing /
translated: It is not possible to understand that something is similar to something else that is not visible.

original: sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pas 'pho bar yang nges par bya ba ma yin no zhes ston pa gsungs pa /üîΩrim gyis brjod ba ma yin phyir //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pas 'pho bar yang nges par bya ba ma yin no zhes ston pa gsungs pa / rim gyis brjod ba ma yin phyir //
translated: And it is not certain that the understanding derived from the word will be transferred.

original: zhes pa ste rigs dang de dang ldan ba dag la ni sgra las byung ba'i rtogs ba 'pho ba'i rgyu rim gyis sgra sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ste rigs dang de dang ldan ba dag la ni sgra las byung ba'i rtogs ba 'pho ba'i rgyu rim gyis sgra sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the above verse is that the word does not have the cause to transfer the understanding of the universal to the object possessing the universal, because the word is not applied gradually.

original: gal te rigs la dang de dang ldan pa la rim pas sgra spyor bar gyur na /
analyzed: gal te rigs la dang de dang ldan pa la rim pas sgra spyor bar gyur na /
translated: If the word were applied gradually to the universal and to the object possessing the universal,

original: de las sgra la rigs la rtogs pa gang 'dra bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba kho na de dang ldan pa la yang zhes pa rtogs pa 'pho bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de las sgra la rigs la rtogs pa gang 'dra bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba kho na de dang ldan pa la yang zhes pa rtogs pa 'pho bar 'gyur na /
translated: then the understanding of the universal derived from the word would be transferred to the object possessing the universal, and it would be exactly the same as the understanding of the universal.

original: rim bas sgra sbyor ba yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rim bas sgra sbyor ba yang ma yin gyi /
translated: But the word is not applied gradually.

original: 'on ci zhe na cig car kho na'o //
analyzed: 'on ci zhe na cig car kho na'o //
translated: Well then, what is it? It is applied all at once.

original: de las kyang rtogs pa gcig kho na'o zhes pas /
analyzed: de las kyang rtogs pa gcig kho na'o zhes pas /
translated: And from that, there is only one understanding.

original: gang las rtogs pa 'pho ba yin zhes pa 'di ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: gang las rtogs pa 'pho ba yin zhes pa 'di ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason is: ‚Äúbecause the understanding is transferred from that.‚Äù

original: kun da dung sogs dkar bo bzhin //
analyzed: kun da dung sogs dkar bo bzhin //
translated: Like the white jasmine, etc.

original: zhes ba chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi rjes 'gro'o //
analyzed: zhes ba chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi rjes 'gro'o //
translated: This is the application of the dissimilar instance.

original: rigs dang de dang ldan bdag la sgra cig car zhes pa nye bar sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rigs dang de dang ldan bdag la sgra cig car zhes pa nye bar sbyor ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúsound‚Äù is applied to the class and to the possessor of the class.

original: 'dis ni don gyis go bas rim gyis sgra sbyor ba med par ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni don gyis go bas rim gyis sgra sbyor ba med par ston to //
translated: This shows by implication that the word is not applied successively.

original: gang la sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pa 'pho ba de la rim gyis de'i rgyus sgra sbyor te /
analyzed: gang la sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pa 'pho ba de la rim gyis de'i rgyus sgra sbyor te /
translated: Where the understanding derived from the word is transferred, there the word is applied successively by the cause of that.

original: 'di lta ste kun da la sogs pa rnams la bzhin /
analyzed: 'di lta ste kun da la sogs pa rnams la bzhin /
translated: For example, like the jasmine, etc.

original: rigs dang de dang ldan bdag kyang sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pa 'pho ba'i rgyus rim gyis sgra sbyor ba med do //
analyzed: rigs dang de dang ldan bdag kyang sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pa 'pho ba'i rgyus rim gyis sgra sbyor ba med do //
translated: But the class and the possessor of the class do not have the word applied successively by the cause of the transfer of the understanding derived from the word.

original: rgyu mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: The non-apprehension of the cause.

original: rtogs pa 'pho ba bkag pas kyang 'dra ba nyid med pa'i tha snyad 'grub pa'i ched du rang bzhin mi dmigs pa gsal bar byas so zhes pas de'i spyor ba brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa 'pho ba bkag pas kyang 'dra ba nyid med pa'i tha snyad 'grub pa'i ched du rang bzhin mi dmigs pa gsal bar byas so zhes pas de'i spyor ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: The nonobservation of nature is stated in order to establish the convention of the absence of similarity due to the prevention of the transference of awareness.

original: rtogs pa 'pho ba las 'dra ba nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes pa /üîΩrtogs pa 'pho ba las ni /
analyzed: rtogs pa 'pho ba las 'dra ba nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes pa / rtogs pa 'pho ba las ni /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThere is no similarity due to the transference of awareness‚ÄùüîΩmeans that the similarity that is established by the transference of awareness

original: gang 'dres pas 'grub pa'i 'dra ba nyid nges bar bya ba de yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang 'dres pas 'grub pa'i 'dra ba nyid nges bar bya ba de yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: does not exist.

original: rang nyid las 'dra ba nyid du mi 'gyur mod /
analyzed: rang nyid las 'dra ba nyid du mi 'gyur mod /
translated: It is not that the substance itself is not similar to itself.

original: rigs kyis nye bar bsgyur ba'i phyir ni rdzas de rang nyid de'i ngo bo ma yin yang de ltar rab tu gsal te /
analyzed: rigs kyis nye bar bsgyur ba'i phyir ni rdzas de rang nyid de'i ngo bo ma yin yang de ltar rab tu gsal te /
translated: However, because of the affixation of the suffix -tva, the substance, even though it is not that entity itself, is clearly that.

original: ji ltar shel dang nye bar gzhag pa'i dbang las rang nyid de'i ngo bo ma yin ba yang @246b de'i ngo bo nyid bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar shel dang nye bar gzhag pa'i dbang las rang nyid de'i ngo bo ma yin ba yang @246b de'i ngo bo nyid bzhin no zhe na /
translated: Just as, for example, because of the power of being placed next to a crystal, even though it is not that entity itself, it is as if it were that entity.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: yon tan gyis phan 'dogs phyir de'i ngo bo la /
analyzed: yon tan gyis phan 'dogs phyir de'i ngo bo la /
translated: Because of the benefit of the quality, in the entity of that,

original: rab gyur 'gyur zhes pa la /
analyzed: rab gyur 'gyur zhes pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThe best of the best‚Äù is the cognition of the best of the best of objects.

original: rab gyur zhes pa yul gyi yul can rab tu gyur pa'i blo bstan te rab tu gyur pa'i blor 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rab gyur zhes pa yul gyi yul can rab tu gyur pa'i blo bstan te rab tu gyur pa'i blor 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe best of the best‚Äù indicates the cognition of the best of the best of objects.

original: yang ci'i phyir skyon 'di 'god par byed de /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir skyon 'di 'god par byed de /
translated: Why do we posit this fault?

original: ji srid du mthong ba kho nas rdzas la rab tu gyur pa'i blo yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji srid du mthong ba kho nas rdzas la rab tu gyur pa'i blo yin zhe na /
translated: As long as the cognition of the best of the best is only seeing,

original: blo med kyang zhes pa yon tan rab tu gyur pa'i blo med par yang zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: blo med kyang zhes pa yon tan rab tu gyur pa'i blo med par yang zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúEven without‚Äù means even without the cognition of the best of the best of qualities.

original: gal te shel bzhin du yon tan gyis nye bar bsgyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te shel bzhin du yon tan gyis nye bar bsgyur ba'i phyir /
translated: If, like a crystal, it is transformed by the quality,

original: de dang ldan pa yon tan gyi rang gi ngo bor 'gyur na /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa yon tan gyi rang gi ngo bor 'gyur na /
translated: then the possessor of the quality becomes the nature of the quality.

original: de ltar gyur na mchog tu sngo ba'i ras zhes rdzas la khyad par gyi rab tu gyur pa'i blo la ma ltos pa'i rab tu gyur pa'i blor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na mchog tu sngo ba'i ras zhes rdzas la khyad par gyi rab tu gyur pa'i blo la ma ltos pa'i rab tu gyur pa'i blor 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were the case, then the cognition of the best of the best would occur without depending on the cognition of the best of the best of substances, such as ‚Äúcloth that is supremely blue.‚Äù

original: khyad par rab tu gyur pa ma bzung par khyad par du bya pa la rab tu gyur pa'i blor 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par rab tu gyur pa ma bzung par khyad par du bya pa la rab tu gyur pa'i blor 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
translated: And the cognition of the best of the best would not occur in the best of the best of distinctions without apprehending the best of the best of distinctions.

original: rdzas la rang nyid las rab tu gyur pa dang nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas la rang nyid las rab tu gyur pa dang nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no increase or decrease in the substance itself.

original: snam bu ni rang nyid kho na las snam bu gzhan las rab tu gyur pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: snam bu ni rang nyid kho na las snam bu gzhan las rab tu gyur pa ma yin gyi /
translated: A cloth is not increased by another cloth,

original: 'on kyang sngon po nyid la sogs pa brten par byas pa'i yon tan las te /
analyzed: 'on kyang sngon po nyid la sogs pa brten par byas pa'i yon tan las te /
translated: but rather by the qualities that are based on it, such as blueness, etc.

original: nye ba ma yin pa'i dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo las shes pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye ba ma yin pa'i dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo las shes pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible to have a cognition of the nature of a remote thing.

original: yon tan gyi sgra yang 'dir 'dres pa'i yon tan rjod par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: yon tan gyi sgra yang 'dir 'dres pa'i yon tan rjod par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: The word ‚Äúquality‚Äù here refers to the qualities that are mixed in,üîΩbut not to the qualities of whiteness, etc.

original: dkar po nyid la sogs pa rnams des yon tan brjod par 'dod pa rnams ni ma yin te /üîΩches 'tshed par byed pa /
analyzed: dkar po nyid la sogs pa rnams des yon tan brjod par 'dod pa rnams ni ma yin te / ches 'tshed par byed pa /
translated: because one cannot understand the word ‚Äúquality‚Äù to refer to the qualities of whiteness, etc.,üîΩwithout reference to the increase of a quality.

original: ches gcod par byed pa zhes yon tan rab tu gyur pa la ltos pa med pa kho nar phul du gyur pa'i rtogs bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ches gcod par byed pa zhes yon tan rab tu gyur pa la ltos pa med pa kho nar phul du gyur pa'i rtogs bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One cannot understand the word ‚Äúquality‚Äù to refer to the qualities of whiteness, etc.,üîΩwithout reference to the increase of a quality.

original: yang ci'i phyir yon tan rab tu gyur pa la ltos pa med bar rdzas la rab tu byung ba'i blor thal bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir yon tan rab tu gyur pa la ltos pa med bar rdzas la rab tu byung ba'i blor thal bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Again, why is it that the cognition of the substance does not depend on the transformation of the quality?

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said:

original: nye bar gzhag pas de'i ngo bo nyid nye bar bsgrub pa na shel la nye ba'i rten rtogs pa la ltos pa'i tshon gyi blo 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar gzhag pas de'i ngo bo nyid nye bar bsgrub pa na shel la nye ba'i rten rtogs pa la ltos pa'i tshon gyi blo 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: When the nature of that is accomplished by the proximate placement, the cognition of the color does not occur in dependence on the cognition of the proximate support, the crystal.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /üîΩma byang ba la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa / ma byang ba la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: ma byad ba la shel dang nye bar gzhag bdag la tha dad pa'i blor gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ma byad ba la shel dang nye bar gzhag bdag la tha dad pa'i blor gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: When it is not polished, the crystal placed nearby does not become a different cognition.

original: de ni shel 'di kho na rnam pa 'di'o zhes lhag par zhen to //
analyzed: de ni shel 'di kho na rnam pa 'di'o zhes lhag par zhen to //
translated: It is conceived as ‚Äúthis crystal is just like this.‚Äù

original: byang ba la ni dmar bo 'di ni shel lo zhes nges ba mi 'thad ba kho na'o //üîΩrab tu gyur ba @247a * //
analyzed: byang ba la ni dmar bo 'di ni shel lo zhes nges ba mi 'thad ba kho na'o // rab tu gyur ba @247a * //
translated: When it is polished, it is not tenable to ascertain ‚Äúthis red is the crystal.‚Äù

original: smos pa ni yon tan la ltos ba'i rtogs ba gzhung gzugs pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: smos pa ni yon tan la ltos ba'i rtogs ba gzhung gzugs pa'i don du ste /
translated: The mention of ‚Äútransformation‚Äù is for the purpose of establishing the text that the cognition of the color depends on the transformation.

original: gzhan du na nges bar bya bzhin pa'i rigs kyang rigs dang ldan ba'i don la phan 'dogs par 'jug cing /
analyzed: gzhan du na nges bar bya bzhin pa'i rigs kyang rigs dang ldan ba'i don la phan 'dogs par 'jug cing /
translated: Otherwise, the meaning of possessing a type would engage in benefiting the object, even though it is being ascertained.

original: de las kyang des pa na 'dogs pa las de ltar snang ngo zhes kha cig so mor gnas so //
analyzed: de las kyang des pa na 'dogs pa las de ltar snang ngo zhes kha cig so mor gnas so //
translated: And since it is more refined than that, some remain in doubt, thinking, ‚ÄúIt appears that way from imputation.‚Äù

original: rab tu gyur pa ni nges par sbyor ba las der nges pa la ltos pa'i rtogs pas yongs su gcad bar bya ba kho na ste /
analyzed: rab tu gyur pa ni nges par sbyor ba las der nges pa la ltos pa'i rtogs pas yongs su gcad bar bya ba kho na ste /
translated: The transformation is only to be ascertained by the realization that depends on the definite application.

original: rdzas ni rab nyid las rab tu gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas ni rab nyid las rab tu gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the substance is not transformed from the excellent itself.

original: rdzas ni rang nyid las rdzas gzhan las phul du byung bar bya bar nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rdzas ni rang nyid las rdzas gzhan las phul du byung bar bya bar nus pa ma yin te /
translated: A substance cannot be made excellent from another substance.

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis smra bar ram rtogs bar nus pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis smra bar ram rtogs bar nus pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: This is because it is not possible to speak or realize it by its mere nature.

original: 'o na rigs pa ni rab tu gyur pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na rigs pa ni rab tu gyur pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: ‚ÄúWell then, since there is no transformation of the type,

original: de la mi ltos pa'i khyad par can rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi ltos pa'i khyad par can rtogs so zhe na /
translated: the special realization does not depend on that.‚Äù

original: 'di skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di skyon ma yin te /
translated: This is not a fault.

original: khyad par can rtogs pa ni sngon po la sogs pa la ni khyad par la ltos pa ste /
analyzed: khyad par can rtogs pa ni sngon po la sogs pa la ni khyad par la ltos pa ste /
translated: The realization of a specific property is dependent on a specific property.

original: des na yod pa la sogs pa'i khyad par la ltos pa ni khyad par can la yod pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa sngon po la sogs pa rtogs pa bzhin du'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na yod pa la sogs pa'i khyad par la ltos pa ni khyad par can la yod pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa sngon po la sogs pa rtogs pa bzhin du'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the realization of a specific property such as existence is dependent on a specific property, just as the realization of blue, etc. is.

original: gzhan dun gal te rang gi rten lam bzung ba'i yang ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i rigs kyis ba lang la sogs pa rtogs par byed na gang gi tshe 'di ni rdzas ci zhig go zhes rdzas tsam nye bar dmigs ba na pa lang nyid la sogs pa
analyzed: gzhan dun gal te rang gi rten lam bzung ba'i yang ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i rigs kyis ba lang la sogs pa rtogs par byed na gang gi tshe 'di ni rdzas ci zhig go zhes rdzas tsam nye bar dmigs ba na pa lang nyid la sogs pa
translated: Otherwise, if the understanding of a cow, etc. were due to the universal cow, etc. which inheres in its own substratum, then when one merely observes a substance, asking ‚ÄúWhat is this substance?,‚Äù

original: rnams gzung byam yin pa de'i tshe yang ba lang la sogs pa nges par 'gyur na 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rnams gzung byam yin pa de'i tshe yang ba lang la sogs pa nges par 'gyur na 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: at that time, the universal cow, etc. would be apprehended, and then the cow, etc. would be ascertained, but that does not happen.

original: de'i phyir rigs la ltos pa med par de dang ldan pa la rtogs ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs la ltos pa med par de dang ldan pa la rtogs ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the understanding of that which possesses a universal does not occur without depending on the universal.

original: gang zhig khyad par la ltos par rtogs pa yongs su gcad par bya ba de ni yon tan phul du byung bas bsgrubs pa'i yon tan 'dra ba nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig khyad par la ltos par rtogs pa yongs su gcad par bya ba de ni yon tan phul du byung bas bsgrubs pa'i yon tan 'dra ba nyid ma yin te /
translated: That which is understood to depend on a distinction is not the same as a quality established by a preeminent quality.

original: dbyug ba can bzhin /
analyzed: dbyug ba can bzhin /
translated: Like the one with a stick.

original: de dang ldan pa dang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal pa'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa dang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal pa'o //
translated: The pervasion is: it has that and is like that.

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi sbyor ba ni shel gyi dpes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi sbyor ba ni shel gyi dpes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The application of the dissimilar is to be applied with the example of crystal.

original: 'dres pa'i ngo bo'i phyir kun la //
analyzed: 'dres pa'i ngo bo'i phyir kun la //
translated: Because of the nature of mixing,

original: log pa'i shes par thal par 'gyur //
analyzed: log pa'i shes par thal par 'gyur //
translated: there is the consequence of mistaken cognition in all.

original: yon tan gyis phan 'dogs pa las de'i ngo bo nyid du khas blangs ba na'o //
analyzed: yon tan gyis phan 'dogs pa las de'i ngo bo nyid du khas blangs ba na'o //
translated: When it is accepted that the nature of that is from the benefit of qualities.

original: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is that? It is said:

original: thams cad ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: All, etc.

original: 'dres pa'i khyad par ni yon tan zhes pa don gcig pa'o //
analyzed: 'dres pa'i khyad par ni yon tan zhes pa don gcig pa'o //
translated: The distinction of mixing is synonymous with quality.

original: sgra las byung ba'i @247b rtogs pa thams cad ni don rnams la 'dres pa'i ngo bos bar du chod ba ste /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i @247b rtogs pa thams cad ni don rnams la 'dres pa'i ngo bos bar du chod ba ste /
translated: All cognitions arising from words are obstructed by the nature of mixing in objects.

original: de'i phyir gal te yon tan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i phyir yon tan can la de'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te yon tan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i phyir yon tan can la de'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, if the possessor of the quality is the entity of the quality because the quality benefits it,

original: de ltar gyur na ji ltar shel sngon po'o zhes 'dzin pa ni don ji lta ba yin pa'i rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na ji ltar shel sngon po'o zhes 'dzin pa ni don ji lta ba yin pa'i rtogs pa ste /
translated: then how could the apprehension of a crystal as blue be a cognition of an object as it is?

original: shel ni rang nyid las sngon po ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: shel ni rang nyid las sngon po ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because the crystal is not blue by itself.

original: de ltar bum pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pa thams cad ji lta ba'i don can ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar bum pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pa thams cad ji lta ba'i don can ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, all cognitions that arise from words such as ‚Äúpot‚Äù would not be of objects as they are,

original: rdzas ni rang nyid las bum pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas ni rang nyid las bum pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the substance is not the entity of the pot and so on by itself.

original: 'dod pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: But this is unacceptable.

original: de 'dis ni gang zhig don ji lta ba bzhin pa'i rtogs pa'i yul de ni khyad par du byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo ma yin te /
analyzed: de 'dis ni gang zhig don ji lta ba bzhin pa'i rtogs pa'i yul de ni khyad par du byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo ma yin te /
translated: This shows that the object of a cognition of an object as it is is not a specific entity of its own,

original: 'di lta ste da byug ba can bzhin /
analyzed: 'di lta ste da byug ba can bzhin /
translated: like a crystal.

original: de dang ldan pa'ang de lta bu'o zhes ba khyab byed dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'ang de lta bu'o zhes ba khyab byed dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
translated: It also says that the possessor of that is like that, thus stating a pervasion that is contradictory to the encompassing factor.

original: khyab pa med par 'di la dogs par bya ba ma yin zhing don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba ni mi 'dod pa nyid do //üîΩspyi la sogs ba mang nyid na'ang //
analyzed: khyab pa med par 'di la dogs par bya ba ma yin zhing don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba ni mi 'dod pa nyid do // spyi la sogs ba mang nyid na'ang //
translated: It is not to be doubted that there is no pervasion, and it is not to be accepted that there is a consequence that is not just as it is.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Even if there are many universals, etc.

original: sogs ba smos pa las yon tan dang bya ba 'dzin no //
analyzed: sogs ba smos pa las yon tan dang bya ba 'dzin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes qualities and actions.

original: cig car 'dzin byed rnams la yang //
analyzed: cig car 'dzin byed rnams la yang //
translated: Even for those who apprehend simultaneously,

original: zhes pa / gang gi tshe dus gcig tu rtogs pa po mang po rnams khyad par tha dad pa rnams kyi don gcig rtogs par byed ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: zhes pa / gang gi tshe dus gcig tu rtogs pa po mang po rnams khyad par tha dad pa rnams kyi don gcig rtogs par byed ba de'i tshe /
translated: when many cognizers at one time cognize the same thing that has different features,

original: phan 'dogs pa ni 'gal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa ni 'gal bar 'gyur //
translated: then the benefit is contradictory.

original: yon tan byas pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan byas pa'o //
translated: The quality is done.

original: de dper brjod kyis ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de dper brjod kyis ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: To teach that by way of an example, he said:

original: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, etc.

original: ci'i phyir 'gal bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'gal bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why is it contradictory?

original: mi nus zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: mi nus zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: He said, ‚ÄúIt is not possible,‚Äù etc.

original: 'dir rtogs ba gsum ste /
analyzed: 'dir rtogs ba gsum ste /
translated: Here there are three realizations:

original: gang yang rung ba'i yon tan gyi ngo bo rtogs pa'am /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i yon tan gyi ngo bo rtogs pa'am /
translated: The realization of the nature of any quality,

original: thams cad kyi yang phyogs gcig rnams kyis sam /üîΩbdag nyid thams cad kyi thams cad kho na'i yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi yang phyogs gcig rnams kyis sam / bdag nyid thams cad kyi thams cad kho na'i yin zhes pa'o //
translated: Or by all of all?üîΩTo this he says,

original: de la re zhig re re kho na'i ma yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig re re kho na'i ma yin te /
translated: First, it is not by one alone,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference.

original: gang las gcig kho na'i ngo bo rtogs par 'gyur gyi gzhan ma yin pa yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams la khyad par 'ga' yang yod ba ma yin bas so //
analyzed: gang las gcig kho na'i ngo bo rtogs par 'gyur gyi gzhan ma yin pa yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams la khyad par 'ga' yang yod ba ma yin bas so //
translated: Because there is no difference at all in existence, etc.,

original: yang na rtogs pa po rnams la khyad par med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: yang na rtogs pa po rnams la khyad par med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Or, because there is no difference in the cognizers.

original: rtogs pa po gcig gi ngor khyad par gcig kho na'i ngo bo'i rjes su byed pa ma yin no //üîΩphyogs gcig gi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyams su myong @248a * //
analyzed: rtogs pa po gcig gi ngor khyad par gcig kho na'i ngo bo'i rjes su byed pa ma yin no // phyogs gcig gi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyams su myong @248a * //
translated: Because the cognizer does not conform to the nature of one difference alone.

original: bar nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bar nus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it by the experience of the nature of the quality of one part,üîΩBecause there is no difference in the cognizer.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /üîΩmtha' dag ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa / mtha' dag ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Why is it so? He says,

original: gal te phyogs gcig gi khyad par gyi ngo bo rtogs par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te phyogs gcig gi khyad par gyi ngo bo rtogs par gyur na /
translated: If the nature of the difference of one part were cognized,

original: de'i bum pa zhes de'i phyogs gcig rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i bum pa zhes de'i phyogs gcig rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, the vase would be realized as one of its parts.

original: de ltar sa las gyur pa'o rdzas so zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar sa las gyur pa'o rdzas so zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In that case, it would be like ‚Äúearth‚Äù and ‚Äúsubstance,‚Äù and so on.

original: gsum pa'i phyogs la ni skyon gsungs pa /
analyzed: gsum pa'i phyogs la ni skyon gsungs pa /
translated: The third position is stated with the fault:

original: kun gyis yin na 'dres mthong 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kun gyis yin na 'dres mthong 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were all of them, a mixture would be seen.

original: zhes pa / kun gyis te /
analyzed: zhes pa / kun gyis te /
translated: ‚ÄúAll of them‚Äù

original: bum pa nyid dang sa las gyur pa nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams kyi dngos po mtha' dag la cig car phan 'dogs na /
analyzed: bum pa nyid dang sa las gyur pa nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams kyi dngos po mtha' dag la cig car phan 'dogs na /
translated: means that if the entire entity of all the distinctions, such as vase and earth, and so on, were simultaneously assisted,

original: de'i ngo bo blangs pa na /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo blangs pa na /
translated: then when the entity of that were apprehended,

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnam par phye nas 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnam par phye nas 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: since the entity of the vase and so on would not be apprehended by distinguishing them,

original: rnam par dbye ba med pas phan tshun yang dag par tha dad pa'i ngo bo du ma 'dzin par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba med pas phan tshun yang dag par tha dad pa'i ngo bo du ma 'dzin par 'gyur gyi /
translated: since there would be no distinction, many entities that are utterly different from each other would be apprehended,

original: rnam par dbye bas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par dbye bas ni ma yin te /
translated: but not by distinguishing them.

original: bum pa 'di'o sa las gyur pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa 'di'o sa las gyur pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, ‚ÄúThis is a vase. It is made of earth,‚Äù and so on.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: cig car ngo bo thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: cig car ngo bo thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: Because all entities are realized simultaneously.

original: gang las rdzas de thams cad kyi ngo bo cig car rtogs par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gang las rdzas de thams cad kyi ngo bo cig car rtogs par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: from which all the natures of those substances are simultaneously understood.

original: des na 'di ltar phan 'dogs pa 'gal ba'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor 'dzin par mi 'gyur na de yang yod do //
analyzed: des na 'di ltar phan 'dogs pa 'gal ba'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor 'dzin par mi 'gyur na de yang yod do //
translated: Therefore, in this way, because of the contradiction of the benefit, the apprehension of the nature of the pot, etc. does not occur.

original: de 'dis ni gang zhig cig car khyad par du ma'i rjes su bsgrubs pa'i rtogs pas yongs su gcad par bya ba de ni khyad par gyi ngo bo rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de 'dis ni gang zhig cig car khyad par du ma'i rjes su bsgrubs pa'i rtogs pas yongs su gcad par bya ba de ni khyad par gyi ngo bo rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, that which is to be excluded by the cognition of the accomplishment of many differences simultaneously is not the cognition of the nature of the difference.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dbung rgyan dang rna rgyan zhes pa bzhin de dang ldan pa'i dngos po yang de lta bu'o zhes 'gal bas khyab pa gsungs so //
analyzed: dbung rgyan dang rna rgyan zhes pa bzhin de dang ldan pa'i dngos po yang de lta bu'o zhes 'gal bas khyab pa gsungs so //
translated: like the expression ‚Äúarmlet and earring,‚Äù the entity possessing that is also like that. Thus, he states the pervasion by contradiction.

original: khyad par rnams la zhes pa la sogs pas de dang ldan pa'i phyogs la rjod pa'i skyon phyogs gzhan rnams la bsgre ba ston pa ste /
analyzed: khyad par rnams la zhes pa la sogs pas de dang ldan pa'i phyogs la rjod pa'i skyon phyogs gzhan rnams la bsgre ba ston pa ste /
translated: By ‚Äúthe differences,‚Äù etc., he teaches the extension of the fault of the expression to the other positions, which possess that.

original: byed phyi mas ni 'di kho na la 'thad pa gsungs so //
analyzed: byed phyi mas ni 'di kho na la 'thad pa gsungs so //
translated: By the latter statement, he states the justification for just this.

original: rigs kyi ngo bo ni khyad par rnams las mi rigs shing /
analyzed: rigs kyi ngo bo ni khyad par rnams las mi rigs shing /
translated: The nature of a universal is not a particular.

original: sgra'i rang gi ngo bo ni rigs la dang / sgra'i rang gi ngo bo dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo ni 'brel pa la'o //
analyzed: sgra'i rang gi ngo bo ni rigs la dang / sgra'i rang gi ngo bo dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo ni 'brel pa la'o //
