translated: The nature of a word is a universal. The nature of a universal that possesses the nature of a word is a relation.

original: 'brel ba can gyi ngo bos dben pa'i don gyi bdag nyid ni tshig gi yul du bya bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir gdon mi za bar zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'brel ba can gyi ngo bos dben pa'i don gyi bdag nyid ni tshig gi yul du bya bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir gdon mi za bar zhes gsungs so //
translated: Since it is impossible to make the nature of an object that is devoid of the nature of a related object the object of a word, he says, ‚Äúwithout a doubt.‚Äù

original: 'o na de dang ldan pa'i phyogs las khyad par gyi phyogs kyi bye brag ci zhe na /üîΩde dang ldan pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i @248b rigs kyi ngo bor yod pa'i sgras rjod par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na de dang ldan pa'i phyogs las khyad par gyi phyogs kyi bye brag ci zhe na / de dang ldan pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i @248b rigs kyi ngo bor yod pa'i sgras rjod par byed pa ste /
translated: If that is so, what is the difference between a universal that possesses that and a particular that possesses that?üîΩA universal that exists in a particular that possesses that is expressed by a word that exists in the nature of a universal.

original: khyad par gyi phyogs la ni rdzas la sogs pa'i ngo bor ro //
analyzed: khyad par gyi phyogs la ni rdzas la sogs pa'i ngo bor ro //
translated: A particular that possesses that is expressed by a word that exists in the nature of a substance and so on.

original: de ltar na de rnams khyad par gyi ngo bor brjod par byas bar 'gyur ro zhes pa bye brag go //
analyzed: de ltar na de rnams khyad par gyi ngo bor brjod par byas bar 'gyur ro zhes pa bye brag go //
translated: Thus, those are said to be the nature of a particular.

original: de la yang rdzas nyid la sogs pa rnams la dngos dang / khyad par rnams la nye bar btags pa'o zhes snga ma kho na ltar skyon brjod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: de la yang rdzas nyid la sogs pa rnams la dngos dang / khyad par rnams la nye bar btags pa'o zhes snga ma kho na ltar skyon brjod par bya ba ste /
translated: In response to that, the previous fault should be stated: ‚ÄúAlso, the substances and so on are the actual, and the attributes are the nominal.‚Äù

original: dngos dang btags pa'i 'jug pa nyid dang / rigs kyis brjod pa ma yin pa dang / yon tan gyi phan 'dogs pa 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: dngos dang btags pa'i 'jug pa nyid dang / rigs kyis brjod pa ma yin pa dang / yon tan gyi phan 'dogs pa 'gal ba'o //
translated: The actual and the nominal are contradictory, the expression by type is not, and the benefit of the qualities is contradictory.

original: srid pa las zhes pa rigs rjod par byed pa na /
analyzed: srid pa las zhes pa rigs rjod par byed pa na /
translated: When the existence of type is expressed,

original: rab gyur 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab gyur 'gyur te /
translated: it is the best.

original: blo med par zhes pa 'di mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo med par zhes pa 'di mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this is impossible without mind.

original: 'brel ba rjod par byed pa na yang ste /
analyzed: 'brel ba rjod par byed pa na yang ste /
translated: Also, when the connection is expressed,üîΩit is the best.

original: 'di nyid kyi phyir srid pa smos pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi phyir srid pa smos pa'o //
translated: For this reason, existence is mentioned.

original: 'o na sngar 'brel ba brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid du bshad na /
analyzed: 'o na sngar 'brel ba brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid du bshad na /
translated: Well, if it was previously explained that it is not to be expressed,

original: de ci ltar da ltar yod pa'i ngo bo rjod par byed pa la brten pa yin /
analyzed: de ci ltar da ltar yod pa'i ngo bo rjod par byed pa la brten pa yin /
translated: how is it now the basis of the expression of the existent entity?

original: yang ci ltar 'dir tha dad med par nye bar gdags pa 'brel ba'i yan lag tu bya ba yin /
analyzed: yang ci ltar 'dir tha dad med par nye bar gdags pa 'brel ba'i yan lag tu bya ba yin /
translated: Also, how is the nondifferent designation here to be made a part of the connection?

original: snga ma ni yod pa nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir kun bshad pa'i don can la sgra tha dad med par nye bar gdags pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir rjod par mi byed par bshad pa ste /
analyzed: snga ma ni yod pa nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir kun bshad pa'i don can la sgra tha dad med par nye bar gdags pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir rjod par mi byed par bshad pa ste /
translated: The former is not actually existent, and it is not tenable to impute it without a different term that has the meaning of ‚Äúall explained.‚Äù

original: 'brel par yang yod pa nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: 'brel par yang yod pa nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa kho na yin na /
translated: If it is not actually existent,

original: de ci ltar de'i yod pa nyid dam yod pa'i sgra dang tha dad med par gdags pa yin /üîΩtha dad med par gdags pa med na'ang ci las sngar brjod ba'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ci ste yod pa nyid dang tha mi dad pa nye bar gdags pas de brjod par bya na /
analyzed: de ci ltar de'i yod pa nyid dam yod pa'i sgra dang tha dad med par gdags pa yin / tha dad med par gdags pa med na'ang ci las sngar brjod ba'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ci ste yod pa nyid dang tha mi dad pa nye bar gdags pas de brjod par bya na /
translated: how could it be imputed as the existence of that or as not different from the term ‚Äúexists‚Äù?üîΩIf it is imputed as not different, then what is the error that would ensue, as was previously stated?

original: ci ltar yod pa dang sbyor ba'i sgra dag gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'thad ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar yod pa dang sbyor ba'i sgra dag gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'thad ce na /
translated: But if it is imputed as not different from existence, then how could the terms that connect it to existence be untenable as a common locus?

original: skyon 'di ma yin te /
analyzed: skyon 'di ma yin te /
translated: This is not an error,

original: 'brel ba rjod par byed par khas blangs nas skyon 'di brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel ba rjod par byed par khas blangs nas skyon 'di brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because this error is stated after accepting that it expresses a connection.

original: gal te yang 'brel ba brjod bar bya ba yin pa de lta na yang de dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi skyon 'da' ba med de /
analyzed: gal te yang 'brel ba brjod bar bya ba yin pa de lta na yang de dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi skyon 'da' ba med de /
translated: Even if the connection is what is to be expressed, still the fault of the position that possesses it is not avoided,

original: rigs ldan dang mtshungs par nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i don du 'di bshad do //
analyzed: rigs ldan dang mtshungs par nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i don du 'di bshad do //
translated: because it is just like the one possessing the reason. In order to demonstrate this, he explains this.

original: de ldan yang zhes pa la sogs pas 'di'i phyogs gzhan nyid kho na sel bar byed do //
analyzed: de ldan yang zhes pa la sogs pas 'di'i phyogs gzhan nyid kho na sel bar byed do //
translated: The other position itself is eliminated by even if it possesses that... and so on.

original: 'o na yang bshad ba zhes pa la sogs pas phyogs gzhan nyid ston to //üîΩ'dir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad ba'i ngo bos brjod bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'o na yang bshad ba zhes pa la sogs pas phyogs gzhan nyid ston to // 'dir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad ba'i ngo bos brjod bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: The other position itself is demonstrated by but it is said... and so on.
Here, it is not the case that the object of expression is by means of an entity that is different or not different.

original: ci zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: rigs ldan de rnams kyi gang bye brag med pa'i ngo bo yod pa nyid du sgro btags pa de khon khyad par gyi ngo bo la ma reg par brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs ldan de rnams kyi gang bye brag med pa'i ngo bo yod pa nyid du sgro btags pa de khon khyad par gyi ngo bo la ma reg par brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: That which is the entity that is not different from those possessing the reason is the object of expression, without touching the entity that is the qualifier.

original: de lta na yang khyad par gyi phyogs las phyogs gzhan kho na 'di'o zhes sems so //
analyzed: de lta na yang khyad par gyi phyogs las phyogs gzhan kho na 'di'o zhes sems so //
translated: Even so, it is thought that this is just the other position from the position of the qualifier.

original: gal te de lta na zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: gal te de lta na zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: If you say in that case, etc.

original: rigs dang sbyor ba'i phyogs dag gi nang du 'di 'dus pa'i phyir phyogs gzhan nyid 'gegs par byed do //üîΩyang ci ltar de ldan tsam yod pa nyid dam 'brel bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: rigs dang sbyor ba'i phyogs dag gi nang du 'di 'dus pa'i phyir phyogs gzhan nyid 'gegs par byed do // yang ci ltar de ldan tsam yod pa nyid dam 'brel bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: He refutes another position, because this is included in the position of the reason and the application.

original: de dang ldan pa tsam ni zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa tsam ni zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: Again, how can it be that mere possession exists or is related? He says, Mere possession, etc.

original: tsam gyi sgras khyad par sel ba ni /
analyzed: tsam gyi sgras khyad par sel ba ni /
translated: The word mere excludes the qualifier.

original: spyi thams cad kyi rjes su song pa'i ngo bo sgra'i don brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi thams cad kyi rjes su song pa'i ngo bo sgra'i don brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning of the word is the nature that pervades all universals.

original: de yang rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyi phyir dngos po'i rkyen gyis brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de yang rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyi phyir dngos po'i rkyen gyis brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing /
translated: Moreover, because it is the mere reason for engagement, it is not to be expressed by the condition of an entity.

original: yod pa nyid dam 'brel ba ma gtogs bar gzhan nye bar dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa nyid dam 'brel ba ma gtogs bar gzhan nye bar dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Apart from mere existence or relation, nothing else is observed.

original: dngos bo'i rkyen ni de kho na la byas ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos bo'i rkyen ni de kho na la byas ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the condition of an entity is made only in relation to that.

original: 'di lung gis bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di lung gis bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: For the sake of teaching this through scripture, he says:

original: tshig sdud dang byed ldan dang de phan rnams la zhes pa la sogs ba'o //
analyzed: tshig sdud dang byed ldan dang de phan rnams la zhes pa la sogs ba'o //
translated: The words and so on include the compound, the active, and the appositional.

original: 'brel pa brjod par bya ba nyid la lung ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa brjod par bya ba nyid la lung ste /
translated: The appositional is that which expresses a relation.

original: rgyal po'i skyes bu nyid 'tshed par byed pa nyid nye ba'i ba lang gi bu nyid ces pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal po'i skyes bu nyid 'tshed par byed pa nyid nye ba'i ba lang gi bu nyid ces pa'o //
translated: For example, the king's man, the cook, the son of a cow.

original: tshig sdud la sogs pa 'di rnams la rang dang bdag po'i dang bya ba dang byed pa can gyi dang bu rgyud dang bu rgyud dang ldan pa'i 'brel ba brjod par bya ste rim pa ji lta bar ro //
analyzed: tshig sdud la sogs pa 'di rnams la rang dang bdag po'i dang bya ba dang byed pa can gyi dang bu rgyud dang bu rgyud dang ldan pa'i 'brel ba brjod par bya ste rim pa ji lta bar ro //
translated: In these compounds and so on, the relation is to be expressed as that of self and possessor, action and agent, son and lineage, and possessor and possessed, respectively.

original: des na 'dir yang yod pa'i sgra ni byed ldan gyi mtha' can nyid kyi phyir 'brel brjod par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'dir yang yod pa'i sgra ni byed ldan gyi mtha' can nyid kyi phyir 'brel brjod par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, here also, the word existent is the appositional because it ends with the active.

original: gzhan rnams ni 'di kho na'i dmigs bsal bshad de /
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni 'di kho na'i dmigs bsal bshad de /
translated: The others are explained as exceptions to this.

original: gzhan du zhes pa la sogs ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes pa la sogs ba'o //
translated: For example, other, and so on.

original: 'di yon tan brjod pa nyid la lung ste grags pas /
analyzed: 'di yon tan brjod pa nyid la lung ste grags pas /
translated: The active is that which expresses a quality. For example, the famous.

original: tshig sdud las lci rtsub nyid dang / byed ldan las 'gro ba'i ngang can nyid dang / de phan las lag ldan nyid do //
analyzed: tshig sdud las lci rtsub nyid dang / byed ldan las 'gro ba'i ngang can nyid dang / de phan las lag ldan nyid do //
translated: From the compound word, heaviness and roughness. From the word with an affix, the nature of going. From the word with a prefix, the nature of having hands.

original: 'dir rigs tsam brjod kyi 'brel pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir rigs tsam brjod kyi 'brel pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, only the class is mentioned, not the relation.

original: tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo'i de phan las dkar ba nyid de /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo'i de phan las dkar ba nyid de /
translated: From the word with a prefix, whiteness.

original: dkar bo'i sgra ni ldan ba'i rkyen gyi mtha' can gyi'ang rang bzhin gyis ngo bo mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir 'dir yang yon tan kho na brjod bar bya pa'o //
analyzed: dkar bo'i sgra ni ldan ba'i rkyen gyi mtha' can gyi'ang rang bzhin gyis ngo bo mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir 'dir yang yon tan kho na brjod bar bya pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúwhite‚Äù has the same nature as the word with an affix, because it has the suffix. Here also, only the quality is expressed.

original: mi 'khrul ba nyid kyi 'brel ba las ni ci la yod pa nyid yin /
analyzed: mi 'khrul ba nyid kyi 'brel ba las ni ci la yod pa nyid yin /
translated: From the relation of non-deception, it is the existence of something.

original: tshig gi don ni yod pa nyid la @249b 'khrul pa ni ma yin no zhes ba ste /
analyzed: tshig gi don ni yod pa nyid la @249b 'khrul pa ni ma yin no zhes ba ste /
translated: The meaning of the word is existence, not non-deception.

original: 'dir yod ba nyid de kho na brjod par bya ba'i 'brel pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yod ba nyid de kho na brjod par bya ba'i 'brel pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, existence itself is not the relation to be expressed.

original: de ldan bum pa la sogs don //
analyzed: de ldan bum pa la sogs don //
translated: The meaning such as a pot that has it.

original: zhes pa la sogs bas ni du ma la mi 'jug pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs bas ni du ma la mi 'jug pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs gsal bar byas so //
translated: By this and so on, the reason of not applying to many is clarified.

original: spyi'i don de ji lta bu zhes pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: spyi'i don de ji lta bu zhes pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The general meaning is the result of valid cognition.

original: gang du ma la 'jug pa ma yin pa de ni spyi ma yin te /
analyzed: gang du ma la 'jug pa ma yin pa de ni spyi ma yin te /
translated: That which does not occur in many is not a universal,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid bzhin de dang ldan pa yang de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid bzhin de dang ldan pa yang de lta bu'o //
translated: like a particular, and that which possesses it is also like that.

original: khyab par byed pa med pa'o //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa med pa'o //
translated: There is no pervader.

original: spyi ni du ma la 'jug pa yin no zhes pa ldog pa'o //
analyzed: spyi ni du ma la 'jug pa yin no zhes pa ldog pa'o //
translated: A universal occurs in many. This is the contrapositive.

original: de yang zhes pa la sogs pas gtan tshigs nyid kyi don rnam par 'byed do //
analyzed: de yang zhes pa la sogs pas gtan tshigs nyid kyi don rnam par 'byed do //
translated: And that, etc. distinguishes the meaning of the reason.

original: ci ltar zhes pa la sogs ba rnams kyis dam bca' ba'i don to //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes pa la sogs ba rnams kyis dam bca' ba'i don to //
translated: How? etc. is the meaning of the thesis.

original: 'o na yang zhes ba la sogs pas bsgrub bya grub pa nyid smras te /
analyzed: 'o na yang zhes ba la sogs pas bsgrub bya grub pa nyid smras te /
translated: But, etc. states the establishment of the probandum.

original: de ldan ni spyi'i ngo bo nyid du mi 'dod ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ldan ni spyi'i ngo bo nyid du mi 'dod ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not accepted that it has that, i.e. a universal nature.

original: de mi 'dod pa nyid spyi'i ngo bo sgro btags bar gsal bar byed pa gsungs ba /
analyzed: de mi 'dod pa nyid spyi'i ngo bo sgro btags bar gsal bar byed pa gsungs ba /
translated: Not accepting that, i.e. a universal nature, is stated to clarify the superimposition of a universal nature:

original: ci'i don du zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: ci'i don du zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
translated: For what purpose? etc.

original: / gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa grub pa bsgrub bya nyid kyi lan 'debs so //
analyzed: / gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa grub pa bsgrub bya nyid kyi lan 'debs so //
translated: The response to the objection that existence is a probandum is stated by the passage beginning with For the following reason....

original: 'di ltar sems te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems te /
translated: The idea is as follows:

original: 'brel ba bya ba sla ba nyid dang / mi 'khrul bar smra bas yod pa'i sgras spyi'i rjod par byed pa nyid la brten te /
analyzed: 'brel ba bya ba sla ba nyid dang / mi 'khrul bar smra bas yod pa'i sgras spyi'i rjod par byed pa nyid la brten te /
translated: Since the relation is easy to understand and the statement is non-erroneous, the word existence is based on the mere expression of the universal.

original: khyad par gyi sgra rnams dang gzhi mthun pa nyid khas blangs pa'i phyir yang ngo ;
analyzed: khyad par gyi sgra rnams dang gzhi mthun pa nyid khas blangs pa'i phyir yang ngo ;
translated: And because the word existence is accepted as having a common locus with the words for the particulars.

original: / spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po med na gzhi mthun pa nyid 'thad pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: / spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po med na gzhi mthun pa nyid 'thad pa ma yin pas so //
translated: For if there were no such things as universals and particulars, a common locus would not be tenable.

original: de ltar ni spyi'i sgra las khyad par med par 'jug bzhin pa'i blo ni khyad par gyi sgra rnams kyis khyad par gzhan rnams la rnam par bcad nas /
analyzed: de ltar ni spyi'i sgra las khyad par med par 'jug bzhin pa'i blo ni khyad par gyi sgra rnams kyis khyad par gzhan rnams la rnam par bcad nas /
translated: Thus, the cognition that engages the particulars without distinction on the basis of the word for the universal, having excluded the other particulars by means of the words for the particulars,

original: khyad par du byas pa'i yul la rnam par 'jog ste /
analyzed: khyad par du byas pa'i yul la rnam par 'jog ste /
translated: is established with respect to the object that is distinguished.

original: de spyi med na 'thad pa ma yin no zhes ba'o //
analyzed: de spyi med na 'thad pa ma yin no zhes ba'o //
translated: That is not tenable if there is no universal.

original: 'dir yang spyi dang de ldan pa zhes khas len pa na /
analyzed: 'dir yang spyi dang de ldan pa zhes khas len pa na /
translated: Here, when the universal and its possessor are accepted,

original: rnam par rtog pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: There are two kinds of conceptualization.

original: yod pa nyid la sogs pa spyi'i de ldan nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: yod pa nyid la sogs pa spyi'i de ldan nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: [One is] the generality of existence, etc. being the possessor,

original: bum pa la sogs pa de ldan gyi mtshungs ba nyid ces pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa de ldan gyi mtshungs ba nyid ces pa'o //
translated: and the other is the sameness of the possessor, such as a pot, etc.

original: de la snga ma mi srid do zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la snga ma mi srid do zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: Among these, the former is impossible. To demonstrate this, he says,

original: yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúExistence, etc. are also . . .‚Äù

original: yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams la rigs gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams la rigs gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Existence, etc. do not have another type,

original: rigs rnams la rigs med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩdes na gdon mi za bar rnam par rtog pa gnyis @250a * //
analyzed: rigs rnams la rigs med pa nyid kyi phyir ro // des na gdon mi za bar rnam par rtog pa gnyis @250a * //
translated: because types do not have types.

original: pa khas blang bar bya'o zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: pa khas blang bar bya'o zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, one must accept the second kind of conceptualization. To demonstrate this, he says,

original: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore . . .‚Äù

original: don la zhes pa skabs su bab pa nyid kyi phyir de ldan la ste bum pa la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: don la zhes pa skabs su bab pa nyid kyi phyir de ldan la ste bum pa la sogs pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the object‚Äù means in the context. ‚ÄúThe possessor‚Äù is the pot, etc.

original: de ltar 'gyur ba sla ste /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur ba sla ste /
translated: It is easy to see that it is like this.

original: 'o na de kho na la'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de kho na la'o zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúBut in reality?‚Äù

original: 'di la gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di la gsungs pa /
translated: In response to this, he says,

original: de yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat also . . .‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir yod pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yod pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why does it not exist?

original: gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because of what?

original: 'ba' zhig go smos pas ni brjod par bya ba mtshungs pa sel bar byed de /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig go smos pas ni brjod par bya ba mtshungs pa sel bar byed de /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù excludes the similarity of the expressed.

original: sgra khon rjod par byed pa ste /
analyzed: sgra khon rjod par byed pa ste /
translated: Sound alone is the expresser.

original: 'di rnams mtshungs kyi brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di rnams mtshungs kyi brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: These are similar, but not the expressed.

original: de ltar cung zad kyang zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar cung zad kyang zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of ‚Äúnot even the slightest.‚ÄùüîΩNor is it by one who possesses it.

original: de dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig gis kyang ma yin zhes brjod par byed pa mtshungs pa kho nas 'di rnams mtshungs te /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig gis kyang ma yin zhes brjod par byed pa mtshungs pa kho nas 'di rnams mtshungs te /
translated: The expresser is exactly the same.

original: brjod par bya ba de ldan gyi dngos po'i ngo bo 'ba' zhig gis ni ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba de ldan gyi dngos po'i ngo bo 'ba' zhig gis ni ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The expressed is not by the mere nature of the entity that possesses it. This is the meaning.

original: 'o na yod pa nyid kyi sgra'i rang gi ngo bos de ldan brjod bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'o na yod pa nyid kyi sgra'i rang gi ngo bos de ldan brjod bar bya ste /
translated: Well, the word existence expresses that which possesses the nature of the word itself,

original: 'brel ba yang yod pa nyid kyi ngo bos so //
analyzed: 'brel ba yang yod pa nyid kyi ngo bos so //
translated: and the relation is by the nature of existence.

original: de'i phyir yod pa nyid dam 'brel ba'i brjod par bya bas de ldan dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir yod pa nyid dam 'brel ba'i brjod par bya bas de ldan dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, by the expressed existence or relation, it becomes similar to that which possesses it.

original: yod pa nyid dang sbyor ba dag kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang sbyor ba dag kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: Also, existence and application and so forth.

original: khyad par rigs dang de sbyor la //
analyzed: khyad par rigs dang de sbyor la //
translated: The particularities of the type and its application

original: nyes pa mtshungs te rnams la'ang //
analyzed: nyes pa mtshungs te rnams la'ang //
translated: are the same as the faults, and also

original: zhes pa la sogs pas sngar kho nar bsal zin te /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas sngar kho nar bsal zin te /
translated: are already refuted by the previousüîΩstatement.

original: rigs dang sbyor ba dag de ldan nyid du rjod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rigs dang sbyor ba dag de ldan nyid du rjod par byed pa'o //
translated: The type and its application are described as endowed with that.

original: gal te bum pa la sogs pa rnams la sgra mtshungs te /
analyzed: gal te bum pa la sogs pa rnams la sgra mtshungs te /
translated: If the same sound is in pots and so forth,

original: de'i tshe sgra de kho na sgra nyid kyis de ldan ni de rnams kyi spyi nyid du 'gyur te zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe sgra de kho na sgra nyid kyis de ldan ni de rnams kyi spyi nyid du 'gyur te zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: then that sound itself, by means of sound, would be the generality of those.

original: rgyu mtshan med min zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med min zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: He says, It is not without a reason, and so forth.

original: sgra ni de rnams kyi rjod par byed pa nyid kyi 'brel pa can nyid yin zhing 'brel pa can nyid de kho na ni rgyu mtshan med bar 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni de rnams kyi rjod par byed pa nyid kyi 'brel pa can nyid yin zhing 'brel pa can nyid de kho na ni rgyu mtshan med bar 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: Sound is related to them by means of its being their expresser. That relatedness itself is not tenable without a reason.

original: gang gi rigs kyi sgra rgyu mtshan can yin no zhes len ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi rigs kyi sgra rgyu mtshan can yin no zhes len ba'o //
translated: The type of sound is the reason.

original: 'dis ni rgyu mtshan can gyi sgra gang zhig gi gang la rgyu mtshan med pa de ni de la sbyor bar 'os pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: 'dis ni rgyu mtshan can gyi sgra gang zhig gi gang la rgyu mtshan med pa de ni de la sbyor bar 'os pa ma yin te ;
translated: This says that it is not right to apply a term that has a reason to that which lacks the reason,

original: dbyug pa can gyi sgra dbyug pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu la bzhin /
analyzed: dbyug pa can gyi sgra dbyug pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu la bzhin /
translated: just as the term ‚Äúclub-bearer‚Äù is not applied to a man who is without a club.

original: bum pa la sogs pa rnams la yang rgyu mtshan can rigs kyi sgra'i rgyu mtshan med do zhes pa rgyu ma dmigs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa rnams la yang rgyu mtshan can rigs kyi sgra'i rgyu mtshan med do zhes pa rgyu ma dmigs pa gsungs so //
translated: The non-observation of a cause is stated: ‚ÄúAlso, there is no reason for the term ‚Äòuniversal‚Äô to apply to pots, etc.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir yang zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore, etc.‚Äù

original: gal te yod pa'i sgras spyi brjod par bya ba na /
analyzed: gal te yod pa'i sgras spyi brjod par bya ba na /
translated: If the word ‚Äúexistent‚Äù expresses a universal,

original: @250b de las de khyad par du bya ba'i don du bum pa zhes brjod par bya'o zhes gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @250b de las de khyad par du bya ba'i don du bum pa zhes brjod par bya'o zhes gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then in order to distinguish it from that, one would have to say ‚Äúpot.‚Äù Thus, there would be a common locus.

original: spyi rjod par byed ba med na ni ci zhig ci'i khyad par du bya /
analyzed: spyi rjod par byed ba med na ni ci zhig ci'i khyad par du bya /
translated: If there is no expression of a universal, then what would be distinguished by what?

original: de las kyang khas blangs pa nyams pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang khas blangs pa nyams pa'o //
translated: Also, that contradicts your own tenets.

original: ci ste yang zhes pa /
analyzed: ci ste yang zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúAlso, etc.‚Äù

original: spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po med na yang rnam pa gzhan du khyad bar du byed pa dang khyad bar du bya ba nyid gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po med na yang rnam pa gzhan du khyad bar du byed pa dang khyad bar du bya ba nyid gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
translated: Even though there is no such thing as a universal or particular, one can still make distinctions in terms of other aspects, and one can still establish a system of distinctions and that which is distinguished.

original: rdzas gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin pa zhes pa /
analyzed: rdzas gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin pa zhes pa /
translated: ‚Äú It does not apply to a different substance‚Äù means

original: gzhan ma yin pa'i rdzas la 'jug pa'i yod pa'i yon tan bum pa la sogs ba'i rdzas so //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa'i rdzas la 'jug pa'i yod pa'i yon tan bum pa la sogs ba'i rdzas so //
translated: that it applies to a substance that is not different, that is, to the substance of such things as pots, which have the quality of existence.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthe quality of existence‚Äù means ‚Äúthat which has the quality of existence.‚Äù

original: yod pa'i yon tan zhes pa yod ba nyid kyi yon tan can zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: yod pa'i yon tan zhes pa yod ba nyid kyi yon tan can zhes pa'i don te /
translated: This is because existence is a quality of that.üîΩThis shows that the two cases are not analogous.üîΩEven though there is no such thing as a universal or particular, one can still make distinctions in terms of other aspects, and one can still establish a system of distinctions and that which is distinguished.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthe quality of existence‚Äù means ‚Äúthat which has the quality of existence.‚Äù

original: 'di'i yod pa nyid yon tan yin pa zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: 'di'i yod pa nyid yon tan yin pa zhes byas nas so //
translated: This is because existence is a quality of that.

original: 'dis ni mi mtshungs pa nyid smras so //üîΩde ltar mtshungs pa ma yin pa nyid yod na yang yod pa'i sgra las bum pa la sogs pa la sogs pa na /
analyzed: 'dis ni mi mtshungs pa nyid smras so // de ltar mtshungs pa ma yin pa nyid yod na yang yod pa'i sgra las bum pa la sogs pa la sogs pa na /
translated: This shows that the two cases are not analogous.

original: khyad par byed dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par byed dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos por 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though there is no such thing as a universal or particular, one can still make distinctions in terms of other aspects, and one can still establish a system of distinctions and that which is distinguished.

original: shin tu sngo ba la sogs pa bzhin te /üîΩji ltar sngon po'i yon can gyi rdzas ni /
analyzed: shin tu sngo ba la sogs pa bzhin te /üîΩji ltar sngon po'i yon can gyi rdzas ni /
translated: It is like the case of ‚Äúvery blue,‚Äù etc.üîΩA substance that has the quality of blueness is called ‚Äúblue.‚Äù

original: shin tu sngon po la sogs pa'i rdzas gzhan la dang / de'i yon tan la ma yin pa la 'jug pa ma yin zhes pas de spyi ma yin te /üîΩde ltar yang sngon po zhes brjod pa na sngon po'i sgra las /
analyzed: shin tu sngon po la sogs pa'i rdzas gzhan la dang / de'i yon tan la ma yin pa la 'jug pa ma yin zhes pas de spyi ma yin te / de ltar yang sngon po zhes brjod pa na sngon po'i sgra las /
translated: It is not a universal because it does not apply to other substances that are very blue and so on, nor to the qualities of that substance.

original: gang 'di sngon po zhes brjod pa de ci /üîΩgnyis las shin tu sngo ba yin nam /
analyzed: gang 'di sngon po zhes brjod pa de ci / gnyis las shin tu sngo ba yin nam /
translated: When one says blue, one wonders whether the word blue refers toüîΩwhat is called blue.

original: ci ste mang po'i nang na shin tu sngo ba yin zhes khyad par la dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ste mang po'i nang na shin tu sngo ba yin zhes khyad par la dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Is it the bluer of two or is it the bluest of many?üîΩTherefore, just as one says the bluest of two or the bluest of many,

original: de'i phyir gnyis kyi nang nas ches sngon po'am mang po'i nang nas ches sngon po zhes khyad par gyi sgra rnams kyi khyad par du bya ba de bzhin du yod pa zhes brjod pa na yod pa nyid ni don du ma la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir naüîΩgang yod pa 'di ni ci bum pa'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyis kyi nang nas ches sngon po'am mang po'i nang nas ches sngon po zhes khyad par gyi sgra rnams kyi khyad par du bya ba de bzhin du yod pa zhes brjod pa na yod pa nyid ni don du ma la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir na gang yod pa 'di ni ci bum pa'am /
translated: when one says exists, since existence applies to many things,

original: 'on te snam bu yin zhes bum pa la sogs pa la dogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on te snam bu yin zhes bum pa la sogs pa la dogs par 'gyur te /
translated: one wonders whether the existent is a pot or a cloth.

original: des na de'i sgra rnams kyi khyad bar du bya ste /
analyzed: des na de'i sgra rnams kyi khyad bar du bya ste /
translated: Therefore, the terms ‚Äúexistence‚Äù and ‚Äúnon-existence‚Äù should be distinguished.

original: bum pa'am snam bu'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa'am snam bu'o zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPot‚Äù or ‚Äúcloth‚Äù are examples.

original: gal te gcig la'ang sngo sogs bzhin //
analyzed: gal te gcig la'ang sngo sogs bzhin //
translated: If it is like blue, etc.,

original: zhes pa gal te gcig la ste thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i rigs dang ldan pa'i rdzas la thun mong ba yod pa nyid 'jug go zhes pa /
analyzed: zhes pa gal te gcig la ste thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i rigs dang ldan pa'i rdzas la thun mong ba yod pa nyid 'jug go zhes pa /
translated: If it is in one, i.e., in a substance that has a generic property that is not shared, then the term ‚Äúexistence‚Äù is used.

original: de la yod pa zhes brjod pa na bum pa la sogs pa la dogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la yod pa zhes brjod pa na bum pa la sogs pa la dogs par 'gyur te /
translated: When ‚Äúexistence‚Äù is stated, there is doubt about a pot, etc.

original: dper na sngon po zhes brjod pa na shin tu sngon po la sogs pa la dogs pa bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na sngon po zhes brjod pa na shin tu sngon po la sogs pa la dogs pa bzhin te /
translated: For example, when ‚Äúblue‚Äù is stated, there is doubt about ‚Äúvery blue,‚Äù etc.

original: des na khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po 'dod @251a * //
analyzed: des na khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po 'dod @251a * //
translated: Therefore, the relation of qualifier and qualificand should be accepted.

original: par bya'o // des na 'di yang yod min /
analyzed: par bya'o // des na 'di yang yod min /
translated: Therefore, this also does not exist.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs ba sngon po'i sgra ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs ba sngon po'i sgra ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Why? It is said:

original: sngon po'i sgra ni sngon po'i yon tan can gyi rdzas rjod par byed de /
analyzed: sngon po'i sgra ni sngon po'i yon tan can gyi rdzas rjod par byed de /
translated: The term ‚Äúblue‚Äù expresses a substance that has the quality of blue.

original: de yang shin tu sngo ba la sogs pa rdzas gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang shin tu sngo ba la sogs pa rdzas gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is not the case that something else, such as a very dark color, is engaged.

original: gang sngon po nyid 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: gang sngon po nyid 'jug pa'am /
translated: If it is blue itself that is engaged,

original: de'i 'brel pa de ni sgra'i don nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i 'brel pa de ni sgra'i don nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: then that connection is not the meaning of the word.

original: de'i phyir 'dir yang /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir yang /
translated: Therefore, here too,

original: rgyu mtshan med min de yang 'dod //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med min de yang 'dod //
translated: it is not without a reason, and that is accepted.

original: ces pa 'di mtshungs so zhes pas //
analyzed: ces pa 'di mtshungs so zhes pas //
translated: This is similar to the example.

original: dpe can dang 'dra bar dpe yang ma grub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: dpe can dang 'dra bar dpe yang ma grub pa kho na'o //
translated: Thus the example is not established in the same way as the exemplification.

original: khas blangs na'ang zhes pa /
analyzed: khas blangs na'ang zhes pa /
translated: If it is accepted,

original: gal te yang dpe grub par gyur na ;
analyzed: gal te yang dpe grub par gyur na ;
translated: even if the example were established,

original: de lta na yang yod pa nyid la de dang mtshungs pa nyid med do //
analyzed: de lta na yang yod pa nyid la de dang mtshungs pa nyid med do //
translated: still there is no similarity to existence.

original: de ston te /üîΩde min rigs la rigs med phyir //üîΩzhes pa yod pa nyid rigs 'di la bum pa nyid la sogs pa'i rigs yod pa ma yin no zhes pas /
analyzed: de ston te / de min rigs la rigs med phyir // zhes pa yod pa nyid rigs 'di la bum pa nyid la sogs pa'i rigs yod pa ma yin no zhes pas /
translated: That is shown:üîΩBecause it is not that type, and that type does not exist.üîΩThis means that the type of existence does not exist in the type of pot, and so on.

original: 'di ltar rigs med pa'i yod pa'i rigs ni rigs ldan ma yin zhes pa'o//
analyzed: 'di ltar rigs med pa'i yod pa'i rigs ni rigs ldan ma yin zhes pa'o//
translated: Thus the type of existence that is without type is not endowed with a type.

original: yod pa nyid la bum pa nyid la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bye brag rnams yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa nyid la bum pa nyid la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bye brag rnams yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But the pot and so on are not the particulars of existence.

original: ji ltar sngon po'i yon tan la gnyis las ches sngo ba la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams bzhin te /
analyzed: ji ltar sngon po'i yon tan la gnyis las ches sngo ba la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams bzhin te /
translated: For example, the quality of blue has the particulars of being bluer than blue, and so on.

original: gang las bye brag de rnams nye bar blangs nas rdzas la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gang las bye brag de rnams nye bar blangs nas rdzas la 'jug pa'o //
translated: From that, the particulars are taken up and applied to the substance.

original: de nye bar ma blangs na yang de'i dngos po la yang dag par phyogs pa'i ngo bo ni bum pa ma yin /
analyzed: de nye bar ma blangs na yang de'i dngos po la yang dag par phyogs pa'i ngo bo ni bum pa ma yin /
translated: Even if they are not taken up, the nature of that which is directed toward its entity is not a pot.

original: snam bu ma yin te /
analyzed: snam bu ma yin te /
translated: It is not a cloth.

original: de'i phyir yod pa'i sgra las bum pa la sogs pa'i bye brag la dogs par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yod pa'i sgra las bum pa la sogs pa'i bye brag la dogs par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable to suspect that the particulars of pot and so on are from the word existence.

original: sngon po'i yon tan ni dbye ba du ma ste /
analyzed: sngon po'i yon tan ni dbye ba du ma ste /
translated: The quality of blue has many divisions.

original: de rdzas gcig la yang 'jug bzhin pa ni /
analyzed: de rdzas gcig la yang 'jug bzhin pa ni /
translated: While it is engaged in a single substance,

original: rang gi khyad par rnams nye bar blangs nas ji ltar mngon bar srid par 'jug go zhes pas /
analyzed: rang gi khyad par rnams nye bar blangs nas ji ltar mngon bar srid par 'jug go zhes pas /
translated: it engages in what is manifest by taking up its own particulars.

original: de rjod par byed pa'i sngon po'i sgra las gnyis nas ches sngo ba la sogs pa la dogs par rigs so zhes ston to //
analyzed: de rjod par byed pa'i sngon po'i sgra las gnyis nas ches sngo ba la sogs pa la dogs par rigs so zhes ston to //
translated: This shows that it is reasonable to doubt that the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù expresses something bluer than blue.

original: 'o na de ltar zhes pas rnam pa gzhan gyi bye brag la dogs pa srid par gsungs so //
analyzed: 'o na de ltar zhes pas rnam pa gzhan gyi bye brag la dogs pa srid par gsungs so //
translated: ‚Äú But in that case‚Äù shows that it is possible to doubt the particular of another aspect.

original: sgra ni gzhan dbang ste /
analyzed: sgra ni gzhan dbang ste /
translated: The word is dependent,

original: yon tan la ltos nas 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: yon tan la ltos nas 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because it operates in dependence on a quality.

original: khyad par 'phen par nus pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par 'phen par nus pa'o //
translated: It is able to imply a distinction.

original: don ni dgos pa nyid kyi phyir gtso bo'o //
analyzed: don ni dgos pa nyid kyi phyir gtso bo'o //
translated: The object is primary because it is the purpose.

original: des na rigs ldan gyi don ni khyad par thams cad 'phangs nas 'jug ste /
analyzed: des na rigs ldan gyi don ni khyad par thams cad 'phangs nas 'jug ste /
translated: Therefore, the object of a word implies all distinctions and then operates.

original: de las kyang gal te yang bum pa nyid la sogs pa rnams yod pa'i @251b sgra'i brjod par bya bar mi 'gyur ba de lta na yang /
analyzed: de las kyang gal te yang bum pa nyid la sogs pa rnams yod pa'i @251b sgra'i brjod par bya bar mi 'gyur ba de lta na yang /
translated: Even if a pot and so on are not the object of the word existent,

original: yod pa nyid dang ldan pa'i don gyis bum pa la sogs pa rnams 'phangs pa na khyad par la dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang ldan pa'i don gyis bum pa la sogs pa rnams 'phangs pa na khyad par la dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: when the object that possesses existence implies a pot and so on, there is doubt about the distinction.

original: de'i phyir khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba nyid ma yin pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba nyid ma yin pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no distinction without a basis for distinction.

original: yang ci ltar don gyis khyad par mtha' dag 'phen ce na smras pa ;
analyzed: yang ci ltar don gyis khyad par mtha' dag 'phen ce na smras pa ;
translated: How does the meaning of the word itself imply all the distinctions?

original: de ldan gyi don ni gdon mi za bar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ldan gyi don ni gdon mi za bar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúpossessing‚Äù is definitely, etc.

original: rigs ldan gyi don ni sgras nye bar len cing /
analyzed: rigs ldan gyi don ni sgras nye bar len cing /
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúpossessing‚Äù is taken up by the word itself.

original: de yang nges par sbyor ba kho na las bum pa nyid la sogs pa'i spyi 'ga' zhig dang rjes su 'brel te /
analyzed: de yang nges par sbyor ba kho na las bum pa nyid la sogs pa'i spyi 'ga' zhig dang rjes su 'brel te /
translated: And that is definitely connected with some universals, such as potness, etc., only through the application of the word.

original: de las kyang de'i spyi'i dbye ba 'phen pa na bum pa la sogs pa'i bye brag 'phen pa'o zhe'o //
analyzed: de las kyang de'i spyi'i dbye ba 'phen pa na bum pa la sogs pa'i bye brag 'phen pa'o zhe'o //
translated: And when the universal of that is implied, the particulars, such as pot, etc., are implied.

original: rtogs ba 'di yang sel bar byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rtogs ba 'di yang sel bar byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: This understanding is also refuted:

original: don gyis 'phen na'ang ma nges pa //
analyzed: don gyis 'phen na'ang ma nges pa //
translated: Even if the meaning is implied, it is not ascertained.

original: zhes so // don gyis 'phangs pa ni zhes pa la sogs pas don gyis 'phen pa'i rang gi ngo bo gsungs shing /
analyzed: zhes so // don gyis 'phangs pa ni zhes pa la sogs pas don gyis 'phen pa'i rang gi ngo bo gsungs shing /
translated: The nature of the implication of the meaning is stated by ‚ÄúThe implication of the meaning is . . .‚Äù

original: de med par 'dir bstan pa'i ched du dper na nyin par mi za zhes chos mi mthun pa nyid des par bstan to //
analyzed: de med par 'dir bstan pa'i ched du dper na nyin par mi za zhes chos mi mthun pa nyid des par bstan to //
translated: In order to show that it does not exist, it is shown by the very dissimilarity, ‚ÄúOne does not eat during the day.‚Äù

original: 'dir ni zhes pa la sogs pas chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi nye bar sbyor par phyogs chos nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes pa la sogs pas chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi nye bar sbyor par phyogs chos nye bar bstan to //
translated: Here, ‚Äúin this case‚Äù and so on teach the property of the position by applying the very dissimilarity.

original: 'phangs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes pa chad ma'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'phangs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes pa chad ma'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no implication‚Äù is the result of the exclusion.

original: gang du don gyis 'phangs pa der ni ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: gang du don gyis 'phangs pa der ni ma nges pa ste /
translated: Where there is an implied meaning, there is uncertainty.

original: 'di lta ste nyin par mi za'o zhes pa 'dir mtshan mo za ba la'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste nyin par mi za'o zhes pa 'dir mtshan mo za ba la'o //
translated: For example, in ‚ÄúOne does not eat during the day,‚Äù there is uncertainty about eating at night.

original: yod pa zhes brjod pa na bum pa la sogs pa rnams la nges pa yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yod pa zhes brjod pa na bum pa la sogs pa rnams la nges pa yang ma yin gyi /
translated: When ‚Äúexistence‚Äù is stated, there is no certainty about pots and so on.

original: 'o na ci zhe na the tshom mo zhes pa rang bzhin 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na the tshom mo zhes pa rang bzhin 'gal ba'o //
translated: Rather, what is there? Doubt. This is a contradiction of the nature.

original: gal te'o na gang du the tshom za ba der mi 'phen pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te'o na gang du the tshom za ba der mi 'phen pa yin na /
translated: If there is no implication where there is doubt,

original: spyi'i sgras khyad rang gi khyad par mi 'phen par 'gyur te /
analyzed: spyi'i sgras khyad rang gi khyad par mi 'phen par 'gyur te /
translated: then a general term would not imply its own particular.

original: de las kyang de rnams la the tshom skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las kyang de rnams la the tshom skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because doubt arises about those from that.

original: gzhi mthun pa nyid med pa'i ched du mi 'phen pa yin na yang /
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa nyid med pa'i ched du mi 'phen pa yin na yang /
translated: But if it is not projected because there is no common locus,

original: gzhi mthun pa nyid de yang the tshom kho na yod pa la nye bar dmigs te /
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa nyid de yang the tshom kho na yod pa la nye bar dmigs te /
translated: then a common locus is observed in just the existence of doubt.

original: gang smras pa /üîΩthe tshom 'dod phyir khyad par ni //
analyzed: gang smras pa / the tshom 'dod phyir khyad par ni //
translated: As it was said:üîΩBecause of asserting doubt,

original: rang gi spyi yi 'dor ma yin //
analyzed: rang gi spyi yi 'dor ma yin //
translated: the distinction is not the exclusion of its generality.

original: blangs min the tshom skyed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: blangs min the tshom skyed pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of generating doubt that is not accepted,

original: mtshungs na'ang de dag don gcig nyid //
analyzed: mtshungs na'ang de dag don gcig nyid //
translated: even if they are similar, they are the same object.

original: ces so // gal te yang don las don nges pa kho nar 'gyur na /
analyzed: ces so // gal te yang don las don nges pa kho nar 'gyur na /
translated: If an object were to be ascertained only from an object,

original: khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po mi 'thad de /
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po mi 'thad de /
translated: then the entity of a distinction and that which is distinguished would be untenable,

original: rnam grangs kyi sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs kyi sgra bzhin no //
translated: like a term that is a synonym.

original: de dag las don des zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de dag las don des zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the object is ascertained by those.

original: de'i phyir @252a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir @252a * //
translated: Therefore,

original: 'di gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di gsal bar bya'o //
translated: this should be clarified.

original: de la gal te 'o na gang du the tshom za ba der mi 'phen pa zhes pa la sogs pa gang brjod pa de re zhig bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de la gal te 'o na gang du the tshom za ba der mi 'phen pa zhes pa la sogs pa gang brjod pa de re zhig bsam par bya ste /
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúBut if there is doubt about that, it is not projected,‚Äù and so on, then that should be considered first.

original: sgra 'phen ba yang gzhan yin la /
analyzed: sgra 'phen ba yang gzhan yin la /
translated: The projection of a term is one thing,

original: don 'phen ba yang gzhan yin te /
analyzed: don 'phen ba yang gzhan yin te /
translated: The meaning of the term is also different.

original: sgra 'phen ba ni mi gtong ba'i mtshan nyid can te /
analyzed: sgra 'phen ba ni mi gtong ba'i mtshan nyid can te /
translated: The term conveys the meaning of not relinquishing.

original: don 'phen pa ni nges pa'i mtshan nyid can no //üîΩde la the tshom las nges pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don 'phen pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: don 'phen pa ni nges pa'i mtshan nyid can no // de la the tshom las nges pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don 'phen pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa na /
translated: The meaning of the term conveys the meaning of ascertaining.üîΩIf you say that the meaning of the term does not convey the meaning of ascertaining because it is the meaning of a term that is doubted,

original: gal te 'o na gang du the tshom za ba der mi 'phen pa yin na spyi'i sgras kyang /
analyzed: gal te 'o na gang du the tshom za ba der mi 'phen pa yin na spyi'i sgras kyang /
translated: then if the term does not convey the meaning of a term that is doubted, then the term that is a general term would not convey the meaning of its own particular term, which is the meaning of the term that is not relinquished.

original: rang gi khyad par 'phen pa mi gtong ba'i mtshan nyid can du mi 'gyur ro zhes pa cis na cir thal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rang gi khyad par 'phen pa mi gtong ba'i mtshan nyid can du mi 'gyur ro zhes pa cis na cir thal bar 'gyur /
translated: Why is it that the term that is a general term does not convey the meaning of its own particular term, which is the meaning of the term that is not relinquished?üîΩThe response that the term does not convey the meaning of its own particular term, which is the meaning of the term that is not relinquished, because there is no common locus is not correct.

original: gang brjod pa yang gzhi mthun pa nyid med ba'i ched du mi 'phen pa zhes pa la sogs pa dang / gang yang gal te yang don las don nges pa kho nar zhes pa la sogs pa brjod pa de gnyis ka yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: gang brjod pa yang gzhi mthun pa nyid med ba'i ched du mi 'phen pa zhes pa la sogs pa dang / gang yang gal te yang don las don nges pa kho nar zhes pa la sogs pa brjod pa de gnyis ka yang mi rigs te /
translated: The response that the term does not convey the meaning of its own particular term, which is the meaning of the term that is not relinquished, because the term is a general term is also not correct.

original: ji ltar khyad par smra ba'i lugs kyis rigs kyi sgra kho nas nges zin ba'i khyad par thams cad la yang nges pa'i don du khyad par gyi mnyan pa ma sbyar ba na /
analyzed: ji ltar khyad par smra ba'i lugs kyis rigs kyi sgra kho nas nges zin ba'i khyad par thams cad la yang nges pa'i don du khyad par gyi mnyan pa ma sbyar ba na /
translated: Just as in the system of the Vai≈õe·π£ikas, when the word ‚Äútype‚Äù alone is ascertained, all the specific qualities that are ascertained are not ascertained as the referent of the specific term.

original: gzhi mthun pa nyid dang khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos por 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na ba de ltar de ldan gyi phyogs smra ba'i lugs kyis kyang 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di bsams zin to //
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa nyid dang khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos por 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na ba de ltar de ldan gyi phyogs smra ba'i lugs kyis kyang 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di bsams zin to //
translated: In the same way, in the system of the proponents of inherence, the basis is not the same thing as the quality and the thing qualified.

original: gal te 'o na don 'phen pa nges pa'i bdag nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'o na don 'phen pa nges pa'i bdag nyid yin na /
translated: If the meaning is inferred, it has the nature of ascertainment.

original: ci ltar don 'phangs pa'i bum pa la sogs pa rnams la bye brag re bar 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di brjod de /
analyzed: ci ltar don 'phangs pa'i bum pa la sogs pa rnams la bye brag re bar 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di brjod de /
translated: How is it that the inferred meaning, such as a pot, has a specific quality?

original: re ba zhes bya ba ni de rnams la the tshom za ba'i nges pa don du gnyer ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: re ba zhes bya ba ni de rnams la the tshom za ba'i nges pa don du gnyer ba yin no zhe na /
translated: That which is called ‚Äúspecific‚Äù is the ascertainment that seeks the meaning of a doubt about those.

original: skyon 'di med do //
analyzed: skyon 'di med do //
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: gang zhig don 'phangs pa 'dod pa de ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ri ba 'dod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang zhig don 'phangs pa 'dod pa de ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ri ba 'dod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: One who asserts the meaning that is inferred does not assert that it is as follows.

original: 'o na ci zhe na bye brag nges par ra ba ste /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na bye brag nges par ra ba ste /
translated: Well then, what is it? It is the ascertainment of particulars.

original: de kho na'i dbang du byas nas 'di brjod do //
analyzed: de kho na'i dbang du byas nas 'di brjod do //
translated: This is stated from the point of view of reality.

original: yang na mkhas pas rtsod pa 'di thams cad kyi lan 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes pas 'di gzhag go //
analyzed: yang na mkhas pas rtsod pa 'di thams cad kyi lan 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes pas 'di gzhag go //
translated: Or else, the wise will answer all of these objections.

original: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pas ji skad bshad pa'i rigs la sogs pa rjod par byed pa dgag pa nye bar sdud pas rang gi phyogs kho na bstan par mdzad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pas ji skad bshad pa'i rigs la sogs pa rjod par byed pa dgag pa nye bar sdud pas rang gi phyogs kho na bstan par mdzad do //
translated: Therefore, in the following, by way of a summary that refutes the expression of the previously explained types of reasonings, etc., he demonstrates his own position.

original: 'o na pha rol po'i phyogs bkag pas rang gi phyogs 'grub pa mi 'thob ste /
analyzed: 'o na pha rol po'i phyogs bkag pas rang gi phyogs 'grub pa mi 'thob ste /
translated: Well, one may say, one does not attain the establishment of one‚Äôs own position by way of the refutation of the opponent‚Äôs position,

original: bsal pa te 'ongs pa dgag par ji skad bshad pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: bsal pa te 'ongs pa dgag par ji skad bshad pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: just as one does not attain the negation of the arrived by way of the negation of the departed.

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: 'di la sngar kho nar /üîΩbyas @252b sogs bzhin du rang don la /
analyzed: 'di la sngar kho nar / byas @252b sogs bzhin du rang don la /
translated: For this has already been stated earlier:üîΩLike the produced, etc.,

original: gzhan sel bas ni rjod par byed //
analyzed: gzhan sel bas ni rjod par byed //
translated: the own meaning is expressed by way of the exclusion of the other.

original: ces sgra las byung ba rjes dpag las tha mi dad pa nyid du bsgrubs zin to //
analyzed: ces sgra las byung ba rjes dpag las tha mi dad pa nyid du bsgrubs zin to //
translated: Here, it has already been established that what arises from sound is not different from inference.

original: de la tshad ma gzhan du smra ba rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i sgo nas rigs la sogs pa rnams rjod par byed do zhes bshad pa /
analyzed: de la tshad ma gzhan du smra ba rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i sgo nas rigs la sogs pa rnams rjod par byed do zhes bshad pa /
translated: Those who advocate other means of valid cognition say that the terms ‚Äúinferential evidence‚Äù and so on are used to express the object of expression that is the exclusion of other.

original: de bkag pa na don de kho na rnam par gnas pa 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: de bkag pa na don de kho na rnam par gnas pa 'ba' zhig go //
translated: When that is refuted, only the object itself remains.

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rang gi phyogs sgrub par byed pa thugs la byas nas kyang 'di skad gsungs so //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rang gi phyogs sgrub par byed pa thugs la byas nas kyang 'di skad gsungs so //
translated: Keeping in mind the establishment of his own position, which will be explained below, DignƒÅga said the following.

original: yang ci 'dir sel ba tsam gyi brjod par bya ba nyid du mngon bar 'brel lam /
analyzed: yang ci 'dir sel ba tsam gyi brjod par bya ba nyid du mngon bar 'brel lam /
translated: Is the mere exclusion of other relevant here as the object of expression?

original: 'on te de'i khyad par du byas pa yin /
analyzed: 'on te de'i khyad par du byas pa yin /
translated: Or is it qualified by that?

original: de las cir 'gyur na /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur na /
translated: What follows from that?

original: gal te gzhan sel ba tsam yin na /üîΩrang don la /üîΩgzhan sel ba yis rjod par byed /
analyzed: gal te gzhan sel ba tsam yin na / rang don la / gzhan sel ba yis rjod par byed /
translated: If it is the mere exclusion of other,

original: ces pa'i gzhung 'gal te /
analyzed: ces pa'i gzhung 'gal te /
translated: it contradicts the statementüîΩ‚ÄúThe exclusion of other expresses its own object.‚Äù

original: rang gi don las tha dad par gzhan sel ba brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi don las tha dad par gzhan sel ba brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because the exclusion of other is dependent on something different from its own object.

original: de ltar dngos po de'i cha 'ga' zhig don gzhan las ldog pas rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar dngos po de'i cha 'ga' zhig don gzhan las ldog pas rtogs par bya ste /
translated: In that case, that thing is understood through the exclusion of other objects.

original: sgra ni don gzhan las ldog pas khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po rnams smra'o zhes pa la sogs pa bstan pa de ldan gyi phyogs gsal bar byed pa rnams 'gal lo //
analyzed: sgra ni don gzhan las ldog pas khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po rnams smra'o zhes pa la sogs pa bstan pa de ldan gyi phyogs gsal bar byed pa rnams 'gal lo //
translated: Sound is the means of expression, because it is distinguished from other objects.

original: ci ste des kyang khyad par du byas pa yin no /
analyzed: ci ste des kyang khyad par du byas pa yin no /
translated: But if it is distinguished by that,

original: des nam nyan pa gzhan sel byed //
analyzed: des nam nyan pa gzhan sel byed //
translated: then it is the listener that is distinguished by the exclusion of other.

original: ces nyams te /
analyzed: ces nyams te /
translated: This is a fault.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan sel bar byed do zhes pa ni rjod par byed do zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan sel bar byed do zhes pa ni rjod par byed do zhes pa'i don te /
translated: Because the exclusion of other is what is expressed,

original: ji ltar dgag tshig gis 'gog par byed do zhes pa 'di la bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar dgag tshig gis 'gog par byed do zhes pa 'di la bzhin no //
translated: just as in the expression ‚Äúthe negation negates.‚Äù

original: sgra'i byed pa gzhan srid pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i byed pa gzhan srid pa ni ma yin no //
translated: There is no other function of sound.

original: de ldan gyi phyogs gzhan du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ldan gyi phyogs gzhan du mi 'gyur te /
translated: The position that it has that function is not correct,

original: de'i phyir de ldan gyi phyogs la brjod pa'i skyon rnams 'di la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ldan gyi phyogs la brjod pa'i skyon rnams 'di la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: because the faults that were stated about that position would also apply to this position.

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: This fault does not exist,

original: gzhan sel ba kho na sgra'i don yin pas so 'gal ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba kho na sgra'i don yin pas so 'gal ba yang ma yin te /
translated: because the exclusion of other is the meaning of the word.üîΩNor is there a contradiction,üîΩbecause the word is the means of expression.

original: gang gi phyir gang 'di rang gi don yin pa de kho na gzhan sel byed ces 'dir gzhan sel gyi sgras brjod pas so //üîΩgzhan sel bas ni rjod par byed //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang 'di rang gi don yin pa de kho na gzhan sel byed ces 'dir gzhan sel gyi sgras brjod pas so // gzhan sel bas ni rjod par byed //
translated: The word ‚Äúeliminator‚Äù is used here.

original: ces pa 'di'i dgos pa ni bshad zin to ;
analyzed: ces pa 'di'i dgos pa ni bshad zin to ;
translated: The purpose of this has been explained.

original: / gzhan yang khyad par gcig bskul na yang gzhan las ldog pa rtogs pa la /
analyzed: / gzhan yang khyad par gcig bskul na yang gzhan las ldog pa rtogs pa la /
translated: Moreover, even when one difference is elicited, the understanding of the exclusion from otherüîΩis taught by the words, and the eliminator of other expresses it.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas bskul ba'i tha snyad rtogs par sgra rnams ston cing gzhan sel bas rjod par byed de /üîΩdngos po de'i cha 'ga' zhig don gzhan las ldog pas rtogs par @253a * //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas bskul ba'i tha snyad rtogs par sgra rnams ston cing gzhan sel bas rjod par byed de / dngos po de'i cha 'ga' zhig don gzhan las ldog pas rtogs par @253a * //
translated: The word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.

original: bya'o // sgra ni don gzhan las ldog pa'i khyad par can kho na'i dngos po rnams rjod par byed do zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //üîΩkhyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bya'o // sgra ni don gzhan las ldog pa'i khyad par can kho na'i dngos po rnams rjod par byed do zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //üîΩkhyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúexpresses‚Äù is used here.üîΩThe

original: 'o na rjes su 'gro ba tsam ston pa kho nas sa ma ldog pa tsam ston pa kho nas sgra'i tha snyad rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rjes su 'gro ba tsam ston pa kho nas sa ma ldog pa tsam ston pa kho nas sgra'i tha snyad rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the linguistic convention understood just by showing mere concomitance?

original: 'di yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩFor, if there is no exclusion in mere concomitance, then the teaching would be fruitless.

original: rjes su 'gro ba gcig pu la ni yongs su spang bar bya ba med na 'bras bu med pa'i ston pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin du yongs su spang bar bya ba gcig la 'ga' zhig la gnas pa med na'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba gcig pu la ni yongs su spang bar bya ba med na 'bras bu med pa'i ston pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin du yongs su spang bar bya ba gcig la 'ga' zhig la gnas pa med na'o //
translated: And similarly, if there is no exclusion in mere exclusion, then there would be no basis for anything.

original: ldog pa med pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba yang med la rjes su 'gro ba med pa can gyi ldog pa yang med de /
analyzed: ldog pa med pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba yang med la rjes su 'gro ba med pa can gyi ldog pa yang med de /
translated: There is no concomitance without exclusion, nor is there exclusion without concomitance.

original: rang gi don rtogs par byed pa ni rjes su 'gro ba yin zhing 'di ni ldog pa med par srid pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi don rtogs par byed pa ni rjes su 'gro ba yin zhing 'di ni ldog pa med par srid pa yang ma yin no //
translated: For, concomitance is the understanding of the meaning of a word, and this is not possible without exclusion.

original: rang gi don las don gzhan rnam par gcod pa ni ldog pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi don las don gzhan rnam par gcod pa ni ldog pa ste /
translated: Exclusion is the exclusion of other referents from the referent of a word.

original: de yang rjes su 'gro ba med par brtag par 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang rjes su 'gro ba med par brtag par 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: And that is not suitable to be imagined without concomitance.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sgra las de las gzhan zlog pa dang / gang gi don brjod pa'i bya ba gnyis ni med de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sgra las de las gzhan zlog pa dang / gang gi don brjod pa'i bya ba gnyis ni med de /
translated: Therefore, the two actions of excluding other from that and expressing its meaning do not exist in a word.

original: rang gi don ni tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: rang gi don ni tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Because its own meaning is a different entity,

original: de brjod pa kho na las de las gzhan pa bzlog pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de brjod pa kho na las de las gzhan pa bzlog pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is understood that it is excluded from other by merely expressing it.

original: ji ltar 'di 'di'i spun drung ngo zhes brjod pa na spun drung nyid ni gnyis kar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'di 'di'i spun drung ngo zhes brjod pa na spun drung nyid ni gnyis kar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Just as when it is said, ‚ÄúThis is his brother,‚Äù since being a brother is a mutual state,

original: gcig la spun drung du brjod na yang /
analyzed: gcig la spun drung du brjod na yang /
translated: when one is called a brother,üîΩbecause it is a necessary condition, the other is also understood to be a brother.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir cig shog kyang spun drung nyid du rtogs pa de ltar dbye bar bya ba gnyis dag la /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir cig shog kyang spun drung nyid du rtogs pa de ltar dbye bar bya ba gnyis dag la /
translated: In the same way, when two things are to be distinguished,

original: dbye ba ni gnyis kar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir dbye ba gcig bskul ba na yang med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir de gzhan las ldog pa'o //
analyzed: dbye ba ni gnyis kar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir dbye ba gcig bskul ba na yang med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir de gzhan las ldog pa'o //
translated: since the distinction is a mutual state, when one distinction is stated, because it is a necessary condition, the other is excluded from other.

original: de'i phyir yang gang zhig mnyan pas don gzhan sel bar byed na /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang gang zhig mnyan pas don gzhan sel bar byed na /
translated: Therefore, when one hears a word, it causes the exclusion of other objects.

original: de dgag pa kho na don spyad zin pa can nyid kyi phyir rang gi don rtogs pa'i ched du sgra gzhan btsal bar bya'o zhes brjod pa de yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de dgag pa kho na don spyad zin pa can nyid kyi phyir rang gi don rtogs pa'i ched du sgra gzhan btsal bar bya'o zhes brjod pa de yang mi 'thad de /
translated: Because the refutation of that alone is already the meaning, one should seek another sound for the purpose of understanding one‚Äôs own purpose.

original: gang gi phyir sgra ni rang gi don kho na rtogs par byed cing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra ni rang gi don kho na rtogs par byed cing /
translated: That is also untenable, because sound causes one to understand only its own meaning.

original: rtogs par bya ba'i don de la med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir don gzhan ldog pa rtogs so zhes pas so //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'i don de la med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir don gzhan ldog pa rtogs so zhes pas so //
translated: If the meaning to be understood does not exist, it does not occur. Therefore it is said that one understands the exclusion of other objects.

original: des na de ltar sel ba kho na sgra'i don ni te 'gal ba ci yang med do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: des na de ltar sel ba kho na sgra'i don ni te 'gal ba ci yang med do zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, in that case, the meaning of sound is only the exclusion, and there is no contradiction at all.

original: yang sgra'i don 'di ci zhe na /
analyzed: yang sgra'i don 'di ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of sound?

original: gang brjod 'dod kyi spyi'i rnam pa 'di yin @253b te ;
analyzed: gang brjod 'dod kyi spyi'i rnam pa 'di yin @253b te ;
translated: The general aspect of that is what is desired to be expressed.

original: de yang brjod 'dod la mi 'khrul zhes pas brjod 'dod la sgra tshad ma nyid du bshad do //
analyzed: de yang brjod 'dod la mi 'khrul zhes pas brjod 'dod la sgra tshad ma nyid du bshad do //
translated: Moreover, since it is said that it is undeluded with respect to what is desired to be expressed, sound is explained to be a valid means of knowledge with respect to what is desired to be expressed.

original: 'o na spyi sgra'i don yin na des na ji ltar blo'i snang ba sgra'i yul du brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na spyi sgra'i don yin na des na ji ltar blo'i snang ba sgra'i yul du brjod ce na /
translated: If the meaning of sound is a universal, then how is the appearance to the mind said to be the object of sound?

original: de kho na spyir gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: de kho na spyir gzhag par bya ste /
translated: That is precisely what is to be posited as a universal.

original: ci ltar zhe na /üîΩ'dir dbang po dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa rnams sam /üîΩbdag dang dbang po dang yid dang don dang phrad pa rnams spyi med par tha dad pa yin kyang gzugs kyi shes pa gcig skyed par byed pa ji lta ba de ltar shing sha pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams kyang /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na / 'dir dbang po dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa rnams sam / bdag dang dbang po dang yid dang don dang phrad pa rnams spyi med par tha dad pa yin kyang gzugs kyi shes pa gcig skyed par byed pa ji lta ba de ltar shing sha pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams kyang /
translated: How is that?üîΩHere, the sense faculty, the object, and mental attention, or the self, the sense faculty, the mind, and the object, are different from each other, but they generate a single consciousness of form.

original: phan tshun rjes su 'gro ba med na yang rang nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags sad par byed pa rnams kyis tha mi dad par snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gcig skyed par byed do //
analyzed: phan tshun rjes su 'gro ba med na yang rang nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags sad par byed pa rnams kyis tha mi dad par snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gcig skyed par byed do //
translated: In the same way, even though the specific features of a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree and so on do not mutually follow each other, they generate a single conceptual consciousness that appears undifferentiated, since they activate the latent tendencies for conceptualization through their own experience.

original: de yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa gcig pa nyid kyis na /
analyzed: de yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa gcig pa nyid kyis na /
translated: Moreover, since the object to be established and the means of establishing are the same,

original: gzhan las tha dad pa rnams dang rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzhan las tha dad pa rnams dang rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni /
translated: those that are different from others and have the nature of latent tendencies for conceptualization

original: gang de'i dbang gis de rnams kyi der skye bzhin pa'i ngo bo tha dad pa bsgribs te /
analyzed: gang de'i dbang gis de rnams kyi der skye bzhin pa'i ngo bo tha dad pa bsgribs te /
translated: By the power of that, the different natures of those are obscured,

original: bdag nyid kyi snang ba tha mi dad pa de rnams la sgro btags nas /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi snang ba tha mi dad pa de rnams la sgro btags nas /
translated: and the appearance of the self is superimposed on them as undifferentiated.

original: de rnams ngo bo tha mi dad pa bzhin du rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis ston to //
analyzed: de rnams ngo bo tha mi dad pa bzhin du rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis ston to //
translated: In that way, they are shown to be undifferentiated in some way.

original: de'i snang ba tha mi dad pa gang yin pa ni phyi rol bzhin dang / don bya ba byed pa bzhin dang / gsal ba tha dad la rjes su 'gro ba bzhin te /
analyzed: de'i snang ba tha mi dad pa gang yin pa ni phyi rol bzhin dang / don bya ba byed pa bzhin dang / gsal ba tha dad la rjes su 'gro ba bzhin te /
translated: The undifferentiated appearance of that is like an external object, like an object that performs a function, and like a different manifestation.

original: rtogs pa po 'khrul pa rnams kyis phyi rol nyid du zhen par byas pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa po 'khrul pa rnams kyis phyi rol nyid du zhen par byas pa'o //
translated: Those who are deluded conceive of it as external.

original: blo la yongs su 'jug pa'i dngos po rnams kyi phyi rol lta bur kun du 'phro ba nyid de ni rtogs pa pos bsam pa'i ngor spyir rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: blo la yongs su 'jug pa'i dngos po rnams kyi phyi rol lta bur kun du 'phro ba nyid de ni rtogs pa pos bsam pa'i ngor spyir rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The appearance of things that engage the mind as if external is a universal that is posited in the mind of the conceiver.

original: da ni ci ltar gzhan sel ba'i spyi sgra'i don no zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: da ni ci ltar gzhan sel ba'i spyi sgra'i don no zhes brjod ce na /
translated: Now, how is the meaning of the term ‚Äúexclusion of other‚Äù stated?

original: de kho na ni gzhan sel ba yin no //
analyzed: de kho na ni gzhan sel ba yin no //
translated: That itself is the exclusion of other.

original: ci ltar ji tsam pas phyi rol rnams kyi don gzhan las ldog pa de kho na gzhan sel ba yin te /
analyzed: ci ltar ji tsam pas phyi rol rnams kyi don gzhan las ldog pa de kho na gzhan sel ba yin te /
translated: How and to what extent does external objects' exclusion from other objects constitute the exclusion of other?

original: ldog pa dang gzhan sel ba dang don gzhan rnam par gcod pa zhes pa la sogs pa rnams ni rnam grangs rnams yin zhing /
analyzed: ldog pa dang gzhan sel ba dang don gzhan rnam par gcod pa zhes pa la sogs pa rnams ni rnam grangs rnams yin zhing /
translated: Exclusion, exclusion of other, exclusion of other objects, and so on are synonyms.

original: ldog pa ni ldog ldan las gzhan du 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa ni ldog ldan las gzhan du 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Exclusion is not asserted to be different from that which possesses exclusion.

original: des na phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid ci ltar gzhan sel ba shes pa'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur zhe na skyon med de /üîΩde kho na nyid dpyod par byed pa 'chad par byed pa rnams de ltar rnam par 'byed par byed kyi cig @254a * //
analyzed: des na phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid ci ltar gzhan sel ba shes pa'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur zhe na skyon med de / de kho na nyid dpyod par byed pa 'chad par byed pa rnams de ltar rnam par 'byed par byed kyi cig @254a * //
translated: Therefore, how could an external object that is the nature of its own character become the nature of the aspect of consciousness that is the exclusion of other?

original: shos rnams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: shos rnams ni ma yin te /
translated: There is no error because those who analyze reality and explain it distinguish it in that way, but others do not.

original: de rnams ni blo la yod pa'i rnam pa de kho na don bya bar rung ba yin par sems shing /
analyzed: de rnams ni blo la yod pa'i rnam pa de kho na don bya bar rung ba yin par sems shing /
translated: Others think that the aspect that exists in the mind is suitable to be an object.

original: brda dang tha snyad kyi dus dag tu snang ba dang rnam par brtag par bya ba'i don dag gcig nyid du zhe na /
analyzed: brda dang tha snyad kyi dus dag tu snang ba dang rnam par brtag par bya ba'i don dag gcig nyid du zhe na /
translated: If you say that at the time of the conventions of words and expressions, the object that appears and the object that is imagined are the same,

original: de'i phyir de rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang las gzhan sel ba phyi rol gyi don gyi yul lo zhes brjod kyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang las gzhan sel ba phyi rol gyi don gyi yul lo zhes brjod kyi /
translated: then for that reason, we say that the object of external things, the exclusion of other, is due to the power of thought.

original: de kho na nyid sems pa na mkhas pa rnams ni snang ba tha dad pa la sogs pa rnams kyi phyir tha dad pa med par mi sems so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid sems pa na mkhas pa rnams ni snang ba tha dad pa la sogs pa rnams kyi phyir tha dad pa med par mi sems so //
translated: When contemplating reality, the wise do not think that the different appearances, etc., are not different.

original: gzhan yang gang tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba de'i rten ni gzhan sel ba kho na'o zhes bstan pa'i ched du sgra'i yul gzhan sel ba'o zhes bshad de /
analyzed: gzhan yang gang tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba de'i rten ni gzhan sel ba kho na'o zhes bstan pa'i ched du sgra'i yul gzhan sel ba'o zhes bshad de /
translated: Moreover, in order to demonstrate that the basis of the cognition that arises with an undifferentiated aspect is the exclusion of other, the object of words is said to be the exclusion of other.

original: de ni dngos po rnams la yod pa'i phyir dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni dngos po rnams la yod pa'i phyir dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it exists in things and is not contradictory.

original: mtshungs pa'i blo'i rten gyi dngos po ni gzhan sel bar mi 'gal te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i blo'i rten gyi dngos po ni gzhan sel bar mi 'gal te /
translated: The basis of a cognition of sameness is not contradictory to the exclusion of other.

original: de ltar ni 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyis de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa rnams las ldog pa'i khyad par rnams ni rang nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu can gyi bag chags kyi rgyu rnams su 'gyur zhing spyi'i rnam pa rjes su 'brel
analyzed: de ltar ni 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyis de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa rnams las ldog pa'i khyad par rnams ni rang nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu can gyi bag chags kyi rgyu rnams su 'gyur zhing spyi'i rnam pa rjes su 'brel
translated: Thus, by the very fact that they have the same effect, the distinctions that are the opposites of those that do not have that effect are the causes of the latent potentialities that have the effect of error, which are experienced internally, and they generate the cognition that is associated with the general aspect.

original: ba'i blo skyed par byed do zhes pa 'di bstan to //
analyzed: ba'i blo skyed par byed do zhes pa 'di bstan to //
translated: This is what is being taught.
